 Umwami wankunz'atyo;   
None maze kwemezwa,   
 Mwami nguhaye byose.

title: 122 Nyigiza Hafi
123 Har'Izina Rihebuje
markdown:
### 123 Har'Izina Rihebuje   

  **1**   
 Har'izina rihebuje,   
 Rirut'ayandi yose nzi;   
Ni ry'Imana yaturemye   
yis'Umwana way'ikunda.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ni ryo zina ryera (izina);   
Ni ryo zina ryera (ryera de)!   
Ryakomotse ku Mana, Riza mw'isi,   
 Maze riririmbwa (izina)   
 n'abamarayika (ryera de).   
Iryo zina n'irya Yesu.

  **2**   
Niryo rimpesh'umugisha;   
Nkunda kuryogez'iteka.   
Simpwema kuriririmba,   
 Mvug'ukuntu rihebuje.

  **3**   
Icyampa nkaririmbana   
n'abamarayika bera,   
 Nkajya nsingiza rya zina   
rihebuj'ayandi yose!

title: 124 Yesu Gusa
125 Nk'Ukw'Izuba Rituvira
markdown:
### 125 Nk'Ukw'Izuba Rituvira   

  **1**   
 Nkukw'izuba rituvira,   
 Rikarabagirana,   
 Nik'umucyo wo mw'ijuru   
wansabye mu mutima,   
 Wawukuyemw'iby'amanjwe,   
 Utangaz'ibihishwe;   
Kuko mu mutima wanjye,   
 Nahatuj'Umukiza.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbeg'umucyo w'agatangaza,   
 Wansabye mu mutima!   
Ineza y'Umwami Yesu,   
 Yambereye nk'umucyo.

  **2**   
Natay'agahinda kose;   
Ntabwo nkikitayeho;   
Kuk'unyambik'amahoro,   
 Ameze nk'umwitero,   
Nkwerekejeh'umutima,   
 Ndakwishimiye cyane.   
 Nzagezw'i wawe mw'ijuru,   
 Na rwa rukundo rwawe.

  **3**   
Mukiza warancunguye;   
Nd'uwaw'uko ndi kose.   
Nyemerera nguhimbaze,   
 Nkuber'umucyo waka.   
Nkwerekejeh'umutima,   
 Ndakwishimiye cyane.   
Nzagezw'i wawe mw'ijuru,   
 Na rwa rukundo rwawe.

title: 126 Njya Nkunda Kuririmb'Indirimbo
markdown:
### 126 Njya Nkunda Kuririmb'Indirimbo   

  **1**   
 Njya nkunda kuririmb'indirimbo,   
 Ngo yarancunguye.   
Niwe waciy'ingoyi z'umwanzi,   
 Maz'arambatura.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **Sop:**   
 Kuk'ubwe yancunguye;   
Kuk'ubwe yancunguye,   
 Nzahimbaz'izina rye.   
Kuk'ubwe yancunguye,   
 Nzaririmbir'uwandokoye.   
 **A.T.B.:**   
 Kuk'ubwe yancunguye;   
Kuk'ubwe yancunguye;   
Kuk'ubwe yancunguye,   
 Nzahimbaz'izina rye.   
Kuk'ubwe yancunguye,   
 Kuk'ubwe yancunguye;   
Nzaririmbir'uwandokoye.

  **2**   
Mfit'Umukiz'unogeye rwose,   
 Niwe wancunguye.   
Mpimbazwa no gukor'iby'ashaka,   
 Kuko yancunguye.

  **3**   
Nzahora mpamya ntacyo nikenga,   
 Yuko yancunguye.   
Sinzashidikanya ngo ncogore,   
 Kuko yancunguye.

  **4**   
Mfit'aho yanteguriye heza,   
 Kuko yancunguye.   
Niho nzibanira naw'iteka,   
 Kuko yancunguye.

title: 127 Iman'Ikund'Utunyoni
markdown:
### 127 Iman'Ikund'Utunyoni   

  **1**   
 Iman'ikund'utunyoni,   
 Tuba mur'iyi si;   
Ubwo yita ku tunyoni,   
 Nzi ko nanjy'inkunda.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Irankunda, irankunda;   
Nzi ko nanjy'inkunda;   
Kukw'ikund'utuntu duto,   
 Nzi ko nanjy'inkunda.

  **2**   
Niy'irimbish'uburabyo,   
 Buhumura neza;   
Ubw'ikund'uburaby'ityo,   
 Nzi ko nanjy'inkunda.

  **3**   
Imana yaremye byose,   
 Ntigir'icy'isobwa.   
Nzi kw'ikund'abana bose,   
 Nzi ko nanjy'inkunda.

title: 128 N'Igihe Cyo Gusengat
markdown:
### 128 N'Igihe Cyo Gusenga
  **1**   
 N'igihe cyo gusenga, Twicishe bugufi,   
 Duteraniye hamwe turamya Yesu,   
 Nituza tumwizeye, Azajy'aturinda;   
Mbeg'ihumure ryiza, ryo kwibanira nawe

  **Gusubiramo:**   
N'igihe cyiza cyo kuramy'Umwami,   
 Mbeg'ihumure ryiza,   
 ryo kwibanira na we!

  **2**   
N'igihe cyo gusenga, Umwam'ari hafi,   
 Kand'adufitiy'ibambe rya kibyeyi.   
Tumuganyir'ibyacu, Dushir'agahinda;   
Mbeg'ihumure ryiza, ryo kumvikana nawe! 

  **3**   
N'igihe cyo gusenga, no gushyikirana,   
 N'Imana yac'ihor'ituzirikana,   
 Iturem'agatima, tub'indahangarwa;   
Mbeg'ihumure ryiza, ryo kumvikana nawe! 

  **4**   
N'igihe cyo gusenga, twiringiye Yesu.   
Twizeye kw'azaduh'ibyo, tumusaba,   
 Kukw'atangan'ubuntu, ataziganije.   
Mbeg'ihumure ryiza, ryo gutabarwa nawe!

title: 129 Yesu Waduhay'Isezerano
markdown:
### 129 Yesu Waduhay'Isezerano   

  **1**   
 Yesu waduhaye isezerano,   
 K'uzabana natwe, niduterana,   
Naho twaba babiri, Cyangwa batatu,   
 Uzab'uri kumwe n'abana bawe.

 Gusubiramo: 
Yesu, ngwin'uduhire,   
 Tutarava hano;   
Yesu ngwin'uduhire ubu,   
 Tuban'iteka.

  **2**   
Wateranye natwe, mu bindi bihe,   
 Ariko na n'ubu turakwifuza.   
Ngwino, Mubyeyi mwiza,   
 Turakwinginze;   
Twumvir'utwemere,   
 Duhirwe nawe.

  **3**   
Wakir'indirimbo z'ishimwe ryacu,   
 Uduhe gusenga tubyitayeho.   
Twongerere kwizera,   
 No kwiringira;   
Dukundane rwose,   
 Dushyire hamwe.

title: 130 Nd'Uwawe, Mwami
markdown:
### 130 Nd'Uwawe, Mwami   

  **1**   
 Nd'uwawe Mwami, Ubu nditanze;   
Numvis'ubury'udukunda.   
Nsingiriz'amabok'untabare,   
 Njye nibanire nawe.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S.A:**   
 Hafi yawe, Nibyo nifuza,   
 Ku musaraba wawe.   
Hafi yawe, Mwami, tuban'iteka,   
 Njye nibanira nawe.   
 **T.B:**   
 Hafi yawe cyane, ni byo nifuza,   
 Ku musaraba wawe.   
Hafi yawe, Mwami, Tuban'iteka,   
 Njye nibanira nawe.

  **2**   
Nkwiyeguriye namaramaje,   
 Nkoresh'umurimo wawe;   
Nkwerekejeh'umutima wanjye,   
 Ng'uhor'ugengwa nawe.

  **3**   
Kubana nawe birahebuje,   
 Nibyo bindutira byose.   
Iyo mpfukamye nkakuganyira,   
 Dusabana nk'inshuti.

  **4**   
Sinashobora kukurondora,   
 Ngo mmeny'urukundo rwawe.   
Ruzahishurwa turi mw'ijuru,   
 Aho twateguriwe.

title: 131 Ndusheho Gusa Nawe
markdown:
### 131 Ndusheho Gusa Nawe   

  **1**   
 Ndusheho gusa nawe,   
 Yesu Mukiza wanjye;   
Nyuzuz'ubugwaneza,   
 Mp'urukundo ruhebuje.   
Ndusheho kumera nkawe,   
 Aho ngenda hose, Mwami;   
Ndiyoroheje rwose,   
 Mwami njye ngukurikiza.

  **2**   
Nib'irind'icyanira,   
 Ikamenya n'igishwi;   
Sinshidikanya rwose,   
 Nanjy'ihor'inyitayeho.   
Izanyigisha kwitonda,   
 Imbabarir'amafuti;   
Ndiyoroheje rwose,   
 Mwami njye ngukurikiza.

  **3**   
Ndusheho gusa nawe,   
 Ndusheh'uko bukeye;   
Nyigiza hafi yawe,   
 Ahw'amahor'adashira.   
Uhor'umpindura mushya,   
 Kubw'urukund'ungirira;   
Ndiyoroheje rwose,   
 Mwami njye ngukurikiza.

title: 132 Yesu, Unkomereze Ku Musaraba
markdown:
### 132 Yesu, Unkomereze Ku Musaraba   

  **1**   
 Yes'unkomereze,   
 Ku musaraba wawe;   
Har'isokw'ibeshaho,   
 Itemb'i Kal'vari.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Umusaraba wa Yesu nzawirata,   
 Kugez'ubwo nzabona uburuhukiro.

  **2**   
Hafi y'umusaraba,   
 Mpaboner'iteka,   
 Imbabazi n'impuhwe,   
 Bitarondoreka.

  **3**   
Hafi y'umusaraba,   
 Intama y'Imana,   
 Niyo yahangejeje,   
 Ntsind'ibimbabaza.

  **4**   
Hafi y'umusaraba,   
 Niho ntegereje;   
Niringiye kugera,   
 Mu bwami bw'Imana.

title: 133 Nyemerera Ngendane Nawe
markdown:
### 133 Nyemerera Ngendane Nawe   

  **1**   
 Nyemerera ngendane nawe,   
 Mana, Nk'ukw'Enoki yagenje.   
Nyoboresh'ukuboko kwawe,   
 Unyerekez'ah'ushaka hose.   
Nubw'inzir'itagaragara,   
 Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami.

  **2**   
Ntabwo nahangara kugenda,   
 Ntari kumwe nawe, Mukiza;   
Nagoswe n'abanz'igihumbi;   
Dor'imitegw'intaye hagati.   
Burije rwose, ntihabona,   
 Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami.

  **3**   
Ninguma mu maboko yawe,   
 Sinzaba ncyitaye ku by'isi;   
Nta kindi nziratana rwose,   
 Keretse wa musaraba wawe,   
 Ngez'ubwo nzager'i Siyoni,   
 Nkomeze njyane nawe, Mwami.

title: 134 Icyampa Nkarangurura
markdown:
### 134 Icyampa Nkarangurura   

  **1**   
 Icyampa nkarangurura,   
 Ngahimbaz'Umwami wanjye,   
 Ariko ni nde wabasha   
kuririmb'ishimwe rya Yesu?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Urukundo ruhebuje!   
Urukundo rwa Yesu!   
Urukundo ruhebuje!   
Urukundo rwa Yesu!

  **2**   
Niwe munezero wanjye,   
 Ni naw'umpesh'amahoro.   
Mu makuba no mu byago,   
 Yesu niw'umber'ihumure.

  **3**   
Niwe byiringiro byanjye,   
 Byo kuzahabw'ubugingo.   
Mu mwijim'amber'umucyo,   
 Yesu niw'umber'ihumure.

title: 135 Mwami Nzi Kw'Ari We Nkunda
markdown:
### 135 Mwami Nzi Kw'Ari We Nkunda   

  **1**   
 Mwami, nzi kw'ari We nkunda,   
 Kurut'iby'iyi si;   
Kuko wampay'amahoro,   
 Atagir'impinduka.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Urukundo rwankijije (ngakira),   
 Ntirurondoreka.   
Ntitwarusobanukirwa (na hato),   
 Kuko ruhebuje (ruhebuje).

  **2**   
Nzi k'uhor'unzirikana,   
 Undutira byose,   
 Mwami, kugutekereza   
 bindutir'ibyiratwa.

  **3**   
Wanyujuj'umunezero,   
 Natay'umuruho.   
Kumenya k'unkunda cyane,   
 Nibyo bimpumuriza.

  **4**   
Mucunguzi wanjye mwiza,   
 Icyakunyereka!   
Ngo tuzabane mw'ijuru,   
 Ahatab'agahinda.

title: 136 Ahw'Azanyobora Hose
markdown:
### 136 Ahw'Azanyobora Hose   

  **1**   
 Ahw'azanyobora hose,   
 Niho nzishimira kujya;   
Kukw'ari jye yapfiriye,   
 Akanzir'atacumuye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yes'azanyobor'iteka,   
 Maz'angez'iw'amahoro;   
Kukw'ar'inshuti y'ukuri,   
 Itigeze guhemuka.

  **2**   
Nishimira kw'antegeka,   
 Nishimira kw'anyobora.   
Nishimira kumwumvira,   
 Kukw'ari jye yapfiriye.

  **3**   
Singishidikanya rwose,   
 Kuko ndi kumwe na Yesu.   
Nizigiye ko vub'aha,   
 Nzamureba duhanganye.

title: 137 Isi Ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu
markdown:
### 137 Isi Ndayihararutse, Mpisemo Yesu   

  **1**   
 Isi ndayihararutse,   
Mpisemo Yesu gusa.   
 Mpaz'umunezero wayo,   
Uzashirana nayo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Imbabazi zidashira,   
 N'urukundo rw'iteka,   
 Nibyo bijya binyemeza,   
 Ko nzaramishwa nawe.

  **2**   
Isi ndayihararutse,   
 Mpisemo Yesu gusa.   
Mu kaga niwe humure;   
Nzahora nezerewe.

  **3**   
Isi ndayihararutse,   
 Mpisemo Yesu gusa.   
Icyamp'akamwenyurira,   
 Nkamurikirwa nawe.

  **4**   
Isi ndayihararutse,   
 Mpisemo Yesu gusa.   
Nzirat'umusaraba we,   
 Yatangiyeho kera.

title: 138 Mwami Wanjye, Nyakira
markdown:
### 138 Mwami Wanjye, Nyakira   

  **1**   
 Mwami wanjye nyakira,   
 Ndakwiyeguriy'ubu;   
Ngay'amaboko yanjye,   
 Yakoresh'uk'ushaka.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nyuhagiz'amaraso yawe (nere rwose);   
Maz'anyezehw'inenge yose (nere rwose);   
Ibyanjye byose ndabikweguriye,   
 None n'iteka ryose.

  **2**   
Ngib'ibirenge byanjye,   
 Byerekez'ah'ushaka.   
Ngir'ijwi ryanjye na ryo,   
 Rijye riguhimbaza.

  **3**   
Nguhay'akanwa kanjye;   
Mwami, kakuvugire.   
Ngub'ubutunzi bwanjye,   
 Sinzagir'icyo nkwima.

  **4**   
Nguhay'igihe cyanjye,   
 Sinzakiguteraho;   
Nguhay'ubwenge bwanjye,   
 Bukoresh'uk'ushaka.

  **5**   
Ngiy'imigambi yanjye;   
Igengwe nawe, Mwami.   
Nguy'umutima wanjye,   
 Ube uwawe rwose.

  **6**   
Mwam'urukundo rwanjye,   
 Ni wowe nzarukunda;   
Nkwihaye nimazeyo,   
 None n'iteka ryose.

title: 139 Nabony'Inshut'Ihebuje
markdown:
### 139 Nabony'Inshut'Ihebuje   

  **1**   
 Nabony'inshut'ihebuje!   
Yankunze ntarabaho;   
Yanyiyegereshej'ineza,   
 N'urukundo rw'iteka,   
 Bituma dushyikirana,   
 Ubudatandukana;   
Kuko nd'uwe nawe n'uwanjye,   
 Ibihe bidashira.

  **2**   
Nabony'inshut'ihebuje!   
Yamberey'impongano.   
Urets'ibyo kump'ubugingo,   
 Yaranyitangiriye.   
Ntacyo mfite nit'icyanjye,   
 Kuko tubisangiye.   
Ndamwiyeguriye burundu;   
Ibihe bidashira.

  **3**   
Nabony'inshut'ihebuje!   
Nyir'ubutware bwose!   
Nibw'indindish'uko bukeye;   
Izangeza mw'ijuru.   
Ibyiza byanshyizw'imbere,   
 Binsubizamw'intege;   
Reka nkore, noye kwiganda,   
 Ngez'ubw'izanduhura.

  **4**   
Nabony'incut'ihebuje!   
Y'impuhwe n'urukundo.   
Niy'indind'ikanyunganira;   
Niy'indenger'iteka.   
Mbese n'iki cyadutanya,   
 Ko dukundana rwose?   
N'iby'iyi si,   
 cyangwa s'urupfu?   
Oya nzab'uw'iteka.

title: 140 Numvise Yesu Ambwira Ati
markdown:
### 140 Numvise Yesu Ambwira Ati   

  **1**   
 Numvise Yes'ambwir'ati: Ngwino nkuruhure.   
Zan'ibikurushya byose, Mbikwikorerere.   
 Musanga, mez'uko nari ndi,   
 ndushye, mfite n'ishavu;   
Amber'uburuhukiro, Maz'aranezeza.

  **2**   
Numvise Yes'ambwir'ati: Ndaguher'ubuntu,   
 Amaz'azakubeshaho, Unyw'uram'iteka.   
Nuko nsanga Yesu maz'ampa ya mazi y'ubugingo,   
 Nshir'inyota, Ndahembuka; Nzahorana nawe.

  **3**   
Numvise Yes'ambwir'ati: Ni jye Mucyo w'isi.   
N'undeb'uramurikirwa, Ntuzarindagira.   
Maze muhanz'amaso koko, Mbon'ar'izuba ryanjye;   
Rizamvir'iminsi yose y'ubugingo bwanjye.

title: 141 Mwami Mb'Uwawe Maramaje
markdown:
### 141 Mwami Mb'Uwawe Maramaje   

  **1**   
 Mwami, mb'uwawe maramaje,   
 Nyigisha, nyigisha.   
Nkor'iby'ukunda,   
 Mwami wanjye;   
Komez'umfashe.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mb'uwawe (Mwami) ;   
Mb'uwawe (Mwami) ;   
Niyo migambi yanjye ;   
Mb'uwawe (Mwami);   
Mb'uwawe (Mwami) ;   
Mb'uwawe Mwami, None.

  **2**   
Iby'iyi si byamarir'iki,   
 Ntari kumwe nawe?   
Byose nzabihara kubwawe,   
 Ntungishwe nawe.

  **3**   
Ndets'umunezero w'iyi si,   
 Ngwino twibanire;   
Nibyo bizajya binogera,   
 Bimpumurize.

title: 142 Mbeg'Umuns'Urush'Indi Kwera
markdown:
### 142 Mbeg'Umuns'Urush'Indi Kwera   

  **1**   
 Mbeg'umuns'urush'indi kwera;   
Niwo wa karindwi!   
Ng'uratuma ndek'iby'isi,   
 Nkibwir'iby'ijuru!

  **2**   
Mbeg'uyu munsi wa karindwi,   
 Turuhukiramo,   
 Ng'uradutera kuramya Data,   
 Wo mw'ijuru! 

  **3**   
Ni mutyo turamy'Uhoraho,   
 Watuzirikanye,   
 Agaherakw'akaduha,   
 Uyu munsi wera.

  **4**   
Niw'utugobotor'ibyaha,   
 Bikaducikaho,   
 Kukw'atugirir'ubuntu,   
 Buvuye mw'ijuru.

title: 143 Udusezeresh'Umugisha Wawe
144 Mukiza, Ndamaramaje
markdown:
### 144 Mukiza, Ndamaramaje   

  **1**   
 Mukiza, ndamaramaje,   
 Ndatwaranira kugera,   
 Ku rugero runkwiriye;   
Mwami mfasha ngo ndusheho.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nzamura maze nger'aho wangeneye,   
 Mwami wanjye; Ku rugero rusumbyeho;   
Mwami mfasha ngo ndusheho.

  **2**   
Ntabwo ngifit'umutima,   
 Wo kuguma mu by'iyi si;   
N'ubwo bamwe babikunda,   
 Ngambiriye kujya mbere.

  **3**   
Ndashaka gusumb'iby'isi,   
 Nubw'umwanz'anyibasiye;   
Kuko namaze kwizera,   
 Yukw'Iman'izandengera.

  **4**   
Ndashaka kumaranira,   
 Kurabukw'ubwiza bwawe;   
Ariko nkomeze nsenge,   
 Ngez'ubwo nzager'i wawe.

title: 145 Ntushak'Urwitwazo
markdown:
### 145 Ntushak'Urwitwazo   

  **1**   
 Ntushak'urwitwazo, Harihw'imirimo,   
 Ahubw'itegure gukorer'Imana.   
Yakwinginze kenshi, Kand'ikurarika;   
Witinda kwemera, Bizakunezeza.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Itaba! (none); Ntushak'urwitwazo;   
Itaba! (none); Wigingimiranya.   
Ntushak'urwitwazo, Udasubizwa ngo:   
Hoshi wampinyuye; Nkuvukij'ubwami.

  **2**   
Ntushak'urwitwazo urahamagawe;   
Dor'aho wangiye, Noneho witabe.   
Imirim'ireze, Hagumy'abakozi;   
Ngwin'umukorere; Uzagororerwa.

  **3**   
Ntushak'urwitwazo, Kuko nib'utinze,   
 Bizagukoraho, Izakwivumbura.   
Imbabazi zayo, Ntabwo zirashira;   
Haguruka bwangu, Ubibabarirwe.

title: 146 Yesu Mwami W'Abami
markdown:
### 146 Yesu Mwami W'Abami   

  **1**   
 Yesu Mwami w'abami, Ngwin'ube muri jye!   
He kub'ari jy'uvuga, Ujy'umvugiramo.   
Unsabe mu mutima, Ngengwe nawe rwose,   
 Maz'abajya bandeba, Bajye bakubona.

  **2**   
Ndakwiyeguriy'ubu, Ez'ibyaha byanjye;   
Ngaragareh'ubwiza bwawe buhebuje.   
Ngir'umutim'utuje, Ne guteraganwa;   
Niyoroshye nganduke, Ngo nkoreshwe nawe.

  **3**   
Ingingo zanjye zose, Zijye zikumvira;   
Uzikoreshereze, Zikubahirize.
Ne kujya nivovota, Ngo mpore ku nkeke.   
Y'ibimbaho, nishama, Nta mahoro mfite.

  **4**   
Ni wowe ntegereje, Ungenz'uk'ushaka.   
Ubwanjye nditeguye, Simfit'ikinziga.   
Yesu Mwami w'abami, Ngwin'ube muri jye!   
Maz'ibyo nkora byose, Mbikoreshwe nawe.

title: 147 Data Mwiza, Nyigiza Hafi
148 Aho Njyanye Na Yesu
markdown:
### 148 Aho Njyanye Na Yesu   

  **1**   
 Aho njyanye na Yesu mb'amahoro,   
 Ahw'anyobora hose mur'iyi si.   
Aho njya tutajyanye nta kinyura,   
 Iyo njyanye na Yesu ntacyo ntinya.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Aho njyanye nawe,   
 nta kintinyisha,   
 Aho njyanye na Yesu mb'amahoro.

  **2**   
Aho njyanye na Yesu sinigunga,   
 Nubw'izindi nshuti zampemukira;   
Nubw'anyobora mu nzir'iruhije,   
 Aho njyanye na Yesu ndanezerwa.

  **3**   
Njyanye na Yesu sinatiny'urupfu,   
 N'iyo ngoswe n'umwijima w'icyago,   
 Nzi ko nzakanguk'ubutazongera,   
 Kujarajarira mur'iy'isi mbi.

title: 149 Nshuti Jy'ugendera Mu Mucyo
markdown:
### 149 Nshuti Jy'ugendera Mu Mucyo   

  **1**   
 Nshuti jy'ugendera mu mucyo,   
 Woye kurindagira;   
Umwuka Wera wo mw'ijuru,   
 Ajy'akuyobora.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
**S. na A:**   
Gendera mu mucyo,   
 Gendera mu mucyo;   
Gendera mu mucyo,   
 Mu mucyo waka w'Imana.   
 **T. na B.:**   
Gendera mu mucy'utangaje w'Imana;   
Gendera mu mucy'utangaje w'Imana;   
Gendera mu mucy'utangaje w'Imana;   
Mu mucyo waka w'Imana;

  **2**   
Gendera mu mucyo w'ukuri,   
 Ko mw'Ijambo ry'Imana;   
Uzajy'ukuyobor'iteka,   
 Ukwizez'Imana.

  **3**   
Jy'ugendera mu mucy'iteka,   
 Ujy'ukumurikira;   
Maz'utamurur'umwijima,   
 Hose hatangaze.

  **4**   
Gendera mu mucyo ng'umenye,   
 Urukundo rw'Imana,   
 N'uburyo yakunze ab'isi,   
 Ikabarokora.

title: 150 Mbes'Abasaruzi Bari He?
markdown:
### 150 Mbes'Abasaruzi Bari He?   

  **1**   
 Mbes'abasaruzi bari hehe,   
 Bo gusarur'abakiranutsi?   
Babangir'ukurink'imihoro,   
 Kandi ntibab'ar'abanyabute.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Abasaruzi se bari he?   
Ngo bafatanye natwe gusarura,   
 Maze twishime, Turi kumwe,   
 Isarura nirirangira.

  **2**   
Mushakire mu mihana yose;   
Nubw'urwiri rwarenga ku ngano;   
Muzishake kuko zirurimo,   
 Zose muzisarurir'Imana.

  **3**   
Dor'imirima yereye rimwe,   
 Kandi bose bitez'isarura;   
Arikw'abasaruzi ni bake,   
 Umurimo wab'urabasaze.

  **4**   
Mwa bantu mwe, Mwahur'imihoro!   
Musarur'igihe kirageze!   
Mushishikare Umwam'araje;   
Dor'abazaniy'ingororano!

title: 151 Ngamij'Iby'Igihugu Cy'Igikundiro
markdown:
### 151 Ngamij'Iby'Igihugu Cy'Igikundiro   

  **1**   
 Ngamij'iby'igihugu cy'igikundiro;   
Nzageray'izuba rirenze.   
Ariko s'ikamba Yes'azamperayo,   
 Azaritakahw'inyenyeri?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbes'ikamba ryanjye Yes'azamperayo,   
 Azaritakahw'inyenyeri (inyenyeri)?   
Ningir'amahirwe, Nkabana na Yesu,   
 Azaritakahw'inyenyeri (inyenyeri)?

  **2**   
Reka nkore, nsenge, mbiheshejwe nawe,   
 Mugarurir'abazimiye.   
N'agaruka kuri wa munsi w'ubwiza,   
 Nzatakwehw'inyenyeri nyinshi.

  **3**   
Mbeg'umunezer'uhebuje nzagira,   
 Nimwerek'abo nakijije,   
 Mfite n'ibyishimo bitavugwa,   
 Mbonye inyenyeri kw'ikamba ryanjye.

title: 152 Ngwino Yesu
markdown:
### 152 Ngwino Yesu   

  **1**   
 Ngwino Yes'uvugane, N'umutima wanjye:   
 Maz'umpumuriz'uti: Ntabwo nagusize.   
Nyugurur'umutima, Nihutire kumva,   
 Ijwi ryawe ry'impuhwe, Nyuzuz'ibyishimo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbwiz'ijwi ryongorera, Mbwiran'urukundo;   
Ut'uzanesh'iteka, Ub'umudendezo.   
Vugana nanjy'iteka, Mbwir'ubudahwema,
 Reka numv'uk'umbwira ngo: Sinaguhanye.

  **2**   
Yobora abana bawe, Uvugane nabo;   
Ubuzuz'ibyishimo, Bige kugusenga.   
Mwami, Bitange rwose, Bakwiyegurire;   
Tebuts'ubwami bwawe, Twibanire nawe.

  **3**   
Ngwin'uvugane natwe, Uduhishurire,   
Iby'imigambi yawe, N'inshingano yacu,   
 Duhe kuguhimbaza, Tukubahirize,   
 Tujye tunezererwa gukor'iby'ushaka.

title: 153 Mwami, Sinsabir'Iby'Ejo
154 Murinzi We, Ngaho Mbwira
markdown:
### 154 Murinzi We, Ngaho Mbwira   

  **1**   
 Murinzi we, ngaho mbwira,   
 Mbese bugiye gucya?   
Nta bimenyets'urabona,   
 K'Umwami yegereje?   
Mugenzi we haguruka!   
Umusek'uratambitse;   
Tyo kenyera, maz'ukeshe,   
 Haguruka; bwakeye!

  **2**   
Murinzi we, dor'umucyo,   
 Ukomeje gukwira!   
Reba naw'ibimenyetso,   
 Bitangaza kuza kwe.   
Ubw'impanda zizavuga,   
 Abapfuye bazazuka.   
Ubutazongera gupfa,   
 Bibanire n'Umwami.

  **3**   
Murinzi we, vuz'impundu,   
 Igihe kirageze!   
Mwese nimurangurure,   
 Mubyamamaze hose.   
Mugenzi we, nawe reba;   
Ubwami bugeze hafi;   
Ngiriya Yerusalemu,   
 Irarabagirana.

  **4**   
Murinzi, mur'uwo murwa,   
 W'igikundiro rwose,   
 Nih'Umwami w'i Sioni,   
 Adutegerereje.   
Ubwami bwe buragutse,   
 Buhetuy'iyi si yose;   
N'ubwami budahanguka;   
Hahirw'ababujyamo.

  **5**   
Murinzi dor'igihugu,   
 Cy'uburumbuke cyane,   
 Gihora kimeze neza,   
 Nka Edeni ya kera.   
Gira bwangu ntuzarire,   
 Hasigay'igihe gito,   
 Abacungujw'amaraso   
 bakagerayo vuba.

title: 155 Aho Nzahamagarwa Hose
markdown:
### 155 Aho Nzahamagarwa Hose   

  **1**   
 Aho nzahamagarwa hose,   
 Ari no mu misozi,   
 Cyangwa ku rugamba rukaze,   
 Mubyeyi, n'unkenera,   
 Ukambwiz'ijwi ryawe ritoya,   
 Ukannyuz'inzira ntazi,   
 Nzakwishyira mu maboko,   
 mvuge nti: Nzajy'ah'unshakira hose.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nzajy'ah'unshakira hose, Mwami;   
Mu misozi no mu bibaya.   
Nzavug'iby'ushaka ko mvuga Mwami,   
 Kandi nzaba nk'uk'ushaka.

  **2**   
Ahari Yes'ashaka yuko muvugir'uyu munsi;   
Ahari habonek'impabe, Nkwiriye guhabura;   
Murokozi wanjye, N'unyobora,   
 N'ahar'ibihanamanga;   
Sinzareka kogez'inkuru yawe;   
Nzajy'ah'unshakira hose.

  **3**   
Ntabwo nshidikanya,   
 Har'aho Mwam'ushaka ko nkora,   
 Mu kubaho kwanjye kugufi,   
 Nkorer'Uwambambiwe.   
Mwami, Nkubikij'ibyanjye byose,   
 Nzi k'unkunda bitangaje.   
Nzakor'iby'ushaka,   
 mbikunze cyane;   
Nzajy'ah'unshakira hose.

title: 156 Amagambo Y'Umujinya
markdown:
### 156 Amagambo Y'Umujinya   

  **1**   
 Amagambo y'umujinya, Ntakabave mu kanwa!   
Ahubw'umutim'uyacuby'atararushy'asohoka.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Mukundane rwose; Yes'aravug'ati:   
 Ngir'itegeko ryanjye mbahaye:   
 Mukundane rwose, Yes'aravug'ati:   
 Bana banjye, mukundane.   
 **B.na T.:**   
 Mukundane, Mukundane;   
Ngir'itegeko ryanjye:   
 Mukundane, Mukundane;   
n'itegeko rye.

  **2**   
Urukundo n'imbonera, N'ubucuti, birera;   
Byab'ishyano kubyicisha, Ubupfu bw'akanya gato.

  **3**   
Amagambo y'intonganya, Ntaregama mu kanwa,   
Ijambo rimwe ry'intonganya, Ritandukany'inshuti.

title: 157 N'Igihe Cy'Isarura
markdown:
### 157 N'Igihe Cy'Isarura   

  **1**   
 Nib'umunt'agend'arira,   
 Asohoy'imbuto nziza,   
 Ntacogora ngw'agw'isari,   
 Ahirwa n'Uwiteka.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yemwe ga ngo zirakura!   
Reba uko zingana!   
Imirima yos'ireze,   
 N'igihe cy'isarura.

  **2**   
Ikime kiva mw'ijuru,   
 N'umucy'urabagirana.   
Bizatum'imbuto zera,   
 Kubw'ubuntu bw'Imana.

  **3**   
Bib'imbuto wicogora,   
 Woye gukuk'umutima,   
 N'ubw'iby'ubon'ar'umwaku,   
 Uzasarur'ishimwe.

title: 158 Isarura Ry'Isi Riregereje
markdown:
### 158 Isarura Ry'Isi Riregereje   

  **1**   
 Isarura ry'isi riregereje,   
 Yes'arahamagar'abasaruzi.   
Dor'imirim'irez'ahantu hose,   
 Nimuzan'imihoro musarure!

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S.:**   
 Mugire bwangu, muhunik'imiba;   
Mugire bwangu, nimuze.   
 **A.T.B.:**   
 Mugire bwangu mwese;   
 Nimuze muhunik'imiba ye.   
 Nimuze mugire bwangu mwese;   
 Nimuze mwese nimuze.

  **2**   
Uwo muns'utazabamw'amarira,   
 Uhora wegerej'uko bukeye.   
Imyaka yararitswe n'umuyaga,   
 Mugire bwangw'imvur'itarahanguka.

  **3**   
Urukundo ni nk'isokw'idakama,   
 Ituruka mw'ijuru ku Muremyi;   
Nirwo ruturarikira gukora,   
 Rukadukomeza ntitugw'isari.

title: 159 Nyabun'Uburyo Ngukennye!
markdown:
### 159 Nyabun'Uburyo Ngukennye!   

  **1**   
 Nyabun'uburyo ngukennye!   
Nd'umukene n'impumyi;   
Mfat'ukubok'unyobore,   
 Ni wow'ump'imbaraga.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ku manywa na n'ijoro;   
Mwami ndagushak'iteka;   
Ku manywa na n'ijoro;   
Mwam'unyikomereze.

  **2**   
Nyambik'urukundo rwawe,   
 Nahindanye nd'intebyi.   
Ubu mfit'intege nkeya,   
 Nyongeramw'imbaraga.

  **3**   
Nzab'amahor'unyoboye,   
 Sinakwiyiringira.   
Yes'ujy'ungend'i ruhande,   
 Kuk'undutira byose.

  **4**   
Nubw'ibind'imbere byose,   
 Byankoma mu nkokora,   
 Nzakomeza komatana nawe,   
 Mwana w'Imana.

title: 160 Icyampa Nkab'Uwawe
markdown:
### 160 Icyampa Nkab'Uwawe   

  **1**   
 Icyampa nkab'uwawe, Yesu Mwami wanjye;   
Ne kononwa n'iby'isi, Nkwikurikirire.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Icyampa nkab'uwawe, Nitanze maramaje.   
Jye ntacyo maze, Ntacyo,   
Ntacyo; Niwe mpay'ikuzo.

  **2**   
Icyampa nkab'uwawe, Yesu Mwami wanjye.   
Nkoresh'uk'ushaka, Njye nkubahiriza.

  **3**   
Icyampa nkab'uwawe, Yesu Mwami wanjye;   
Ntandukanya n'iby'isi, Umboneze rwose.

  **4**   
Icyampa nkab'uwawe, Yesu Mwami wanjye;   
Mb'uwaw'uko ndi kose, Nta kintu kinziga.

title: 161 Mfit'Inshuti Y'Ukuri
markdown:
### 161 Mfit'Inshuti Y'Ukuri   

  **1**   
 Mfit'inshuti y'ukuri y'inkoramutima,   
 Irankunda bihebuje, Nzi kw'itazampana.   
Ntabwo nayiv'iruhande, Nkunda ko tubana,   
 Iyo nshuti ni Yesu, Umukiza.

  **2**   
Iyo nguy'agacuho, Ameny'uko meze;   
Ntanyirengagiza rwose: Aransindagiza,   
 Akanyobora mu nzira, Yo gukiranuka;   
N'inshuti nkunda cyane, Yes'Umwami.

  **3**   
Mutur'umubabaro, Mubwir'ibyishimo;   
Mubwir'ibinnyura nabyo, N'ibindushya byose.   
Angaragariz'uburyo, Nkwiriye kwifata;   
Nkunda kwiganirira, Naw'iteka.

  **4**   
Az'imigambi yanjye, Yo gukiz'abandi;   
Niko kunshing'umurimo, Wo kumuvugira,   
 No kwamamaz'urukundo, Rwatumy'adupfira:   
Yewe, mukunda rwose, Bihebuje.

title: 162 Umukiz'Aranyobora
163 Yes'Arahamagar'Ati:
markdown:
### 163 Yes'Arahamagar'Ati:   

  **1**   
 Yes'arahamagar'ati: Nind'unkorera none?   
Isarura rirageze, Nind'uribusarure?   
Umv'ukw'aduhamagara; Kand'azagororera.   
Umusubiza wes'ati: Ndi hano Mwami ntuma.

  **2**   
N'utabasha kujya kure, Ngo wambuke n'inyanja;   
N'ino har'abapagani, Wagarurira Yesu.   
N'utabasha gushyanuka, Ngo wigishe nka Paulo,   
 Wakogez'iby'urukundo rw'Umukiza wabambwe.

  **3**   
Wabura kub'umurinzi, Ku nkike z'i Siyoni,   
 Wafashish'amasengesho, No gutur'amaturo;   
Ukayobora n'abandi, Mu nzir'ijya mw'ijuru,   
 Nk'ukw'Aroni yakomeje amaboko ya Mose.

  **4**   
Abantu bari mu kaga; Yes'aragutabaza.   
Ntukagir'ubw'uvug'uti: Ntacyo nakora rwose.   
Ishimire gukoreshwa, Hitam'umurimo we;   
Maz'usubize bwang'uti: Ndi hano, Mwami ntuma.

title: 164 Nicay'Imbere Ya Yesu
165 Ndagukunda, Mwami
markdown:
### 165 Ndagukunda, Mwami   

  **1**   
 Ndagukunda, Mwami; Uzi ko ngukunda;   
Ndagukunda Yesu, Bihebuje rwose.   
Ndagukunda Yesu, Naw'urabizi;   
Imirimo yanjy'izabyerekana.

  **2**   
Nishimye, Nishimye; Rwose bitavugwa.   
Ibyishimo byanjye, Nta wabirondora.   
Ndareb'ubutunzi buri mw'ijuru,   
 Nzagabirwa nawe kubw'ubuntu bwawe.

  **3**   
Yesu Mwami wanjye, Niwe nkesha byose;   
Ar'ugucungurwa, Ari n'ubugingo.   
Nzakogez'iteka, Nkuririmbire,   
 Kuk'ubuntu bwawe bwandemy'umutima.

  **4**   
Naguhwanya nande, Mucunguzi wanjye?   
Uhoran'ineza, Ntugir'impinduka.   
Nzajya nguhimbaza, Nkubahirize;   
Umutima wanjye Wuzuy'ibyishimo.

title: 166 Ayi Rutare Rw'Imana
markdown:
### 166 Ayi Rutare Rw'Imana   

  **1**   
 Ayi Rutare rw'Imana, Reka nguhungiraho!   
Kubw'imbabazi zawe, Kera waramenewe,   
 Non'ubu nkwihishemo, Umujinya w'Imana.

  **2**   
Ibyo twakora byose, N'umwete wacu wose,   
 N'agahinda gasaze, N'amarir'adashira,   
 Byose ntibyashobora, Kudukurahw'ibyaha.

  **3**   
Yes'ibyo mfite byose, Nta mumaro bigira.   
Sinabasha kwikiza, Ndagushakah'ubuntu,   
 Unyuhagir'imbyiro, Mutabazi ne gupfa.

  **4**   
Nuko nkiri muzima, Mwami, nguhungireho.   
No ku munsi w'imanza, Ninger'imbere yawe,   
 Ayi Rutare rw'Imana, Uzandeke nkwisunge!

title: 167 Mwa Bera B'Umwami
markdown:
### 167 Mwa Bera B'Umwami   

  **1**   
 Mwa bera b'Umwami, Mwishimir'Ijambo rye;   
Niryo rufatiro rwo kwizera kwanyu.   
Dore, yababwiye byose; Ntacyo yabahishe.   
Ntitwabasha kongera kur'iryo jambo ryiza,   
 Cyangwa kuritubya, Kukw'ar'iry'Imana.

  **2**   
N'ugera mu kaga, Yesu yasezeranye,   
 Kw'azakugoboka, Akakurengera;   
Amakuba yawe yos'akuber'umugisha;   
Niy'azakweza rwose, Maz'atum'ushikama;   
Niy'azakweza rwose, Agukomeze.

  **3**   
Ibigeragezo nibikugwa gitumo,   
 Ubuntu bwanjye buzaba buhagije.   
Ibirimi by'umuriro, Ntibigutinyishe;   
Bizakongor'ibyaha, Usigar'utunganye;   
Bizakongor'ibyaha, Bikuboneze.

  **4**   
Unamba ku Mana, Ntizamuhemukira;   
Ntizamuharir'umubisha na hato.   
N'ubw'ingabo zose z'umwanzi zamusatira,   
 Ntizamuhemukira, Ntizamuhemukira,   
 Ntizamuhemukira, Haba na gato.

title: 168 Uwiteka Niwe Mwungeri Wanjye
169 Wa Muragwa We!
170 Mwami Mana Yanjye
171 Murinzi We W'i Siyoni
markdown:
### 171 Murinzi We W'i Siyoni   

  **1**   
 Murinzi we, w'i Sioni, Ijoro rigeze he?   
Mbes'umusek'uri hafi? Ntiburatandukana?   
Ntacy'ushishoz'i burasira-zuba?   
Ntacy'ushishoz'i burasira-zuba?

  **2**   
Nyamuneka tumenyeshe, K'urugendo rushize;   
Mbese tugeze ku cyambu, Tugiye kugerayo?   
Mbese koko, ubwami buri hafi?   
Mbese koko, ubwami buri hafi? 

  **3**   
Burakey'umuns'uraje! Tubyamamaze hose;   
Dor'izuba rirarashe, Mwese nimurirebe!   
Mwa bera mwe, Mugiye gucungurwa!  
Mwa bera mwe, Mugiye gucungurwa! 

  **4**   
Tugeze ku rugabano, Rw'igihugu tujyamo,   
 Nimukabuze twihute, Icyambu kiri hafi.   
Nimurangurure ya majwi yanyu!   
Nimurangurure ya majwi yanyu!

title: 172 Ngabo, Muhaguruke!
markdown:
### 172 Ngabo, Muhaguruke!   

  **1**   
 Ngabo, muhaguruke! Murwanire Yesu;   
Murind'ingabe yanyu, Mutazayinyagwa.   
Mu nzira yo kunesha, Tuyoborwa na Yesu,   
 Tujyane naw'iteka, Niho tuzanesha.

  **2**   
Impanda ziravuze, Muze mwebwe mwese.   
Ikamba ry'ubugingo, N'ibihembo byanyu.   
Nimwangwa n'ababisha, Mukomere, murwane;   
Mwonger'umwete mwinshi, Muganze Satani.

  **3**   
Mubyuke, mutabare, Mudashidikanya.   
He kugir'umw'usiba, murebe kwa Yesu.   
Kandi mujye mutwara, Intwaro zo kwizera.   
Muhabwe ukunesha, N'ibyishimo byinshi.

  **4**   
Mubyuke vuba vuba, Murwane iteka,   
 Mwizer'izina ryera, Niho muzanesha;   
Maz'izo ntwaro zose, Muzih'Umwami Yesu,   
 Muzabon'amahoro y'iteka mw'ijuru.

title: 173 Icyampa Nkizera
174 Hahirw'Ufit'Ibyiringiro
markdown:
### 174 Hahirw'Ufit'Ibyiringiro   

  **1**   
 Hahirw'ufit'ibyiringiro bishyitse,   
 Akiri mu miruho y'iyi si;   
Bimukomez'agatsind'ibishuko by'umwanzi.   
Bimukomez'agatsinda ibishuko n'amakuba menshi.

  **2**   
Nibyo bitwibuts'iby'uburuhukiro,   
 Ahw'abakiranutsi bazaba;   
Bakibanira n'inshut'ubudatandukana.   
Bakibanira n'inshuti ntibatandukane.

  **3**   
N'igihugu kitazarangwamw'icyaha;   
Ahw'ibishuko bitazagera;   
Ni nahw'ibyishimo bitazagir'impinduka.   
Nihw'ibyishimo bitazongera kugira kirogoya.

  **4**   
Nta n'umw'uzahabogorez'amarira;   
Ntabw'urupfu ruzahahangara;   
Abaturage baho baziberahw'iteka.   
Abaturage baho bazamera nk'abamarayika.

  **5**   
Icyaduh'igihe kikihuta bwangu!   
Tukabon'Umukiza wac'aje,   
 Akatujyana muri cya gihugu cy'ibyiza.   
Akatugez'aho tuzibanira n'Umukiza wacu.

title: 175 Nyagasani, Turakwiragije
176 Ibyiringiro Dufite
markdown:
### 176 Ibyiringiro Dufite   

  **1**   
 Ibyiringiro dufite bigir'agaciro cyane;   
Kurut'iby'iyi si by'imburamumaro,   
 Bijya bishimisha benshi.

  **2**   
Twabony'umucy'utangaje,   
 Utamurur'umwijima,   
 Wazanywe n'uk'urupfu rwiganzuy'isi,   
 None twaretse kwiheba.

  **3**   
Twumvis'ijwi ry'ihumure,   
 Rinyur'imitima yacu;   
Ridutinyura rwose, rikatwizeza,   
 Yukw'Iman'ar'urukundo.

  **4**   
Iryo jwi n'irya Rurema,   
 Uwo mucyo n'Ijambo rye;   
Ibyo byiringiro n'ukuragw'ijuru,   
 Ntitwongere gupf'ukundi.

title: 177 Mu Gihugu Cy'Ibyiza
markdown:
### 177 Mu Gihugu Cy'Ibyiza   

  **1**   
 Mu gihugu cy'ibyiza, Har'umurwa wera;   
Uzahorahw'iteka: Nta joro rihaba.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S:**   
 Nta marir'azabayo,   
 Nta rupfu cyangw'ubwoba;   
Ibihe ntibibarwayo,   
 Kuko ntabwo bwira.   
 **A., T. na B.:**   
 Nta marir'azabayo,   
 Nta rupfu cyangw'ubwoba;   
Ibihe ibihe ntibibarwayo,   
 Kuko ntabwo bwira.

  **2**   
Inkike z'uwo murwa,   
 Zose n'izahabu;   
N'inzira nazo nuko;   
Nta joro rihaba.

   **3.**   
 Kand'amarembo yawo,   
 Ntabwo yugarirwa;   
Uruzi rw'ubugingo,   
 Ruzawutembamo.

  **4**   
Ntuzagomba kuvirwa,   
 N'izuba n'ukwezi;   
Kand'Umwana w'Intama,   
 Niwe mucyo wawo.

title: 178 Ahar'Azaza Umusek'Utambitse
markdown:
### 178 Ahar'Azaza Umusek'Utambitse   

  **1**   
 Ahar'azaza, umusek'utambitse,   
 Igih'umucy'utamurur'umwijima;   
Azany'icyubahiro kitarondorwa,   
 Aje kurokor'intore ze.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Tuzageza ryari,   
 Mwami tugutegereje?   
 Urakaza, Haleluya,   
 Haleluy'amina!   
Haleluy'amina!

  **2**   
Ahar'azaza, nko ku manywa y'ihangu;   
Cyangwa s'azaza mu gicuku hagati;   
Umucy'usab'impande zose z'iyi si,   
 Aje kurokor'intore ze.

  **3**   
Mbeg'ibyishimo, N'asanga tukiriho!   
Tutarwaye, Tutaririwe twapfuye;   
Maz'akadutumbagirana mu bicu,   
 Aje kurokor'intore ze.

title: 179 Mbes'Uzaba Witeguye
markdown:
### 179 Mbes'Uzaba Witeguye   

  **1**   
 Mbes'uzaba witeguye, Yes'aje, Yes'aje?   
Mbes'uzaba witeguye, Yes'aje, Yes'aje?   
Dore araje! Dore araje!   
Itegure, dor'Umukw'araje!

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Dore, Umukwe araje, Araje!   
Dore, Umukwe araje, Araje!   
Dore araje! Dore araje!   
Itegure, Dor'Umukw'araje!

  **2**   
Muringaniz'amatara, Araje, Araje!   
Muringaniz'amatara, Araje, Araje!   
Dore araje! Dore araje!   
Itegure, Dor'Umukw'araje! 

  **3**   
Mutyo, tumusanganire, Araje, Araje!   
Mutyo, tumusanganire, Araje, Araje!   
Araje koko! Araje koko!   
Itegure, Dor'Umukw'araje! 

  **4**   
Turirimbe: Haleluya; Araje, Araje!   
Turirimbe: Haleluya; Araje, Araje!   
Araje koko! Araje koko!   
Turirimbe: Haleluy'araje!

title: 180 Ntituz'Umunsi
markdown:
### 180 Ntituz'Umunsi   

  **1**   
 Ntituz'umunsi Yesu azagaruka,   
 Arikw'igihe, cyo kiri hafi cyane,   
 Ibimenyetso byagaragaye byose,   
 N'umunsi tutazi.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Azaza (azaza), duhore twiteguye.   
 Azaza (azaza), Haleluya! Haleluya!   
 Azaza ku bicu, Afit'ubwiza bwa Se,   
 N'umunsi tutazi.

  **2**   
Abitondera, igitabo cy'Imana,   
 Ukuri kwayo, nimwo bakubonera,   
 Ibyahanuwe bitangaza kuza kwe,   
 N'umunsi tutazi.

  **3**   
Imuri zacu ntizigahweme kwaka,   
 Tujye dukora, dutegerej'Umwami,   
 Tumuhimbaze, twe kujya   
 turambirwa, N'umunsi tutazi.

title: 181 Ntituz'Igihe Azazira
markdown:
### 181 Ntituz'Igihe Azazira   

  **1**   
 Ntituz'igihe azazira, Ku manywa cyangwa n'ijoro;   
Ahar'azaza bugorobye, Cyangw'umusek'utambitse.   
Aratwihanangiririza kuba mas'iteka ryose;   
Kugira ng'ubw'azatunguka, Azasange twiteguye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Tumwitegure, Tumwitegure,   
 Tumwitegure; Dore, Turamwiteguye.

  **2**   
Ndibuk'uburyo yadukunze, Akaduharira byose;   
Yasiz'ubwiza bwe mw'ijuru, Yitangira kudupfira.   
Azanezerwa n'agaruka, Kujyan'abo yacunguye,   
 Nib'azasanga bari maso, Bamaze kumwitegura.

  **3**   
Ayi Yesu Mwana w'Imana, Dor'uz'ibyo ndangamiye;   
Nizigiye ko nzakubona, Nkurebesh'amaso yanjye;   
N'ubwo bamwe bazaguhunga, Babony'igitsure cyawe,   
 Jye, nzakuramutsa nk'inshuti; N'ubu ndagutegereje.

title: 182 Umunsi W'Ihumur'Uregereje
markdown:
### 182 Umunsi W'Ihumur'Uregereje   

  **1**   
 Umunsi w'ihumur'uregereje; Yes'azazaho.   
Nibw'azajyan'abana be bizeye, Bigir'i wabo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Umusek'utangiye gutambika,   
 Weyuyeh'umwijima!   
 Umusek'utangiye gutambika,   
 Bugiye gucya!

  **2**   
Ubutumwa bwiza nibuhetura iyi si yacu,   
 Umwam'azashok'aza bidatinze, Atujyan'iwe.

  **3**   
N'az'ashagawe n'abamarayika batabarika,   
 Azatsembahw'ibihumanya byose; Ntabw'azasobwa.

  **4**   
Abazaba baratandukanijwe, Bazabonana;   
Be kongera kubogoz'amarira, Bagubwe neza.

title: 183 Yesu Yadusezeraniy'Ati:
184 Mwese, Nimuvuz'Impundu
markdown:
### 184 Mwese, Nimuvuz'Impundu   

  **1**   
 Mwese, nimuvuz'impundu! Dor'Umwam'araje!   
Mwitegure mwiboneze, Musangwe mwinonosoye.   
Isi yos'iririmbe (isi yos'iririmbe)!   
Isi yose niririmbe (yose niririmbe)!   
Nawe juru, wishim'uririmbe cyane!

  **2**   
Mwese, nimuvuz'impundu! Dor'Umwam'araje!   
Azim'ingom'ihoraho, Ntabw'izahanguka rwose.   
Muvuz'ijwi ry'impundu (vuz'ijwi ry'impundu),   
 Nimuvuz'ijwi ry'impundu (vuz'ijwi ry'impundu),   
 Nimwishime mwese muririmbe cyane.

  **3**   
Azanatsembahw'icyaha, Is'igubwe neza;   
Imibabar'izashira, Habehw'amahoro masa,   
 Nta mivum'izabayo (Nta mivum'izabayo),   
 Ntabwo hazab'imivumo (Ntabwo hazab'imivumo),   
 Ntayo rwose, Nta mivum'izarangwayo.

  **4**   
Azategekesh'ubuntu no gukiranuka;   
Ngw'ab'isi bose bamenye, K'Uwitek'agira neza,   
 Urukundo rwe rwinshi (urukundo rwe rwinshi),   
 Urukundo rutangaje (urukundo rutangaje),   
 Urukundo rwe rwinshi rurahebuje.

title: 185 Mbese Ko Tujya Tuvuga
markdown:
### 185 Mbese Ko Tujya Tuvuga   

  **1**   
 Mbese, Ko tujya tuvuga, Iby'igihugu cy'ihirwe;   
Tukogez'ubwiza bwaho; Kubayo bizacur'iki?   
Ko tuvug'inzira zaho, Zasizw'izahabu nziza;   
Ar'ukugenekereza; Tugezeyo, hacur'iki?

  **2**   
Ko tuvug'uko hameze, Kw'ari nta byaha n'urupfu,   
 Cyangw'ibishuko bibayo, Tugezeyo hacur'iki?   
Ko tuvug'iby'urukundo, N'ibishura bizambarwa,   
 Tukabyishimira cyane; Kubayo bizacur'iki? 

  **3**   
Tuvuga n'iby'igitondo, Kizaba gitamanzuye,   
 Tukazabona wa murwa, Umanuk'urimbishijwe.   
Umurw'urabagirana, Utarangwamw'agahinda,   
 Ntubemo n'imibabaro, Har'umunezero gusa.

  **4**   
N'ubwo ngoswe n'ibishuko, Ntunganiriza kujyayo;   
Ngo nanjye njye niyumvamo, Uko kubayo byamera;   
Nibwo tuzatambagira, Icyo gihugu cy'ihirwe,   
 Hamwe n'abamarayika, Na Yes'Umukiza wacu.

title: 186 Data Mwiza Tugarutse Kugushengerera
187 Mwam'Ubwo Tukigushengereye
markdown:
### 187 Mwam'Ubwo Tukigushengereye   

  **1**   
 Mwam'ubwo tukigushengereye,   
 Tukuririmbirir'icya rimwe   
 Iyi ndirimbo yac'iheruka,   
 Twicishije bugufi, duhire.

  **2**   
Mwami dusezerer'amahoro;   
Duherekeze, tujyane nawe;   
Turindir'iminwa n'imitima,   
 Ngo yoye kujy'igukoz'isoni.

  **3**   
Amahoro yaw'abane natwe;   
Ab'ari y'ajy'aduh'ihumure.   
Maze n'uturuhur'imiruho,   
 Tuzongere kuyabon'i wawe.

title: 188 N'Ubwo Nsazwe N'Ibyaha
markdown:
### 188 N'Ubwo Nsazwe N'Ibyaha   

  **1**   
 N'ubwo nsazwe n'ibyaha, Yesu yarankijije,   
 Yamviriy'amaraso, Angura n'urupf'atyo.   
Tuzab'akaramata, Ak'ishami n'igiti.

  **2**   
Urukundo rwa Yesu, Rusaguts'ikirere.   
Ntacyo twarugeraho, Ruzagumahw'iteka;   
Niwe warumbwirije, Jye ntabwo nari nduzi.

  **3**   
N'ubwo nsazwe n'ibyaha, Yes'andutira byose;   
Az'ibyo nkennye byose, Ankiz'umubabaro.   
Namuberey'imbata, Nta cyago cyampangara.

title: 189 Twabuze Gakondo Mur'Iyi Si
markdown:
### 189 Twabuze Gakondo Mur'Iyi Si   

  **1**   
 Twabuze gakondo mur'iyi si;   
Tuyirimo tur'abasuhuke;   
Arikw'ikitunezeza,   
 Nuko dushaka gakondo,   
 Irushaho kuba nziza.

  **2**   
Twabuze gakondo mur'iyi si;   
Tugamij'iy'iwacu mw'ijuru;   
Niyo Siyon'ihoraho,   
 Ifit'umucy'udashira,   
 Ihor'irabagirana.

  **3**   
Mbeg'uburyo tuzanezererwa;   
Ahw'abagenzi bat'umuruho.   
Icyamp'amababa none,   
 Nkaguruka, Nkigirayo,   
 Nkibanira nawe, Mwami.

  **4**   
Mutima wanjye, reka kuganya!   
 Dor'igih'Imana yangeneye,   
 Nicyo cyiza, nicyo cyiza;   
Njye nkomeza kwiringira,   
 Ngez'ubw'izampamagara.

title: 190 Mw'Ijuru No Mw'Isi Yose
markdown:
### 190 Mw'Ijuru No Mw'Isi Yose   

  **1**   
 Mw'ijuru no mw'isi yose,   
 Nta zina nk'irya Yesu;   
Ntaryo nkunda ku mutima,   
 Nk'iry'uwaducunguye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
N'izina (n'izina) rya Yesu (rya Yesu),   
 Niryo ritwiringiza; N'izina (n'izina),   
 Ry'Umukiza, Riduhesh'amahirwe.

  **2**   
Nihagir'umunt'ushimwa,   
 Akarutishw'abandi,   
 N'abarush'icyubahiro,   
 Yes'aramuhebuza.

  **3**   
Abamarayika bose,   
 Bitw'amazina meza,   
 Ariko nta zina ryabo,   
 Ribasha kunnezeza.

  **4**   
Yes'ankiz'ibyago byose,   
 Kandi niw'unkomeza;   
N'iyo nagiz'intege nke,   
 Anyonger'imbaraga.

title: 191 Ngiz'Amahirwe Nd'Uwa Yesu
192 Reba Yesu Ku Musaraba
193 Mbes'Urumv'Ushaka Gutunganira Yesu?
markdown:
### 193 Mbes'Urumv'Ushaka Gutunganira Yesu?   

  **1**   
 Mbes'urumv'ushaka gutunganira Yesu?   
Ng'ugendane nawe mu nzira ntoya?   
Akwikorerer'imitwaro yawe yose ?   
Emer'ugengwe nawe.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Azagutungany'akuboneze,   
 Amaraso y'akwezehw'ibyaha,   
 Akuzuz'urukundo rwe rwinshi;   
Niwemera kujy'ugengwa nawe.

  **2**   
Mbes'urashaka kw'akubatura mu byaha?   
Ngw'aguh'amahoro yo mu mutima?   
Ajy'akuramira, we guhor'ugwaguza?   
Emer'ugengwe nawe.

  **3**   
Mbes'urashaka kugabana ku bugingo?   
Ngo wibere mu bwami bwo mw'ijuru?   
Urashaka kumaramaza muri byose?   
Emer'ugengwe nawe.

title: 194 I Muhira Hahirwa
markdown:
### 194 I Muhira Hahirwa   

  **1**   
 I muhira hahirwa, Har'urukundo;   
Byose bib'amahoro, Har'urukundo.   
Ntihab'impagarara, N'urutoto n'inkeke;   
Hab'ibyishimo gusa, Har'urukundo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ineza mu rugo,   
 Niy'izan'ibyishimo,   
 Har'urukundo.

  **2**   
Ivundi ryanezeza, har'urukundo;   
Ntihaba kirogoya, Har'urukundo,   
 Ibiri mu nzu byose byahinduk'inyamibwa,   
 Hab'ibyishimo gusa, Har'urukundo.

  **3**   
Yes'akunda kuhaba, Har'urukundo;   
Isi yos'irishima, Har'urukundo.   
Isanzure ry'ijuru, Ryuzur'umucyo waka,   
 N'Iman'ikamwenyura, Har'urukundo.

title: 195 Icyamp'Umuriro Waka
markdown:
### 195 Icyamp'Umuriro Waka   

  **1**   
 Icyamp'umuriro waka,   
 Wajyag'urabagiranira.   
Mu bera ba kera bose,   
 Ukabagir'intwari z'Imana.

  **2**   
Mwam'icyampa wa mutima,   
 Aburahamu yahoranye;   
Wari no muri Pawulo,   
 Ukamutera kwiyumanganya.

  **3**   
Ntukiban'intore zawe,   
 Nk'uko wabanye na Eliya?   
Ugahumuriza Yobu,   
 Ageze mu kaga katavugwa.

  **4**   
Ibuka, Mwam'aba kera,   
 Uko wabagendereraga;   
Ab'arik'ujy'utugenza,   
 Utwuzuz'Umwuka wawe wera.

title: 196 Mbes'Urashaka Kunesh'Ibyaha?
markdown:
### 196 Mbes'Urashaka Kunesh'Ibyaha?   

  **1**   
 Mbes'urashaka kunesh'ibyaha?   
Izer'amaraso ya Yesu.   
Mbes'urashaka kumeny'intsinzi?   
N'amaraso y'Umukiza.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Har'imbaraga mu maraso,   
 Y'Umwana w'Intama;   
Har'imbaraga mu maraso,   
 Ya Yes'Umwana w'Imana.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Koko har'imbaraga mu maraso;   
Y'Umwana w'Intama;   
Koko har'imbaraga mu maraso,   
 Ya Yes'Umwana w'Imana.

  **2**   
S'urashaka gukir'ubwibone?   
Izer'amaraso ya Yesu;   
Ngwin'umusange ku musaraba,   
 Akwejesh'amaraso ye.

  **3**   
Mbes'urashaka kujya wera de?   
Izer'amaraso ya Yesu.   
Icyakwez'ibizinga by'ibyaha,   
 N'amaraso y'Umukiza.

  **4**   
Urashaka gukorera Yesu?   
Izer'amaraso y'akiza.   
Urashaka kujy'umusingiza?   
Izere ya maraso ye.

title: 197 Yesu N'Az'Umwijim'Uzahunga
markdown:
### 197 Yesu N'Az'Umwijim'Uzahunga   

  **1**   
 Yesu naz'umwijim'uzahunga,   
 Yesu naz'umwijim'uzahunga,   
 Impundu zizavuga Yes'aje,   
 Gukorany'intore ze.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Gukorany'abakunzi be (bose);   
Gukorany'abakunzi be (bose);   
Impundu zizavuga Yes'aje,   
 Gukorany'intore ze.

  **2**   
Imibabaro yos'izashira,   
 Imibabaro yos'izashira;   
Ubw'Umwami Yes'azagaruka,   
 Gukorany'intore ze.

  **3**   
Nta wuzongera kurir'ukundi,   
 Nta wuzongera kurir'ukundi;   
Umwami Yesu n'aza ku bicu,   
 Gukorany'intore ze.

  **4**   
Hazab'indirimbo z'indamutso,   
 Hazab'indirimbo z'indamutso;   
Z'abakijijwe Yes'agarutse,   
 Gukorany'intore ze.

title: 198 Yesu Niwe Nshut'Ihebuje
markdown:
### 198 Yesu Niwe Nshut'Ihebuje   

  **1**   
 Yesu niwe nshut'ihebuje,   
 Iy'amagany'agucogoje.   
Niwe womor'inguma   
 zo mu mutima wawe;   
Yesu niwe nshut'ihebuje.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yesu n'inshut'ihebuje (ihebuje);   
Yesu n'inshut'ihebuje (ihebuje);   
N'ugw'azakuramira,   
 N'utak'agutabare;   
Yesu niwe nshut'ihebuje.

  **2**   
Nasanz'ar'inshut'ihebuje,   
 Kukw'atampana mu makuba;   
Nindek'akanyobora,   
 Sinzagir'icyo ntinya;   
Yesu niwe nshut'ihebuje.

  **3**   
N'ubwo natahirwa n'ibyago,   
 Bikantera byiyungikanya,   
 Sinzakuk'umutima,   
 Kukw'ampor'i ruhande;   
Yesu niwe nshut'ihebuje.

  **4**   
Ubwo tuzagera mw'ijuru,   
 Tugahura n'abo twatanye,   
 Impundu zizavuga,   
 Tumusingiz'iteka:   
 Yesu niwe nshut'ihebuje.

title: 199 Imana Ihimbarizw'Ibyo Yakoze
markdown:
### 199 Imana Ihimbarizw'Ibyo Yakoze   

  **1**   
 Iman'ihimbarizw 'ibyo yakoze;   
Yakunz'ab'is'itang'Umwana wayo;   
Niwe Yesu waducunguye twese,   
 Akaducir'icyanzu ngo dukire.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Dushime, dushime, Yes'Umwami wacu;   
Dushime, dushime, Twese tumushime.   
Niwe watwujuje n'Imana yacu;   
Tumuhimbariz'iyo neza nyinshi.

  **2**   
Yesu yaducunguj'amaraso ye,   
 Maz'aduca kuri kamere yacu;   
Ngo n'ubwo twaba twarashayishije,   
 Tube nk'abatigeze gucumura.

  **3**   
Ibyo yadukoreye ntibigerwa,   
 Twakiran'Umwana w'Imana ishimwe;   
Ariko tuzarushaho kwishima,   
 Nitumurebesh'aya maso yacu.

title: 200 Ur'Uwera Wera
markdown:
### 200 Ur'Uwera Wera   

  **1**   
 Ur'Uwera wera, Man'ikomeye!   
Mu gitondo tujye tukuririmbira.   
Nubw'ukomey'ute, Ugir'imbabazi;   
Ingoma yawe ntizahanguka.

  **2**   
Ur'Uwera wera, Abera bose,   
 Baguhimbazanya n'abamarayika!   
Ibyaremwe byose bikuramye,   
 Mwami, Wahozeho, Kand'uzahoraho.

  **3**   
Ur'Uwera wera, Ubwiza bwawe,   
 N'ubwo butarebwa n'inkozi z'ibibi,   
 Uhor'ur'Uwera, Nta wundi mwahwana,   
 Kugira neza, No gutungana.

title: 201 Uhoraho Nyobora
markdown:
### 201 Uhoraho Nyobora   

  **1**   
 Uhoraho nyobora,   
 Kuko nd'umugenzi mu butayu,   
 Nd'umunyantege nke,   
 Ariko wowe ur'umunyambaraga.   
Mutsima wo mw'ijuru we,   
 Nshaka guhazwa nawe (guhazwa nawe),   
 Nshaka cyane guhazwa nawe.

  **2**   
Twifuza kumarw'inyota nawe,   
 Wowe sokw'idakama,   
 Tuyoboresh'inkingi y'igicu,   
 Tuzarangiz'urugendo.   
Ur'umutabazi wacu,   
 N'ingab'idukingira (idukingira),   
 Tuber'ingab'idukingira.

  **3**   
Ningera ku nkombe ya Yordani,   
 Umutim'uzatuza,   
 Maz'unyambuts'amasumo yaho,   
 Ngere hakury'i Kanani.   
Nzaririmba, Nzaririmba,   
 Nzagusingiz'iteka (iteka),   
 Nzagusingiz'iteka ryose. Amen.

title: 202 Urugo Runezerewe
markdown:
### 202 Urugo Runezerewe   

  **1**   
 Urugo runezerewe, Iman'irubamo,   
 Iyo bahuj'imigambi yo kujya mw'ijuru.

  **2**   
Urugo rurimo Yesu, Rugir'amahoro,   
 Abana biga kuvuga, Bahoh'izina rye.

  **3**   
Urugo runezerewe, Bahora basenga,   
 Ahw ababyeyi bakunda, Ijambo ry'Imana.

  **4**   
Mukiza fash'ingo zacu, Zigir'amahoro,   
 Uzuz'imitima yacu, Urukundo rwawe.

title: 203 Munsi Y 'Amababa Ye
markdown:
### 203 Munsi Y 'Amababa Ye   

  **1**   
 Munsi y'amababa ye nihw'ampisha,   
 N'ubw'ijoro ryakwijima cyane,   
 Ntacyo nzatinya nzi kw'azankomeza,   
 Ubu nd'umwana we yacunguye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Munsi y'ayo mababa ye,   
 Havuy'urukundo rwinshi,   
 Mu mababa niho nzibera,   
 Mu mahor'iteka ryose.

  **2**   
Munsi y'amababa ye nta gahinda,   
 N'uburuhukiro bw'umutima,   
 Mur'iyi si ntiharimw'agakiza,   
 Mpirwa ndi mu mababa Ye gusa.

  **3**   
Munsi y'amababa ye niho heza,   
 Nzajya mpihish'ibishuko byose,   
 Niho buhungiro nta cyampangara,   
 Nzibanira na Yes'amahoro.

title: 204 Mwami, Umurab'Urakaze!
markdown:
### 204 Mwami, Umurab'Urakaze!   

  **1**   
 Mwam'umurab'urakaze, Urahorera cyane.   
Nta buhungiro nta bwugamo, Bw'umuzajoro nk'uyu.   
Mbese ko tugiye gupfa, Nawe wiryamiye?   
Dor'umuraba wabay'icyago, Tugiye kurengerwa.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Umurab'uranyumvira rwose. Utuze.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Umurab'uranyumvira rwose.   
U-tuze ...ze ...tuze   
    **Bose:**   
 Nib'ar'umurab'usheg'utyo,   
 Cyangwa daimoni cyangwa s'abantu,   
 Nta mazi yabasha kurengera   
 Ubwat'Umwami wa byos'arimo.   
Dore byose biranyumvira. Bituze, Bituze.   
Dore byose biranyumvira, Biratuza.

  **2**   
Mwami mfit'agahind'ubu, N'umubabaro mwinshi,   
 Umuraba urandengeye, Mwami tebuk'unkize.   
Isuri y'ibyaha byanjye, Dor'irantembanye,   
 Ndarenganye, Ndarenganye rwose,   
 Mwami tebuk'unkize.

  **3**   
Mwam'umurab'uratuje, Ubu nta bwoba mfite.   
Hamaze no gutamuruka, Mfit'ibyishimo byinshi.   
Nuko, Mwami ndakwinginze, Ntunsige jyenyine,   
 Nduhukire mur'iki cyambu, Kirimw'amahoro masa.

title: 205 Nkweguriy'Ubugingo Bwanjye
markdown:
### 205 Nkweguriy'Ubugingo Bwanjye   

  **1**   
 Nkweguriy'ubugingo bwanjye,   
 Ng'ubugenz'uk'ushaka Mukiza,   
 Nkweguriy'amaboko yanjye,   
 Ng'uyakoresh'uk'ushaka Mwami,   
 Ng'uyakoresh'uk'ushaka.

  **2**   
Nkweguriy'ibirenge byanjye,   
 Bijye bijyan'ubutumwa bwiza,   
 Nkweguriy'ijwi ryanjye na ryo,   
 Ngo rijye rigusingiz'iteka,   
 Ngo rijye rigusingiza.

  **3**   
Nkweguriye akanwa kanjye,   
 Kuzuz'ubutumwa bwawe Mwami,   
 Nkweguriy'ubutunzi bwanjye,   
 Ntacyo nshaka kwisigaranira,   
 Ntabwo nagir'icyo nkwima.

  **4**   
Nkweguriy'imigambi yanjye,   
 Yikoresh'uk'ushaka Mukiza,   
 Nkweguriy'umutima wanjye,   
 Maz'uwimike m'Ubwami bwawe,   
 Wimike m'Ubwami bwawe.

  **5**   
Nkweguriy'urukundo rwanjye,   
 Sinshaka kugir'icyo nguhisha,   
 Nguhay'impagarike yanjye,   
 Nkweguriy'ibyanjye byose Mwami,   
 Nkweguriy'ibyanjye byose.

title: 206 Abazacungurwa Bazaririmba
markdown:
### 206 Abazacungurwa Bazaririmba   

  **1**   
 Abazacungurwa bazaririmba,   
 Bazashyir'amakamba yabo hasi,   
 Imibabaro yab'izab'ishize,   
 Bazahora banezerew'iteka.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Bazaririmbir'iyo Ntama y'i Kalvari   
 Baririmbire Yes'Umwami Uhoraho.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Bazaririmba, Bazaririmba,   
 ...ma y'i Kalvari   
 Ntama y'i Kalvari,   
 Baririmbire, baririmbire   
 ...mi, Uhoraho.

  **2**   
Indirimbo y'urukund'itangaje,   
 Izab'iririmbanyw'umunezero,   
 Tuzabanayo n'Umukiza wacu,   
 Tuzahora tunezerew'iteka.

  **3**   
Abamesh'ibishura byabo nibo,   
 Bazegera ya ntebe ye ya cyami,   
 Ibyaha tuzabikizwa na Yesu,   
 Tuzahora tunezerew'iteka.

title: 207 Ku Musozi Kure
markdown:
### 207 Ku Musozi Kure   

  **1**   
 Ku musozi kure har'umusaraba,   
 Ubabaj'ukojej'isoni,   
 Ndawukunda cyane kuko wabambweho,   
 Uwacunguy'abanyabyaha.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nzogeza uwo musaraba (musaraba),   
 Kugez'ubwo nzat'umuruho,   
 Nzikomeza ku musaraba (musaraba),   
 Kugez'ubwo nzambikw'ikamba.

  **2**   
Mbeg'umusarab'ab'isi bahinyuye,   
 Ng'uranyur'umutima wanjye!   
Umwana w'intama yarets'ikuzo rye,   
 Awikorer'ajy'i Kalvari.

  **3**   
Umusaraba wavushij'amaraso,   
 Ya Yesu umwana w'Imana,   
 Kuri wo nih'Umukiza yatangiye,   
 Maz'ubwo mbabarirw'ibyaha.

  **4**   
Kubw'umusaraba, Nzab'umunyakuri,   
 Nihanganir'isoni zawo,   
 Kugez'ubw'uzanjyan'iwacu mw'ijuru,   
 Tunezeranw'iteka ryose.

title: 208 Yes'Umukiza Yari Mu Gituro!
markdown:
### 208 Yes'Umukiza Yari Mu Gituro!   

  **1**   
 Yes'Umukiza yari mu gituro,   
 Ahategerereje ko bucya.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mu gitond'arazuka (arazuka),   
 Atsinz'umwanzi bitangaje (bitangaje),   
 Yaneshej'ubutware bw'umwijima,   
 Azabana n'aber'iteka ryose.   
Yazutse (yazutse), Yazutse (yazutse)!   
Umwami Yes'ariho.

  **2**   
Barindiy'ubusa Yes'Umukiza,   
 Bakinz'igituro ngw'aheremo.

  **3**   
Umukiza Yesu, Ntiyaheranywe,   
 N'ingoyi z'urupfu, Yarazutse.

title: 209 Ahar'Uburuhukiro
markdown:
### 209 Ahar'Uburuhukiro   

  **1**   
 Ahar'uburuhukiro, Ni hafi y'Imana,   
 Ahw'icyaha kitarangwa, Ni hafi y'Imana.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mwami Yesu Mukiza watumwe n'Imana,   
 Dukomereze twese bugufi bw'Imana.

  **2**   
Ahatab'impagarara, Ni hafi y'Imana,   
 Ahw'icyaha kitarangwa, Ni hafi y'Imana.

  **3**   
Ahahor'umudendezo, Ni hafi y'Imana,   
 Ahahor'umunezero, Ni hafi y'Imana.

title: 210 Iteraniro Ry'Abera
markdown:
### 210 Iteraniro Ry'Abera   

  **1**   
 Iteraniro ry'abera, Inzovu n'ibihumbi,   
 Ingabo z'abacunguwe, Barabagirana nk'umucyo,   
 Barwany'uko babasha, None baratsinze,   
 Mwagurir'amarembo, Kugira ngo binjire.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Haleluya, Haleluya,   
 Dusingiz'Umwana w'Intama,   
 Haleluya, Haleluya,   
 Nimusingiz'Uwazutse.

  **2**   
Ikobe ry'indirimbo, Rirangira mu kirere,   
 Urusobe rw'amajwi y'inanga, Zizacurangw'urwunge,   
 Mbeg'umuns'utangaje, Ni nk'uwo kurema,   
 Mbega ng'umubabar'uratsindwa bitavugwa! 

  **3**   
Hanezerew'abari mu mirenge y'i Kanani,   
 Igitey'ubwuzu kandi, N'uko batazatandukana,   
 Ya maso yariraga uzasang'akeye,   
 Nta mpfubyi nta n'impfusha bizarangw'i Kanani.

  **4**   
Iteraniro ry'abera, Batsinze wa mubisha,   
 Nimwumv'izo ndirimbo nziza,   
 Ni nk'iz'abamarayika,   
 Hehe n'imibabaro, Bayisezeyeho,   
 Ntibazongera gusuhuz'imitim'ukundi.

title: 211 Nimwuname Imbere Ya Yehova
markdown:
### 211 Nimwuname Imbere Ya Yehova   

  **1**   
 Nimwunam'imbere ya Yehova,   
 Yemwe mahanga yo mw'isi,   
 Mumenye yuk'Uhorahw'ari we Mana,   
 Niwe soko y'ubugingo.

  **2**   
Kand'imbaraga ze zitangaje,   
 Zaturemye mu butaka,   
 Ndets'igihe twazimiraga nk'intama,   
 Yatugaruye mu bushyo.

  **3**   
Tumusingirize mu ndirimbo,   
 Duhanik'amajwi yacu,   
 Kand'indim'ibihumbi zo mw'isi yose,   
 Zizasingiz'Uhoraho.

  **4**   
Amateka y'ageng'isi yose,   
 Nta wager'urukundo rwe,   
 Ukuri kwe gushikamye nk'urutare,   
 Ukw'ibihe bih'ibindi.

title: 212 Mb'Uwawe, Mwami
markdown:
### 212 Mb'Uwawe, Mwami   

  **1**   
 Mb'uwawe Mwami mbane nawe,   
 Ni wow'umbumba, Jye nd'ibumba,   
 Ngenz'uk'ushaka mere nkawe,   
 Mwam'ubu ndakwiyeguriye.

  **2**   
Mb'uwawe Mwami mbane nawe,   
 Ndondora Mwam'ungerageze,   
 Unyeze nere nk'urubura,   
 Njye ngusenga niyoroheje.

  **3**   
Mb'uwawe Mwami mbane nawe,   
 Ubu ndagusab'untabare,   
 Wowe Nyir'imbaraga zose,   
 Nkorah'umvure we Mukiza.

  **4**   
Mb'uwawe Mwami mbane nawe,   
 Nkomeza kuko nteraganwa,   
 Nyuzuz'Umwuka wawe Wera,   
 Ngo bose bambonemo Yesu.

title: 213 Mutuze
markdown:
### 213 Mutuze   

  **1**   
 Mutuze, Mutuze, Mwe guhwihwisa,   
 Mwite kw'ijambo ryose mwumvir'aha.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mwitonde (mwitonde),   
 Mwitonde (mwitonde),   
 Har'Uhoraho,   
 Muze (muze) hafi ye,   
 Mumwubashye cyane.

  **2**   
Mutuze, Mutuze, Aha n'ahera,   
 Turahumvir'ubutumwa bukiza.

  **3**   
Mutuze, Mutuze, Mwiyoroheje,   
 Dusangir'ibyiza byo mur'Edeni.

  **4**   
Mutuze, Mutuze, Tubabarirwe,   
 Mutuze, Turi kumwe n'Uhoraho.

title: 214 Mbes'Ushaka Guhirwa?
markdown:
### 214 Mbes'Ushaka Guhirwa?  

  **1**   
 Mbes'ushaka guhirwa? Tang'unezerewe.   
Bizakwiz'ubutumwa, Tang'unezerewe.   
Ntukikanyize rwose, Tanga unezerewe.   
Fatanya n'Imana, Tyo tang'unezerewe.

  **2**   
Reka wikwikanyiza, Tang'unezerewe.   
Rekur'impano zawe, Tang'unezerewe.   
Mbes'utunze bikeya? Tanga unezerewe.   
Izaguh'imigisha, Tang'unezerewe.

  **3**   
Kwiza hos'ubutumwa, Tang'unezerewe.   
Maz'umucyo wihute, Tang'unezerewe.   
Mbes'ushak'imigisha wahabga n'Uhoraho?   
Nuko rero mwumvire, Tang'unezerewe.

title: 215 Rangurur'Indirimbo
markdown:
### 215 Rangurur'Indirimbo   

  **1**   
 Rangurur'indirimbo y'ibyishimo n'umunezero,   
 Wikwiheba shir'agahinda, Ririmban'ibyishimo.   
Ririmbir'Uwaturinze, Waduhuje n'inshuti,   
 Uwatuyoboy'inzira, Itugeza mw'ijuru.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ririmba (ririmba), Ririmba (ririmba),   
 Ririmban'ibyishimo,   
 Ririmba (ririmba), Ririmba (ririmba),   
 N'ibyishimo byinshi.

  **2**   
Turirimbe dutway'amabendera tunezerewe,   
 Turirimba hoziana z'umunezero w'iteka.   
Turirimbir'Umukiza, Turanguruy'amajwi,   
 Tuvug'ibyabaye kera By'urukundo rw'Imana.

  **3**   
Turagushima Data Wera, Kubw'imbabazi zawe,   
 Uko duteraniye hamwe, Turagushima cyane.   
Turagushima Mukiza, Kuko waducunguye,   
 Uduhe Umwuka Wera, Atwegerez'Imana.

title: 216 Nshikamye Ku Masezerano
markdown:
### 216 Nshikamye Ku Masezerano   

  **1**   
 Nshikamye ku masezerano meza,   
 Y'Umukiza wanjye, Mpora nsingiza,   
 Nzahora musingiza, Ndanguruye,   
 Nshikamye ku masezerano.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S.:**   
 Nshikamye ku masezerano,   
 Y'Umucunguzi wanjye,   
 Nshikamye ku masezerano,   
 Y'Umucunguzi.   
 **A.,T. na B.:**   
 Nshikamye ku masezerano,   
 Masezerano y'Umucunguzi wanjye,   
 Nshikamye ku maserano,   
 Y 'Umucunguzi.   
Masezerano y'Umucunguzi.

  **2**   
Nshikamye ku masezerano meza,   
 N'ubwo naba mbuz'epfo na ruguru,   
 Ijambo ry'Imana rimpa gutsinda,   
 Nshikamye ku masezerano.

  **3**   
Nshikamye ku masezerano meza,   
 Kuko nejeshejw'amaras'akiza,   
 Niy'atuma mpora mu mudendezo,   
 Nshikamye ku masezerano.

  **4**   
Nshikamye ku masezerano meza,   
 Nkomezwa n'umurunga w'urukundo,   
 Mpora neshesh'inkota y'Umwuka we,   
 Nshikamye ku masezerano.

  **5**   
Nshikamye ku masezerano meza,   
 Numv'Umwuka we Wer'ampamagara,   
 Ngo ngume mu Mukiza nkesha byose,   
 Nshikamye ku masezerano.

title: 217 Niba Mvug'Ijambo Rito
markdown:
### 217 Niba Mvug'Ijambo Rito   

  **1**   
 Niba mvug'ijambo rito, Rihumuriz'abandi,   
 Niba ndirimb'indirimbo, Ntibongere kwiheba.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mana mfasha mvuge neza,   
 Mpa n'indirimbo nziza,   
 Mbashisha kurangurura,   
 Ngo byumvikane hose.

  **2**   
Niba urukundo rwanjye, Rwahumuriz'abandi,   
 Niba nagir'icyo nkora, Kikunganir'abandi.

  **3**   
Niba nakor'umurimo, Ukaruhur'abandi,   
 Mana mp'urukundo rwinshi, Rutume mfash'abandi.

title: 218 Umwami Yesu Yikorer'Umusaraba?
markdown:
### 218 Umwami Yesu Yikorer'Umusaraba?   

  **1**   
 Umwami Yesu yikorer'umusaraba wenyine?   
Umuntu wese yikorer'uwe, Nanjye har'uwanjye.

  **2**   
Nzawikorera ngeze igihe Azawunduhura,   
 Anjyan'iwacu anyambik'amba yanteguriye.

  **3**   
Nzarambik'ikamba ryanjye iruhande rw'Umukiza,   
 Haba hashashe izahabu, Nzogeza izina rye.

title: 219 Umwami Yesu Yazutse
markdown:
### 219 Umwami Yesu Yazutse   

  **1**   
 Umwami Yesu yazutse,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Abaremwe bamuramye,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Twese tumusingize,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Isi n'ijuru bimusingize,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya.

  **2**   
Umukiza wac'ariho,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Yaneshej'urupfu rwose,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Niwe waducunguye,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Yatsinz'imbaraga z'igituro,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya.

  **3**   
Yaducunguj'urukundo,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Yaturwaniy'intambara,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Yiganzura n'urupfu,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Yatwugururiye paradizo,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya.

  **4**   
Twishimire kujy'ahw'ari,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Tuger'ikirenge mu cye,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Azatuzura nkawe,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya,   
 Tubikeshej'umusaraba we,   
 Mwese nimwishime Haleluya.

title: 220 Mbese Yesu Ajy'Anyitaho?
markdown:
### 220 Mbese Yesu Ajy'Anyitaho?   

  **1**   
 Mbese Yesu ajy'anyitaho,   
 Mu byago no mu mahoro,   
 Mu mibabaro no mu miruho,   
 No mu rugendo rurushya?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Anyitaho, Arandinda,   
 Mu mibabaro yanjye,   
 Mu bihe merewe nabi,   
 Umukiza wanjy'anyitaho.

  **2**   
Mbese Yesu ajy'anyitaho,   
 Iyo ngenda mu mwijima,   
 N'iy'umwijima w'akag'ungose,   
 Mbese Yes'amba bugufi? 

  **3**   
Mbese Yesu ajy'anyitaho,   
 Iyo nguye mu bishuko,   
 Iyo mbabaye,   
 N'iyo mbogoza,   
 Mbese Yes'arantabara? 

  **4**   
Mbese Yesu ajy'anyitaho,   
 Iyo nsezeye ku nshuti,   
 Iyo mbabazwa, Simpumurizwe,   
 Mbese Yes'ab'abireba?

title: 221 Hanga Amaso Umukiza
markdown:
### 221 Hanga Amaso Umukiza   

  **1**   
 Iyo utewe n'ibyago bigatuma wiyunamira,   
 Iyo kwiheba kukugezeh'ubwoba bukagutaha.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Hang'amaso Umukiza,   
 Ngwin'arakureba neza,   
 Uzumv'uhumurijwe kandi,   
 Azakwemera akwakire.

  **2**   
Iy'usatiriwe n'umuraba byose bihungabanye,   
 Iy'ibyawe byose byagushijeh'ubwoba bwagutashye.

  **3**   
Iy ur'arakazuz'ubuz'urukundo rwawe rwa mbere,   
 Iy'icyaha wakoze kigutotez'ijoro n'umunsi.

  **4**   
Iyo ugiz'ibicuguc'intege mu murimo wa Yesu.   
Iyo mu rugendo rwawe mw'isi utakimeny'inzira.

title: 222 Mfasha Ngo Ndusheho
markdown:
### 222 Mfasha Ngo Ndusheho   

  **1**   
 Mfasha ngo ndusheho kugukunda,   
 Icyo nicyo ngusaba mpfukamye.   
Mbigusabye cyane mfasha Mwami Yesu,   
 Ngo ndusheho kugukunda.

  **2**   
Nashats'iby'iyi si ngo nezerwe,   
 Ubu ndabiretse, Ng'ump'ibyiza.   
Icyo nsaba gusa, Mfasha Mwami Yesu,   
 Ngo ndusheho kugukunda.

  **3**   
Mfit'umubabaro n'agahinda,   
 Nzishimira cyan'intumwa zawe.   
Iyo ndirimbana nazo biramfasha,   
 Nkarushaho kugukunda.

  **4**   
Mu marembera y'ubu bugingo,   
 Nzagushima cyane ngusingize.   
Nzakuririmbira maze mvuge nsenga,   
 Ngo ndusheho kugukunda.

title: 223 Yes'Aje Yasanga Twiteguye?
markdown:
### 223 Yes'Aje Yasanga Twiteguye?   

  **1**   
 Yes'aje yasanga twiteguye, Yasanga turi maso?   
Igihe cyose yagarukamo, Se twaba twiteguye?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbese mugenzi twavuga tuti:   
 Ubu turiteguye?   
Mbes'ah'Umwam'azasanga wowe nanjye,   
 Tukimutegereje?

  **2**   
Mbese n'az'umusek'utambitse akaduhamagara,   
 Umunt'akabazw'icyo yakoze, Mbes'ahw'azadushima? 

  **3**   
Mbese tujya tub'abanyakuri cyangwa turinezeza?   
Niba tuboneye mu mitima, Tuzagera mw'ijuru.

  **4**   
Hahirw'ab'Umwami azasanga bakimutegereje,   
 Mbese n'agaruka mu gicuku, Tuzaba turi maso?

title: 224 Izuba Nirirenga
markdown:
### 224 Izuba Nirirenga   

  **1**   
 Izuba nirirenga turangij'imirimo,   
 Ubwo tuzaba tunaniwe,   
 Uhorah'utwara byose niw'uzadukiza,   
 Duhurire kuri Siyoni.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Tuzahurirayo, Koko tuzahurirayo,   
 Tuzibanira na Yesu, Muri cya gihugu cyiza,   
 Tuzahurirayo, Koko tuzahurirayo,   
 Twibanire (twibanire), mw'ikuzo rye.

  **2**   
Tunyura mu gicucu, No mu mugaru mwinshi,   
 Tugoswe n'umwijim'ukaze,   
 Ariko Uhoraho, Niw'uzatuyobora,   
 Ab'ari w'utugez'iwacu.

  **3**   
Nubw'amaso yacu yuzuyemo amarira,   
 Dufit'ubwoba mu mitima,   
 Ariko Umukiza agiye kutujyana,   
 Aho tuzashir'agahinda.

title: 225 Narebye Yesu
markdown:
### 225 Narebye Yesu   

  **1**   
 Narebye Yes'igihe nari ndembejwe n'ibyaha,   
 Nari nabuz'uko ngira, Maz'arampumuriza.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S:**   
 Ye, ni koko,  Nareby'Umwami Yesu;   
Arambona, Nzabana naw'iteka.   
 **A, T na B:**   
 Ye n'iby'ukuri koko,   
 Nanjye nareby'Umwami Yesu,   
 Maz'arambona,   
 Nanjye rwose,   
 Nzabana naw'iteka.

  **2**   
Nabony'Umwami Yes'ambambiwe ku musaraba,   
 Nizera yukw'ibyaha byanjye bibambanywe nawe.

  **3**   
Nabony'Umwami Yesu, Azukany'icyubahiro,   
 Niringir'imbabazi ze, N'ibyahanuwe kera.

  **4**   
Yandebany'impuhwe, Umutima wanjy'uranyurwa,   
 Maz'anyiher'ikimenyetso cy'Umwuka We Wera.

  **5**   
Tuzabana n'Umwami Yesu Krist'ibihe byose,   
 Mutezeho byose, Mbe nk'umwana wiringira se.

title: 226 Ntugire Icy'Utinya
markdown:
### 226 Ntugire Icy'Utinya   

  **1**   
 Ntugire icyo utinya, Ndi kumwe nawe,   
 Ni isezerano ryo kwizera kwanjye.   
Umwijima ntuzigera unter'ubwoba,   
 Ndahumurijwe, Ngendana n'Umukiza wanjye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ntabwo nzigunga, Sinzigera nigunga,   
 Yesu arandinda, Ntabwo ajy'ansiga jyenyine.   
Ntabwo nzigunga, Sinzigera nigunga,   
 Yesu arandinda. Ntabwo ajy'ansiga jyenyine.

  **2**   
Umusek'umurik'iyo hakeye neza,   
 Yes'umucyo wanjy'amurikir'iteka,   
 Iyo ncitse intege, Yes'arandamira,   
 Mucyo weyur'ibicu, Azangeza mw'ijuru.

  **3**   
Iyo ibyago bituruts'impande zose,   
 Iyo nugarijwe Yes'amba bugufi,   
 Ambwira ati: Komera, Humura  Nijye   
 Ntutinye komera ndi kumwe nawe iteka.

title: 227 Mbeg'Inteko!
markdown:
### 227 Mbeg'Inteko!   

  **1**   
 Umwana w'umunt'azaz'igitondo gitangaje,   
 Nibwo twese tuzabon'ikuzo rye.   
Azakur'abantu be mu moko yose yo mw'isi,   
 Iyo nteko nini iratangaje

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Mbeg'inteko nini nziza!   
Inteko nini y'abacunguwe na Yesu ubwe!   
Mbeg'inteko nini y'abantu!   
Bazahora banezerew'iteka!   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Mbeg'inteko, mbeg'inteko!   
Nini nziza, nini nziza!   
Inteko nini y'abacunguwe na Yesu ubwe!   
Mbeg'inteko, mbeg'inteko!   
nini y'abantu! Bazahora banezerew'iteka!

  **2**   
Abasinziriye muri Yesu bazakanguka,   
 N'ubwo bab'ikuzimu no mu nyanja,   
 Bahabw'imibiri imeze nk'iy'abo mw'ijuru,   
 Iyo nteko nini izatangaza!

  **3**   
Tuzabon'umudugud'urimw'amazu yera de,   
 N'uruzi rwa ya mazi y'ubugingo.   
Abazaba baratandukanye bazabonana,   
 Izab'ar'inteko nin'itangaje! 

  **4**   
Nukuri Yes'agiye kugaruka bidatinze,   
 Uwo muns'uzab'umuns'uhiriwe,   
 Twese tuzahindurwa mu kanya, Nk'ako guhumbya! Iyo nteko nin'izab'itangaje!

title: 228 Umutima Wanjye Wari Wihebye
markdown:
### 228 Umutima Wanjye Wari Wihebye   

  **1**   
 Umutima wanjye wari wihebye,   
 Ibyaha byanjye byantaye mu rwobo,   
 Ntakambir'Uhoraho ndi mw'isayo,   
 Maz'araz'ankuramo, None ndiho.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yankuyemo yaransayuye,   
 Maz'ampagarika ku Rutare,   
 Kand'anyigisha kuririmba,   
 Ndamwogeza, Haleluya.

  **2**   
Yanyigije hafi ye ku Rutare,   
 Nimpaguma ntabwo nzongera kugwa,   
 Byatumy'intambwe zanjye zishikama,   
 Nzahaguma nzahambikirw'ikamba.

  **3**   
Niwe wanyigishij'indirimbo nshya,   
 Nyiririmba ku manywa na nijoro,   
 Ubu nibereye mu mudendezo,   
 Nzakomeza nsingiz'Uwankijije.

  **4**   
Nzaririmb'ibitangaza bya Yesu,   
 Nzamusingiza bose babimenye,   
 Nzajya ndirimb'agakiza k'iteka,   
 Kugez'ubwo bose bameny'Imana.

title: 229 Ibihe By'Imibabaro
markdown:
### 229 Ibihe By'Imibabaro   

  **1**   
 Ibihe by'imibabaro bitey'agahinda,   
 Byose nabituy'i Kalvari, Yes'ari bugufi.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Byose nabituy'i Kalvari,   
 Kalvari, Kalvari,   
 Byose nabituy'i Kalvari,   
 Yes'ari bugufi.

  **2**   
Muture Yes'amaganya yanyu uyu munsi,   
 Byose nabituy'i Kalvari, Yes'ari bugufi.

  **3**   
Mutim'ubabaye cyane, Humura witinya,   
 Byose nabituy'i Kalvari, Yes'ari bugufi.

title: 230 Wibuk'Imigisha Wahawe
markdown:
### 230 Wibuk'Imigisha Wahawe   

  **1**   
 N'ubwo waterwa n'amakuba menshi,   
 Maz'akagutera kwiheba cyane,   
 Ibuk'imigisha yose wahawe,   
 Ibyo yakoze biragutangaza.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Wibuk'imigisha wahawe,   
 Wibuk'imigisha y'Imana,   
 Imigisha Iman'iguha,   
 Ibyo yakoze biragutangaza.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Wibuk'imigisha gisha wahawe,   
 Wibuk'imigishagisha y'Imana,   
 Imigisha yose Iman'iguha,   
 Ibyo yakoze biragutangaza.

  **2**   
Uhor'uremerewe n'amaganya,   
 Umusarab'urakuremereye,   
 Ibuk'imigisha yose wahawe,   
 Uhor'ubiririmb'uko bukeye.

  **3**   
N'ubon'abandi bafit'ubutunzi,   
 Wibuk'ubwo Yesu yasezeranye,   
 Wibuk'imigisha yos'utagura,   
 Ingororano yaw'iri mw'ijuru.

  **4**   
N'ubwo wab'utewe n'impagarara,   
 Ntizizaguhagarik'umutima,   
 Wibuke k'ufit'abamarayika,   
 Bazakurinda baguhumurize.

title: 231 Mana Data, Ushobora Byose
markdown:
### 231 Mana Data, Ushobora Byose   

  **1**   
 Mana Data, Ushobora byose,   
 Duhe Mwami, Kurabagirana,   
 Tukuririmbire tugushima,   
 Kukw'ariw'ushobora byose.

  **2**   
Watuyoboy'ibihe byashize,   
 Tuyobore no mur'iki gihe,   
 Dukingire imyambi y'umwanzi,   
 Tuyoboreshe ijambo ryawe.

  **3**   
Intambara ziraduc'intege,   
 Tuber'ingabo idukingira,   
 Duhe kwizer'imbaraga yawe,   
 Dukeney'ubuntu bwawe Mwami.

  **4**   
Duhembure mur'urugendo,   
 Tuyobore amanywa n'ijoro,   
 Duhe kuguma bugufi bwawe,   
 Guhimbazwa n'ibyawe iteka.

title: 232 Urukundo Rw'Umukiza
markdown:
### 232 Urukundo Rw'Umukiza   

  **1**   
 Ubu mpagaz'imbere ya Yesu w'i Nazareti,   
 Ntangazwa n'ukw'ankunda   
 kandi nandujwe n'ibyaha!

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Urukundo rw'Umukiza   
 Nzahora nduririmba,   
 Urukundo Yes'ankunda,   
 Ruhebuj'ibintu byose.

  **2**   
Ari mu gashyamb'asenga, Nijye yagiriraga,   
 Bya byuya by'amaraso yabibize kukw'ankunda.

  **3**   
Maz'abamarayika baza kumuhumuriza,   
 Kuko yar'ababajwe n'imibabaro y'abantu.

  **4**   
Tuzamureb'iteka abazaba bacunguwe,   
 Duhore turirimba urukundo yadukunze.

title: 233 Amarembo Niyugururwa
markdown:
### 233 Amarembo Niyugururwa   

  **1**   
 Ntituzongera kuba mu mwijima,   
 Amarembo niyugururwa.   
Ahubwo tuzaba muri rwa rurembo,   
 Rumurikirwa n'Imana.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Amarembo niyugururwa,   
 Amarembo niyugururwa.   
Mbeg'umunezero tuzahagirira,   
 Amarembo yuguruwe!   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Amarembo niyu...ru... ...gururwa,   
 Amarembo Niyu... ru... gururwa,   
 Mbeg'umunezero tuzahagirira,   
 Amarembo yuguruwe!

  **2**   
Inshuti zizandindira ku cyambu,   
 Amarembo niyugururwa.   
 Nzajya kwiber'ahatazarangw'icyaha,   
 Amarembo yuguruwe.

  **3**   
Nta ndwara no kuribwa bizabayo,   
 Amarembo niyugururwa.   
Tuziganirira n'abakunzi bacu,   
 Amarembo yuguruwe.

  **4**   
Nzagir'umunezer'utarondorwa,   
 Amarembo niyugururwa.   
Nzahora nirebera Yesu mu maso,   
 Amarembo yuguruwe.

  **5**   
Tuzagendera mu mucyo w'Imana,   
 Amarembo niyugururwa.   
Tuzaba turirimban'umunezero,   
 Amarembo yuguruwe.

  **6**   
Ntabwo nzongera kuvunwa n'ishavu,   
 Amarembo niyugururwa.   
Nzabana n'Umwami Yes'iteka   
 ryose Amarembo yuguruwe.

title: 234 Nind'Uzagera Mu Rurembo?
markdown:
### 234 Nind'Uzagera Mu Rurembo?
  

  **1**   
 Nind'uzagera mu rurembo, Ruhorahw'ibihe byose,   
 Akabon'ibyiza bihari, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?   
Akahabon'inzira zose zisizemw'izahabu nziza,   
 Agahora mu munezero, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?

  **2**   
Nind'uzatur'umusaraba, Ngw'aruhuk'iteka ryose,   
 Umwizer'azahabw'ikamba, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?   
Azareb'Umwami mu maso, Akiz'imibabaro yose,   
 Abane naw'iteka ryose, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe? 

  **3**   
Kandi har'uzakingiranwa, Ubutazakingurirwa,   
 Azabwirwa ngo ntabwo nkuzi, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?   
Azahamagarir'ubusa, Urugi ruzaba rwakinzwe,   
 Bazagororerw'asigare, Mbese nijye cyangwa wowe? 

  **4**   
Harih'uzishimir'intsinzi, Anesheje, Anesheje,   
 Ari hamwe n'abacunguwe, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?   
Har'uzaramukanya n'abe, Batandukanijwe n'ibyago,   
 Be kongera gutandukana, Mbese nijye, Cyangwa wowe?

title: 235 Ngufitiy'Ubutumwa
markdown:
### 235 Ngufitiy'Ubutumwa   

  **1**   
 Ngufitiy'ubutumwa, Haleluya,   
 N'ubutumwa bw'Umukiza,   
 Bwanditse mw'Ijambo rye, Haleluya,   
 Muhugukire urakizwa.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Tyo reba (tyo reba) maz'ukire (maz'ukire),   
 Reba Yes'Urakizwa. Byanditswe mw'Ijambo rye,   
 Haleluya Muhugukire urakizwa.

  **2**   
Ngufitiy'ubutumwa bw'urukundo,   
 Mwene Data, Haleluya,   
 Buturutse mw'ijuru, Haleluya,   
 Bwatanzwe n'Umukiza Yesu.

  **3**   
Weguriw'ubugingo, Haleluya,   
 Buhorahw'iteka ryose,   
 N'uhanga Yes'amaso, Haleluya,   
 Niwe wenyine ugukiza.

title: 236 Ndi Mu Murima
markdown:
### 236 Ndi Mu Murima   

  **1**   
 Ndi mu murima jyenyine, Ikime gitonze ku byatsi,   
 Numv'ijwi rivuga riti: Umwana w'Iman'aratungutse.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Turakomeza turagendana,   
 Maz'ambwira ko yantoye,   
 Mbeg'ibyishimo twari dufite,   
 Bitigeze bibaho!

  **2**   
Aravuga maz'ijwi rye ryiza ryikirizwa n'inyoni,   
 Indirimbo nziza namwumvanye ntabw'izamva ku mutima.

  **3**   
Tugumana mu murima, Kuk'ubwire bwari bukubye,   
 Maze anyoherez'ankangara, Arikw'ar'ukumpwitura.

title: 237 Ntabwo Ndamenya
markdown:
### 237 Ntabwo Ndamenya   

  **1**   
 Ntabwo ndamenya nez'icyatumye   
 Iman'ingirir'ubuntu,   
 Bigatum'ingir'uwo mu muryango   
 w'abana bayikunda!

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Kuko nzi nez'uwo nizeye,   
 Kand'ariwe ushobora byose,   
 Niwe undindir'ubugingo,   
 Kugeza urya munsi.

  **2**   
Ntabwo nzi nez'uburyo yampaye,   
 Uko kwizera gukiza,   
 N'ubury'Ijambo rye ryampaye   
 amahoro yo mu mutima! 

  **3**   
Sinzi ubury'Umwuka yihanisha   
 abanyabyaha nkanjye,   
 Kumenyesh'abandi ibya Yesu,   
 Bidutera kumwizera.

  **4**   
Ntabwo nz'icyo nateganirijwe,   
 Ar'icyiza cyangw'ikibi,   
 Imibabaro n'iminsi myiza,   
 Byose bir'imbere yawe.

  **5**   
Sinzi igih'Umwam'azazira,   
 Ndetse n'ahw'azaturuka,   
 Niba mbana na Yesu mur'iki gihe,   
 Nzamusanganira.

title: 238 Nguhay'Umwanya
markdown:
### 238 Nguhay'Umwanya   

 **1**   
 Wavuye mw'ijuru usig'ubwami bwawe,   
 Uza mur'iyi si ku bwanjye,   
 I Betelehemu, Ntiwabonay'icumbi,   
 Kand'ur'Umwami w'abami.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nguhay'umwanya mu mutima,   
 Uwiberemw'ibihe byose,   
 Ndawukweguriye Mwami wanjye,   
 Uwiberemw'ibihe byose.

  **2**   
Abamarayika bakuririmbiraga,   
 Bogez'icyubahiro cyawe,   
 Maz'ugeze mw'isi uvuk'ur'umukene,   
 Wicisha bugufi cyane.

  **3**   
Ingunzu zitahiraga mu myobo yazo,   
 Inyoni zirara mu byari,   
 Ariko woweho wararaga butunda,   
 Mw'ishyamba ry'i Galilaya.

  **4**   
Wazaniy'abantu Ijambo rihoraho,   
 Ngo rizabah'umudendezo,   
 Maze barakwanga bakujyan'i Kalvari,   
 Bakwambikiray'amahwa.

  **5**   
Ubw'uzagaruka mw'ikobe ry'indirimbo,   
 Uje mu cyubahiro cyawe,   
 Ndifuza cyane yuko wazampamagara,   
 Ut'icar'iburyo bwanjye.

title: 239 Twabony'Agakiza
markdown:
### 239 Twabony'Agakiza   

  **1**   
 Twabony'agakiza, Muri Yesu Kristo,   
 Yadupfiriye i Kalvari,   
 Mu rukundo rwe rutagir'iherezo,   
 Twatsindishirijwe na Yesu

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yesu yabay'incungu y'ibyaha byacu,   
 Yaducunguj'amaraso ye,   
  Nzahora ndirimb'urukundo rwinshi,   
 Yesu yankunze kera.

  **2**   
Igitambo cy'amaraso y'Umukiza,   
 Nicyo cyadukijij'ibyaha,   
 Cyadukuyehw'inenge twari dufite,   
 Ubu tur'abana b'Imana.

  **3**   
Urukund'Imana yakunze umuntu,   
 N'ukuri ruhebuje byose,   
 Nta yindi mpano dufite twakwitura,   
 Tuguhay'imitima yacu.

title: 240 Uko Ndushaho kumukorera
markdown:
### 240 Uko Ndushaho kumukorera   

  **1**   
 Aho menyey'Umukiza,   
 Nkanagengwa nawe,   
 Uko ndushaho kumukorera,   
 Nikw'arushaho kunyuzuramo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Uko njya ndushaho kumukorera,   
 Nawe, nikw'arushaho kunyuzura,   
 Kandi uko ndushaho kumukunda,   
 Nawe nikw'arushaho kunyuzuramo.

  **2**   
Angirir'ubuntu bwinshi,   
 Nkamererwa neza,   
 Uko ndushaho kumuyoboka,   
 Nikw'arushaho kunyuzuramo.

title: 241 Nabonye Kuza Kwa Yesu
markdown:
### 241 Nabonye Kuza Kwa Yesu   

  **1**   
 Nabonye kuza kwa Yesu afit'icyubahiro,   
 Amaze gusenya rwos'ububiko bw'umujinya,   
 Yadukijije n'ubugi bw'inkot'ityaye cyane,   
 Niw'utuyobora.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nasingizwe, Haleluya,   
 Nasingizwe, Haleluya,   
 Nasingizwe, Haleluya,   
 Niw'utuyobora.

  **2**   
Namubonye no mu mazu y'abantu benshi cyane,   
 Bamwubakiramw'ibicaniro nimugoroba,   
Nongera kumubon'ac'imanza zitarenganya,   
Niw'utuyobora.

  **3**   
Akomeje guhamagaz'abant'ijwi ry'impanda,   
 Arateguriz'abantu bose gucirw'imanza.   
Mutima wanjye mwitabe vuba unezerewe,   
 Niw'utuyobora.

title: 242 Mbeg'Umunsi Mwiza!
markdown:
### 242 Mbeg'Umunsi Mwiza!   

  **1**   
 Mbeg'umunsi mwiz'ubw'abacunguwe   
 bazaba bar'imbere ye.   
Bazaririmb'indirimbo   
 kubw'ikuzo n'ubuntu bwayo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Inteko zingana n'umusenyi,   
 Zingana n'umusenyi mwinshi,   
 Abacunguwe bazangana n'umusenyi,   
 Umusenyi bangana n'umusenyi.

  **2**   
Ndareb'ingabo zitabarika   
 zerekan'umucyo w'ijuru,   
 Zifit'amahoro atangaje   
 ku maremb'arabagirana.

  **3**   
Numv'ijwi ryiza ry'Umucunguzi   
 riva ku ntebe ye y'ubwami,   
 Nimuz'abahiriwe na Data.   
Mwambikw'ikamba ryo kunesha.

  **4**   
Abera bazaririmba   
 n'abamarayika batabarika,   
 Isi izahind'umushyitsi   
 kand'ibyago bizaba bishize.

title: 243 Nimutyo Turirimban'Umunezero
markdown:
### 243 Nimutyo Turirimban'Umunezero   

  **1**   
 Nimutyo turirimban'umunezero,   
 Twegereje kuger'iwacu,   
 Aho niho tuzaban'iteka ryose,   
 Ubu tugiye kugerayo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na T.:**   
 Mu gihe gito, Mu gihe gito,   
 Tuzaba tugezeyo,   
 Tugiye kuban'ubudatandukana,   
 Ubu tugiye kugerayo.   
 **A. na B.:**   
 Mu gihe gito, Mu gihe gito,   
 Tuzaba tugezeyo,   
 Tugiye kuban'ubudatandukana,   
 Ubu tugiye kugerayo.

  **2**   
Mutyo dushishikare dukore neza,   
 Twegereje kuger'iwacu,   
 Kand'Imana yiteguye kutwakira.   
Ubu tugiye kugerayo.

  **3**   
Dukomez'urugendo twe gucogora,   
 Twegereje kuger'iwacu,   
 Nimutyo twamamaz'iyo nkuru nziza,   
 Ubu tugiye kugerayo.

  **4**   
Mbeg'umunezero tuzagirirayo!   
Twegereje kuger'iwacu,   
 Ntituzongera kubogoz'amarira,   
 Ubu tugiye kugerayo.

title: 244 Muze Dusingiz'Umwami
markdown:
### 244 Muze Dusingiz'Umwami   

  **1**   
 Muze dusingiz'Umwami,   
 Abera muz'imbere ye,   
 Abahora mumuramya,   
 Mwamamaz'ububasha bwe.

  **2**   
Mumusingiriz'ahera,   
 Muririmbe mwisanzuye,   
Nimumuramye mwunamye,   
 Mumwubahe kukw'abumva.

  **3**   
Murahoran'ubuntu bwe   
 butemba buv'i Siyoni,   
 N'Umuremyi, N'Uhoraho,   
 Bose nibamusingize.

title: 245 Ahw'Umukiza Anyobora
markdown:
### 245 Ahw'Umukiza Anyobora   

  **1**   
 Ahw'Umukiza anyobora,   
 Nzemera mukurikire,   
 Nzamukurikir'iteka,   
 Sinzakorwa n'isoni.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ahw'Umukiza anyobora,   
 Nzemera mukurikire,   
 Ahw'azanyobora hose,   
 Nzajya mukurikira.

  **2**   
N'ubwo haba mu mwijima,   
 Nkagenda nyobagurika,   
 Nzumv'ijwi ry'uwo   
 Mukiza rinsubizemw'intege.

  **3**   
N'ubw'isi yambushabusha,   
 Nkabur'epfo na ruguru,   
 Mukiza uzandamira,   
 Ntabwo nzarambarara.

  **4**   
Ibi byago nibishira,   
 Azanyijyanir'iwacu,   
 Ntihabay'umubabaro,   
 Nzaba ntanye n'ibyaha.

title: 246 Twumvire Mwami
markdown:
### 246 Twumvire Mwami   

  Twumvire Mwami,   
 Turakuramya,   
 Uduteg'amatwi,   
 Duh'amahoro. Amen.

title: 247 Nzinutsw'Ibyo Mw Isi
markdown:
### 247 Nzinutsw'Ibyo Mw Isi   

  **1**   
 Nzinutsw'ibyo mw'isi, Mpisemo Yesu!   
Sinzifatanya nabyo, Mpisemo Yesu!   
N'isi y'umwijima, Nta buruhukiro,   
 Yesu niwe mugisha, Mpisemo Yesu!

  **2**   
Wa si we, winshuka, Mpisemo Yesu!   
Nzabana naw'iteka, Namuhisemo,   
 Ibyo mw'isi byose, n'iby'igihe gito,   
 Bimeneka nk'ibumba, Mpisemo Yesu! 

  **3**   
Iby'isi n'inzozi, Mpisemo Yesu!   
Niwe umber'umucyo, Mpisemo Yesu!   
Nashatse kwikiza, Binsubiz'inyuma,   
 Yesu niwe wanyuze, Niwe mpisemo! 

  **4**   
Ntabwo ntiny'urupfu, Mpisemo Yesu!   
Nshaka kubahw'iteka, Mpisemo Yesu!   
Ndashaka kugera, Aho nzab'iteka,   
 Nzaba mu gituza cye, Mpisemo Yesu.

title: 248 Mutima Wanjye Ucururuke
markdown:
### 248 Mutima Wanjye Ucururuke   

  **1**   
 Mutima wanjye ucururuke,   
 Nugir'ibiguter'impagarara,   
  Wiringire Ishobora byose,   
 N'imigambi yayo myiza.

  **2**   
Mutima wanjy'iby'ari byo byose,   
 N'ubw'ibihe byagenda bihinduka,   
 Imbabazi, zayo ntizishira,   
 Zihorahw'ibihe byose.

  **3**   
Mutima wanjye uremerewe,   
 N'ubwo wab'utew'ubwoba n'urupfu,   
 Ni wiheba wisung'Uwiteka,   
 Agukingurir'ijuru.

  **4**   
Mutima wanjy'uhereye kera,   
 Ntiwigeze ubur'umudendezo,   
 Isung'Imana izakwakira,   
 Wemere kugengwa na yo.

  **5**   
Ubugingo bwiza buboneye,   
 Bushishikarira gukor'ibyiza,   
 Mukiza mfasha ngo mbugereho,   
 Ump'umutim'utunganye.

title: 249 Ikuzo Ni Iryawe!
markdown:
### 249 Ikuzo Ni Iryawe!   

  **1**   
 Ikuzo n'iryawe Data wa Twese,   
 Nari nahabiye kure yawe,   
 Wangejeje mu mucyo w'itangaza,   
 Umvana mu bubata ndakira.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbeg'urukundo ruhebuje!   
 Nababariwe,  N'inkuru nziza kuri twe.

  **2**   
Mbeg'urukundo rutarondoreka!   
Rwatumye Yesu azakunshaka.   
Nar'umuhanya sinari nkwiriye,   
 Gukira ngukesha Yesu gusa.

  **3**   
Akir'uyu mutima wanjye Mwami,   
 Nkweguriy'imibereho yanjye,   
 Wowe wanyitangiye ukankiza,   
 Wanyejeshej'amaraso yawe.

  **4**   
Mana yanjye nkingira ndakwinginze,   
 Sinashobora kwirwanirira,   
 Kugira ngo nzanezererw'iteka,   
 Twishimye, Dusingiza Umwami.

title: 250 Umukiza Niw'Unyobora
markdown:
### 250 Umukiza Niw'Unyobora   

  **1**   
 Umukiza niw'unyobor'iyo ndi mu bishuko,   
 N'iy'amakub'angose, Amber'ubuhungiro,   
 Niw'unkingir'ibishuko, Yesu nyiyoborere.

  **2**   
Uhosh'umuraba nk'umubyey'uhoz'umwana we,   
 Ndets'uranawutegek'ubwaw'ukakumvira,   
 Mwami wanjye Yesu nkunda, Ujy'Unyiyoborera.

  **3**   
Iyo negerey'inkengero ngashy'ubwoba,   
 Nkakwihishamo, Ndaruhuka, Nkumv'umpumuriz'uti:   
 Witinya ntacy'uteze kuba, Nzajya nkuyobora.

title: 251 Yesu Araduhamagara!
markdown:
### 251 Yesu Araduhamagara!   

  **1**   
 Yes'araduhamagara, Ashaka kudukiza,   
 Atubwiz'ijwi rye ati: Mukristo nkurikira.

  **2**   
Yes'araduhamagara, Ngo tuve mu by'iyi si,   
 Araduhamagar'ati: Mukristo nkunda cyane.

  **3**   
Iyo tumerewe neza, Cyangwa se tubabaye,   
 Araduhamagar'ati: Mukristo nkunda rwose.

  **4**   
Yes'araduhamagara, Mwami turakwitabye,   
 Duhe kukumvira, Tugukunde kuruta byose.

title: 252 Nimucane Amatabaza
markdown:
### 252 Nimucane Amatabaza   

  **1**   
 Nimucan'amatabaza,   
 Umwijim'ubay'icyago,   
 Hazab'umwijim'ukaze,   
 Umwam'ataragaruka.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mubonez'amatabaza,   
 Kandi nimwubah'Imana,   
 Kuza kw'Umwami kuri hafi,   
 Mubonez'amatabaza.

  **2**   
Abant'ibihumbi byinshi,   
 Bahinyur'ubu butumwa,   
 Natwe tubushikamyemo,   
 Dutegerez'Umukiza.

  **3**   
Ijambo rye n'itabaza,   
 Ntituzigera tuyoba,
