 N'ubw'amakub'ari hose,   
 Ntabw'Iman'izaduhana.

  **4**   
Dukor'imirimo myiza,   
 Twe guh'ab'iy'is'urwaho,   
 Tuzabiherw'imigisha,   
 Nidukomeza kwizera.

title: 253 Ujyuvug'Ibya Yesu
markdown:
### 253 Ujyuvug'Ibya Yesu   

  **1**   
 Ujy'uvug'ibya Yesu, Inshuti y'ukuri,   
 Ngwin'uduhumurish'ibyo yagukoreye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Vuga Yesu gusa,   
 Bizakuyobor'iteka,   
 Jy'ubivug'uririmba,   
 Kandi unasenga.

  **2**   
Ujy'uvug'ibya Yes'uzumv'ubabariwe,   
 No kubw'ubuntu bwe tuzagera mw'ijuru.

  **3**   
Sinabura kuvug'iby'umusaraba we,   
 Nkund'uwo Mukiza, Kuko yanyitangiye.

  **4**   
Uvug'ibya Yesu, Ntupfush'igih'ubusa,   
 Kutita ku nshingano, Bitesh'agaciro.

  **5**   
Ujy'uvug'ibya Yesu, N'ubwo wacogora,   
 Va mu ntege nke zawe, Umwiyegurire.

title: 254 Ushimirw'Ibyiza Byose
markdown:
### 254 Ushimirw'Ibyiza Byose   

  **1**   
 Ushimirwe ibyiza byose, Siyoni murwa w'Imana,   
 Itavuguruzwa yakugiz'ubuturo bwayo bwite,   
 Wubatswe ku Rutare rw'iteka, N'iki cyaguhangara?   
Ugoteshejw'inkike z'agakiza, Reka gutiny'abanzi bawe.

  **2**   
Dore amazi y'ubugingo, Atemb'ava mu rukundo,   
 Niy'abeshahw'abana bawe, Imibabar'igashira.   
Ninde se wacogora, Har'uwo mugez'umar'inyota?   
Ubuntu bw'uwo Mutanga-bugingo,tabwo buzagir'iherezo.

  **3**   
Ahazenguruts'uwo murwa, Har'ibicu n'umuriro,   
 Byerekana ko kugaruka kw'Umwami kuri bugufi,   
 Hahirw'abazatur'i Siyoni, Bejeshejw'amaraso,   
 Biyeguriye Yes'abahindur'abami, N'abatambyi b'Imana.

  **4**   
Ndi mu muryango w'i Siyoni, Kubw'ubuntu bwawe Mwami,   
 N'ubwo bampindur'urw'amenyo, Nzasingiz'izina ryawe,   
 Ibinezeza byo mur'iyi si, Bihita nk'umuyaga,   
 Umunezero uhoraho, Wateguriw'abana b'i Siyoni.

title: 255 Mbes'Aho Tuzahurira Ku Cyambu?
markdown:
### 255 Mbes'Aho Tuzahurira Ku Cyambu?   

  **1**   
 Mbes'aho tuzahurira ku cyambu cya rwa ruzi,   
 Ahahor'umucy'iteka, Ntihab'umubabaro?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbes'aho tuzahurira ku cyambu cya rwa ruzi?   
Tuzabonanirayo tuhanezererw'iteka?

  **2**   
Tuzahurira ku cyamb'urugendo rurangiye?   
Mbes'aho tuzahurirayo, Maze twiruhutse? 

  **3**   
Mbes'aho twese tuzahurira mu mudugudu,   
 Wubatswe n'Uhoraho, Urimbishijwe yasipi? 

  **4**   
Abacunguwe bose, Bazaririmb'indirimbo,   
 Kand'ibiremwa byose bizasingiz'Uhoraho.

  **5**   
Mbes'aho tuzabonana n'abo twakundanaga,   
 Maze twumv'amajwi yabo tubareba mu maso? 

  **6**   
Mbese tuzabonana na Krist'Umukiza wacu,   
 Aje kujyan'intore ze mu bwami buhoraho?

title: 256 Abatuye Mw'Isi Mwese
markdown:
### 255 Mbes'Aho Tuzahurira Ku Cyambu?   

  **1**   
 Abatuye mw'isi mwese,   
 Muririmbir'Uhoraho,   
 Mumukorere mwishima,   
 Mwogez'icyubahiro cye.

  **2**   
Mumenye kw'ari we Mana,   
 Kukw'ariwe waturemye,   
 Twese tur'umukumbi we,   
 Turagiwe n'Uhoraho.

  **3**   
Muze mwese mu rugo rwe,   
 Muze mwese mumushima,   
 Muhanik'amajwi yanyu,   
 Kukw aribyo bikwiriye.

  **4**   
Mwabaza muti: ni kuki?   
Nuk'Uhoraho ari mwiza,   
 N'impuhwe ze zikaramba,   
 Nta n'ubwo zizashiraho.

title: 257 Yesu Mucunguzi Wanjye
markdown:
### 257 Yesu Mucunguzi Wanjye   

  **1**   
 Yesu Mucunguzi wanjye,   
 Niwe byishimo byanjye,   
 Ni wowe ujy'ungoboka,   
 Mu bihe by'amakuba.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yesu Mucunguzi wanjye,   
 Niwe ndirimbo yanjye,   
 Nta yindi nshuti nabona,   
 Nagereranya nawe.

  **2**   
Wagumye kumpumuriza,   
 Mu bihe bibi byose,   
 Ubwo nari nshumbirijwe,   
 Ngoswe n'imibabaro.

  **3**   
Ur'ibyiringiro byanjye,   
 Ndayob'ukanyobora,   
 Ni wowe nshuti y'ukuri,   
 Undutir'abo mw'isi.

  **4**   
Ni wow'undem'umutima,   
 Mur'iyi si y'ibyaha,   
 Nzakomeza ngusingize,   
 Ngez'ubwo nzaz'iwawe.

title: 258 Yasezeranye Kuduh'Imvura
markdown:
### 258 Yasezeranye Kuduh'Imvura   

  **1**   
 Yasezeranye kuduha,   
 Imvura y'umugisha,   
 Iri sezerano ryayo,   
 Ryaturutse mw'ijuru.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Duh'umugisha,   
 Turifuz'umugisha,   
 Uvuy'iwawe mw'ijuru,   
 Nyabuneka wuduhe.

  **2**   
Yasezeranye kuduha,   
 Imvura y'umugisha,   
 Yitugoborer'uyu muns'   
ikwir'impanda zose.

  **3**   
Yasezeranye kuduha,   
 Imvura y'umugisha,   
 Turayifuz'uy'umunsi,   
 Sohoz'ibyo wavuze.

  **4**   
Yasezeranye kuduha,   
 Imvura y'umugisha,   
 Icyayiduh'uyu munsi,   
 Mana tubabarire.

title: 259 Inkomangiro Yawe Yafata?
markdown:
### 259 Inkomangiro Yawe Yafata ?   

  **1**   
 Inkomangiro yawe yafata,   
 Umuraba w'ibyag'uguteye?   
Ukagukanagira nk'ingoyi,   
 Inkomangiro yaw'izashikama?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Dufit'inkomangir'itsika,   
 Imiraba yiyungikanya,   
 Ikomangiye ku Rutare,   
 Rushikamye, Umukiza wacu.

  **2**   
Nib'itsitse ntizateraganwa,   
 Ifashwe n'ukuboko k'Umwami,   
 Imirunga ye iraduhuza,   
 Bitewe n'imbaraga y'ikomeye.

  **3**   
Izashikama mu gihe kibi,   
 Ubw imivumb'izab'ihurura,   
 Umuyaga w'ishuher'usheze,   
 Ntabwo bizarenga ku bwato bwacu.

  **4**   
Ndetse no mu gihe kibi cyane,   
 Twifuz'amazi yaduhembura,   
 Tuzatsika ku nkombe z'ijuru,   
 Umugar'ushire buheriheri.

  **5**   
Ubw'igitondo kizatangaza,   
 N'amarembo arabagirana,   
 Tuzatsika ku nkombe z'ijuru,   
 Umugar'ushire buheriheri.

title: 260 Nta Rindi Zina Nka Yesu
markdown:
### 260 Nta Rindi Zina Nka Yesu   

  **1**   
 Nta rindi zina nka Yesu,   
 N'izina rihebuje,   
 Rihimbar'abo mw'ijuru,   
 N'abakristo bo mw'isi.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Zina (zina) ryiza (ryiza),   
 Nta rihwanye n'irya Yesu,   
 Zina (zina) ryiza (ryiza),   
 Nta rihwanye n'irya Yesu.

  **2**   
Nta rindi zina nka Yesu,   
 Rimar'imibabaro,   
 Nta zina ryahwana n'irye,   
 Ndetse no mu mahoro.

  **3**   
Mfit'ibyiringiro byo   
 kuzamubon'agarutse,   
 Nizeye kw'azanyakira,   
 Maz'akampumuriza.

  **4**   
Nib'ashaka ko mukorera   
 mu ruzabibu rwe,   
 Azampira mu byo nkora,   
 Kand'ahir'ibyo mvuga.

  **5**   
Nah'urupfu rwanyegura,   
 Kuko nd'umukungugu,   
 Ntacyo bizaba bintwaye,   
 Niringiy'Umukiza.

title: 261 Singizwa Yesu
markdown:
### 261 Singizwa Yesu   

  **1**   
 Singizwa Yesu, Umukiza Yazutse,   
 Yesu yaneshej'urupfu, Iteka ryose,   
 Marayik'ufit'umucyo, Aramanuka,   
 Yakinguye igituro, Yesu aranesha,   
 Singizwa Yesu, Umukiza Yazutse,   
 Yesu yaneshej'urupfu, Iteka ryose.

  **2**   
Itegereze: Ni Yesu Umukiza,   
Umucunguzi w'abantu, Ntushidikanye,   
 Ishime kand'uririmbe! Yesu ariho!      
Ongera ubyamamaze, Yesu ni muzima.   
Itegereze: Ni Yesu Umukiza,   
 Umucunguzi w'abantu, Ntushidikanye.

  **3**   
Nta bwoba mfite! Yesu ni muzima pe!   
Nzajya musingiz'iteka, Mahoro yanjye.   
Yesu yaraneshereje niwe nizeye.   
Ni Yesu umbeshejeho, Sinzigera ntinya,   
 Nta bwoba mfite! Yesu ni muzima pe!   
Nzajya musingiz'iteka, Mahoro yanjye.

title: 262 Nyir'Impuhwe Nyinshi
markdown:
### 262 Nyir'Impuhwe Nyinshi   

  **1**   
 Nyir'impuhwe nyinshi cyane,   
 Iman'ibabarira,   
 Kwibagirw'ibyaha   
 ikababarir'uwagomye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S na A:**   
Ndaje Yesu, Ndakwitabye,   
 Uko ndi kos'unyemere,   
 Ndaje Yesu ndakwitabye,   
 Mukiz'unyakire.   
 **S na A:**   
Ndaje Yesu, Ndakwitabye,   
 Uko ndi ko.. unyemere,   
 Ndaje Yesu, Ndakwitabye,   
 Mukiz'unyakire.

  **2**   
Nari kure y'uwo nkunda,   
 Mbabaj'umutima we,   
 Kuko namwimagahw'aba,   
 N'uwanjye yamfiriye.

  **3**   
Yesu ndakwiyeguriye,   
 Ndashaka kubaturwa,   
 Icyaha cyose cyambase,   
 Maze ngikire rwose.

  **4**   
Haleluya yanduhuye,   
 Ubu sinshidikanya,   
 Nderekez'iyo mw'ijur,   
 Nejejwe no kubayo.

title: 263 Bazany'Amaturo Yabo
markdown:
### 263 Bazany'Amaturo Yabo   

  **1**   
 Bazany'amaturo yabo, Kuyatur'Umwami Yesu,   
 Kuko bari bamukunze, Maze barayamutura.   
Iyo neza n'urukundo, Byafashij'umukene,   
 N'amaturo yose batuye, Yar'ay'agaciro.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Muture Yes'amaturo,   
 Biramunezeza rwose,   
 Muhay'umutima wanjye,   
 Ndamwiyeguriye.

  **2**   
Umukene yar'ahagaze, Kure y'abaturaga,   
  Maz'abony'uburyo batura, Agir'umunezero.   
Yuzurwa n'ibyishimo, By'ayo maturo batuye,   
 We, yar'afit'ituro rito, Imbere y'Umwami.

  **3**   
Abwiran'Umwam'agahinda, Ati: Nz'ineza yawe,   
 Akir'iri turo ngutuye, Niryo mutima wanjye,   
 Yes'asubiza yitonze, Ati: S'ituro rito,   
 Nubw'abandi batuye menshi, Urabarengeje.

title: 264 Ari Hafi Kuza
markdown:
### 264 Ari Hafi Kuza   

  **1**   
 Ari hafi kuza, Nahimbazwe Yesu,   
 Azakorany'abatoni be, Bajyane mw'ijuru,   
 Turebe mw'ijuru, Twishime araje!   
Aje mu cyubahiro cye, Mucunguzi wacu.

  **2**   
Ari hafi kuza, Nahimbazwe Yesu,   
 Imibabaro yacu yose, Ntizibukw'ukundi,   
 Yes'azakuraho, Urupfu burundu,   
 Azaza tuban'iteka, Mucunguzi wacu.

  **3**   
Ari hafi kuza, Nahimbazwe Yesu,   
 Azaz'atungutse ku bicu, Ntidutinye rwose,   
 Twubure amaso, Nguriya araje!   
Aje kujyana njye nawe, Mucunguzi wacu.

title: 265 Ndakwifuza Yesu Mwiza
markdown:
### 265 Ndakwifuza Yesu Mwiza   

  **1**   
 Ndifuza Yesu Mwiza, Ndagukennye cyane,   
 Nd'umushyitsi n'umwimukira, Singira gakondo,   
 Ndifuz'urukundo, Rwawe rumpumuriza,   
 Runyobora ngakomera cyane, Sintezuke.

  **2**   
Ndifuz'umutima wa Yesu ngo nduhuke,   
 Ng'untere kumutur'imibabaro yanjye yose,   
 Ndifuz'Umwuka Wera, Ngw'ambwir'icyo ndi cyo,   
 Arusheho kunyereka Umwana w'Intama.

  **3**   
Ndakwifuza Yesu, Nshaka kuzakubona,   
 Ugoswe n'umukororombya ku ntebe ya cyami,   
 Nzahora nezeranywe n'abo wacunguye,   
 Nzahora ngusingiz'iteka, Ndi kumwe nawe.

title: 266 Iby'Usahaka Nibibeho
markdown:
### 266 Iby'Usahaka Nibibeho   

  **1**   
 Mukiza naraguhemukiye,   
 Ndanakwimura ku mpamvu nkeya,   
 Utungany'umutima wanjy'iby'ushaka bibe.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Iby'ushaka (ushaka) nibibeho (bibeho),   
 Utungany'umutima wanjye,   
 Iby'ushaka bibe.

  **2**   
Nari mfit'imibabaro myinshi,   
 Ntakir'inshuti nahemukiye,   
 N'ubu ngubu ndacyavuga,   
 Nt'iby'ushaka bibe.

  **3**   
Umwuka waw'utangir'ubuntu,   
 Agenderer'umutima wanjye,   
 Humuriz'umutima wanjy'   
ibyushaka bibe.

  **4**   
Hindur'ubugingo bwanjye bushya,   
 Ubutegeke bub'uk'ushaka,   
 Ndind'ibimbuza kuvuga,   
 Iby'ushaka bibe

title: 267 Haba Ubwo Umwijima Ubudika
markdown:
### 267 Haba Ubwo Umwijima Ubudika   

  **1**   
 Hab'ubw'umwijim'ubudika,   
 Maze nkabur'inzira pe,   
 Ibyago bikiyongeranya,   
 Bikantera no kwiheba.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nzahungira kuri Yesu (kuri Yesu),   
 Kukw'ariw'undush'imbaraga (imbaragaa),   
 Nzahungira kuri Yesu (kuri Yesu),   
 Kukw'ariw'undush'imbaraga.

  **2**   
Hab'umunsi umbera mubi,   
 Natambuka ngateguza,   
 Nuko nkumva nguy'agacuho,   
 Maze nkisunga Rutare.

  **3**   
Nzanikomeza ku Rutare,   
 Nibwo nzashir'agahinda,   
 Nirwo ruzanshoboz'inzira,   
 Zirimw'ibihanamanga.

title: 268 Nimusingize Umukiza
markdown:
### 268 Nimusingize Umukiza   

  **1**   
 Nimusingiz'Umukiza, Mumurebe mukire,   
 N'abanyabyaha nibaze, Arabamar'inyota,   
 N'ubwo yigeze kwicisha bugufi, Yar'Umwami,   
 Impumyi zihumuka kubw'amaraso ya Yesu.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Abantu bose basingiz'Umukiza wazutse,   
 Musingiz'uwo Mukiza, Ubavana mu byaha.

  **2**   
Nimusingiz'uwo Mukiza, Mwese mumuramye,   
 Abamushakan'umwete, Nabo azabakira,   
 Bavuy'impande zose, Bihuta banezerewe,   
 Batwaye umusaraba wa Yesu, Abakize.

  **3**   
Nimumuh'icyubahiro, Niwe Mwana w'Imana,   
 Ndetse n'abatamwitaho, Arabiyegereza,   
Ngo bajye bibuk'umusaraba yatangiyeho,   
 Bib'uruhererekane mu bantu, Bamuramye.

  **4**   
Mumusingize mu ndirimbo, No mu masengesho,   
 Umucunguzi wikoreye ibyaha by'abantu,   
 Abato n'abakuru bamwubahe, Bamuramye,   
Ibipfamatwi byumve, N'ibiragi biririmbe

title: 269 Hari Igihugu Kibamo Umucyo
markdown:
### 269 Hari Igihugu Kibamo Umucyo   

  **1**   
 Har'igihugu kibamw'   
umucyo urabagirana,   
 Ntabwo habayo umwijima,   
 Yesu n'umucyo waho.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Twemer'umusaraba,   
 Tuzambikw'ikamba,   
 Dukomez'iby'ukuri,   
 Nibwo tuzagerayo.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Twemer'u ...sa...saraba,   
 Tuzambikw'ika... ikamba,   
 Dukome... by'u... by'ukuri,   
 Nibwo tuzagerayo.

  **2**   
Ibihe byaho ni byiza rwose,   
 Nta mpinduk'ibayo,   
 Ntabwo habay'impagarara,   
 Tuhabik'ubutunzi.

  **3**   
Mw'ijuru hariy'amazu   
 meza arabagirana,   
 Tuzahahurira n'inshuti,   
 Twakiranw'ibyishimo.

  **4**   
Twifuza cyane kwimuka vuba,   
 Mur'iyi s'ishaje,   
 Tujye guturana n'abera,   
 Maze dut'umuruho.

title: 270 Nyobora Mwami Wanjye
markdown:
### 270 Nyobora Mwami Wanjye   

  **1**   
 Nyobora Mwami wanjye (Mwami wanjye),   
 Ne kurorongotana (mbane nawe),   
 Mb'amahor'unyoboye (unyoboye),   
 Iyo nkuri bugufi (nkuri bugufi).

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mukiza we, Mpabura nahabiye kure,   
 Unyambutse mw'isumo (mw'isumo),   
 Mwami ngendane nawe (nawe).

  **2**   
Iyo ngeze mu kaga (ncits'intege)   
 Umber'ubuhungiro (buhungiro),   
 Nyakiran'imbabazi (imbabazi),   
 Nezerwa turi kumwe (turi kumwe).

  **3**   
Ntabara Mwami mwiza (Mwami mwiza),   
 Mu mibabaro yanjye (yanjye yose),   
 Kugez'ubwo nzager'aho (nzager'aho),   
 Ntazarir'ukundi (ntazarir'ukundi).

title: 271 Mbese Ngend'Imbokoboko?
markdown:
### 271 Mbese Ngend'Imbokoboko?   

  **1**   
 Mbese ngend'imbokoboko,   
 Nsanganiy'Umukiza wanjye?   
Nta cyiza namukoreye,   
 Mbese ngend'imbokoboko?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbese ngende ntacyo mfite,   
 Nsanganir'uwo Mwami wanjye,   
 Nta n'umwe namukirije,   
 Mbese ngende ntacyo mfite?

  **2**   
Sinterw'ubwoba n'urupfu,   
 Umukiza yarankijije.   
Ku musanga ntacyo mfite,   
 Numva binkojej'isoni.

  **3**   
Napfushij'igih'ubusa,   
 Nakoz'ibyangwa n'Umukiza,   
 Ubu ndamutakambira,   
 Musaba kumbabarira.

  **4**   
Mwebw'abera mushishikare,   
 Mukore hakiri kare,   
 Dor'ijoro riraguye,   
 Mutarakiz'imitima.

title: 272 Yesu Niwe Rufatiro
markdown:
### 272 Yesu Niwe Rufatiro   

  **1**   
 Yesu niwe rufatiro,   
 Twubakahw'ingo zacu,   
 N'Urutare rukomeye,   
 Ntabwo runyegenyega.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Yesu n'Urutare,   
 Bwugamo bwacu,   
 Yesu niwe soko,   
 Y'umunezero.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Yesu Rutare, Yesu n'Urutare,   
 Bwugamo bwacu, cubwacu   
 Yesu ni soko, Yesu niwe soko,   
 Y'umunezero.

  **2**   
Iyo turi kumwe nawe,   
 Atwuzuz'urukundo,   
 Niwe byiringiro byacu,   
 Atwonger'imbaraga.

  **3**   
Duh'urukundo nyakuri,   
 Ukomez'ingo zacu,   
 Turind'imigambi mibi,   
 Iva kuri sekibi.

title: 273 Yesu Ntabwo Yakwanga
markdown:
### 273 Yesu Ntabwo Yakwanga   

  **1**   
 Yesu ntabwo yakwanga, N'ubw'ur'umunyabyaha,   
 Niwe nshuti ihebuje, Ntazanga kukwakira,   
 Imana yatanze Yesu, Kugira ngo ducungurwe,   
 N'ubwo wamuhemukiye, Ntazanga kukwakira.

  **2**   
N'ubw'ujy'umugayisha, Ntazakwirengagiza,   
 Niwe nzira n'umucyo, Ntazanga kukwakira,   
 Azagusendahw'ibyaha, maz'usigar'utunganye,   
 Azagukiz'urupfu, Ntabw'azakwirengagiza.

  **3**   
Ngaho ngwin'utiganda, Ntazanga kukwakira,   
 Gana ku musaraba, Ntazanga kukwakira,   
 Numara gusanga Yesu, Ntuzasubira mu byaha,   
 Ngwino uhabw'ubugingo, Butagir'iherezo.

title: 274 Uhoraho Iyo Nitegereje
markdown:
### 274 Uhoraho Iyo Nitegereje   

  **1**   
 Uhoraho, Iyo nitegereje,   
 Ibitangaza by'ibyo wakoze,   
 Ar'izuba, N'ukwezi n'inyenyeri,   
 N'ibindi bintu byose waremye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nishimira kukuririmbira,   
 Mana nkuru y'urukundo   
 Nishimira kukuririmbira,   
 Mana nkuru, Y'urukundo.

  **2**   
Mana nkunda, Iyo nitegereje,   
 Igiti cyose mu byo waremye,   
 Binyibutsa igiti cy'i Kalvari,   
 Umwana wawe yambambiweho.

  **3**   
Iyo numva inyoni ziririmba   
 mu biti byiza yaturemeye,   
 Urusobe rw'amajwi yazo meza   
 n'urw'amasumo biranezeza.

  **4**   
Igih'ibyago bizaba bishize,   
 Abera bose bagukikije,   
 Tuzagusingiza iteka ryose,   
 Kandi turamy'Uwatwitangiye.

title: 275 Nzasa Na Yesu
markdown:
### 275 Nzasa Na Yesu   

  **1**   
 N'ubw'ibyiza by'isi byancuka, Nzasa na Yesu,   
 Ntacyo mw'isi kizampindura, Nzasa na Yesu.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nzasa na Yesu rwose,   
 Niyo ndirimbo yanjye,   
 Ndi hanze n'imuhira,   
 Nzajya nsa na Yesu.

  **2**   
Nabohow'ingoyi z'umwanzi, Nzasa na Yesu,   
 Nzarushaho kumukorera, Nzasa na Yesu.

  **3**   
Naba mw'isi cyangwa mw'ijuru, Nzasa na Yesu,   
 Nzahora mbyamamaz'iteka, Nzasa na Yesu.

  **4**   
Kugira ngo nzajye mw'ijuru, Nzasa na Yesu,   
 Kuko nifuza kuzashimwa, Nzasa na Yesu.

title: 276 Iyi Isi Niya Data
markdown:
### 276 Iyi Isi Niya Data   

  **1**   
 Iy'isi n'iya Data, Kand'iyo ntez'amatwi,   
 Numv'ibiremwa bisingiza izina rye mu ndirimbo,   
 Isi n'iya Data, Mpora mbitekereza,   
 Iby'Uhoraho yaremye byose, Ni byiza bitangaje.

  **2**   
Iy'isi n'iya Data, Inyoni ziririmba,   
 Umuseke wa mu gitondo, N'impumuro y'uburabyo,   
 Ibimera byose, Hamwe n'ibyo mw'ijuru,   
 Byose bigaragaz'ububasha, N'imbaraga ze nyinshi.

  **3**   
Iy'isi n'iya Data, N'ubwo yuzuy'ibyaha,   
 Nta kizaganz'imbaraga ze, Azahor'ari ku ngoma,   
 Isi n'iya Data, Mbese nakwiganyira?   
Imana yac'izahora ku ngom'ibihe bidashira.

  **4**   
Iy'isi n'iya Data, Ntabwo nzabyibagirwa,   
 N'ubw'ibyaha biyuzuyemo, Imana n'umuyobozi,   
 Isi n'iya Data, Ni kuki nababara?   
Data niwe uri ku ngoma, Ijuru n'isi byishime.

title: 277 Isi N'Ibiyirimo
markdown:
### 277 Isi N'Ibiyirimo   

  **1**   
 Isi n'ibiyirimo, Byose n'iby'Imana,   
 Twese tur'ab'Imana, N'ubutunzi bwose,   
 Imana ni nyir'ibintu byose, Turi ibisonga byayo,   
 Dukwiriye kuyitunganira, Tub'ibisonga nyakuri.

  **2**   
Impano waduhaye, Ziguhesh'ikuzo,   
 Duhe kuzikoresha, Mu murimo wawe,   
 Zijye zikugaragaza Mwami, Ahantu hose tunyura,   
 Impano waduhaye Mukiza, Tuzikoresh'umurimo.

  **3**   
Igihe waduhaye, N'impan'ikomeye,   
 Tugikoreshe neza, Twitegur'Umwami,   
 Buri gihe tubane n'Imana, Dukoresh'igihe neza,   
 Igihe Imana yaduhaye, Tugikoresh'umurimo.

  **4**   
Yaduhay'ubutunzi ngo tubukoreshe,   
 Ibyo dutunze byose, Byose n'iby'Imana,   
 Tube ibisonga yishimira, Dukiranukir'Imana,   
 Ibyo dutunze tubikoreshe, Umurimo w'Uwiteka.

title: 278 Bona N'Ubwo Ngoswe N'Ibicu
markdown:
### 278 Bona N'Ubwo Ngoswe N'Ibicu   

  **1**   
 Bona n'ubwo ngoswe n'ibicu,   
 Kandi nkab'inkehwe,   
 Kandi nkaba ndembejwe   
 n'amaganya menshi cyane.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nagira Yesu wenyine,   
 Byose byatamuruka,   
 Niwe zuba ryaka nk'   
inyenyeri y'i Betelehemu.

  **2**   
N'ubw'urugendo rwo mw'isi   
 rwantera gucogora,   
 Najya gusingir'uburabyo,   
 Ngasingir'amahwa.

  **3**   
N'ubw'umutima wanjye,   
 Wazirikan'Uwankunze,   
 Bigatuma ngir'agahinda,   
 Kenshi nkababara.

  **4**   
Nzirikany'icyubahiro,   
 Ntegereje kwinjira,   
 Navuga Yesu wenyine,   
 Byose byatamuruka.

title: 279 Intama Mirongo Cyenda N'Icyenda
markdown:
### 279 Intama Mirongo Cyenda N'Icyenda   

  **1**   
 Intama mirongo cyenda n'icyenda,   
 Zari mu kiraro cyazo,   
 Imwe yazimiye yararagiye,   
 Yagiye mu bihanamanga,   
 Dor'irazerera mu kidaturwa,   
 Yasiz'Umwungeri w'impuhwe nyinshi,   
 Yasiz'Umwungeri w'impuhwe nyinshi.

  **2**   
Ufite mirongo cyenda n'icyenda,   
 Mbese warets'iyo Mwami,   
 Aransubiz'ati: Nayo n'iyanjye,   
 Ibarirwa mu ntama zanjye,   
 Bona nahw'inzira yakukumuka,   
 Ndayikurikira mu kidaturwa,   
 Ndebe ko nabasha kuyibonayo.

  **3**   
Nta muntu wamenya uko yarushye,   
 N'uko yambuts'imigezi,   
 Ryar'ijoro ribi kandi ntaw'uzi,   
 Uko yataruy'iyo ntama,   
 Yumvis'ijwi ryayo mu kidaturwa,   
 Ntabwo yagirag'uwayitabara,   
 Rwose yar'ishigaje hat'igapfa.

  **4**   
Mwami nyerek'inzira wanyuzemo,   
 Mbone mw'amaraso yawe,   
 Yavuye ku bwacu twarazimiye,   
 Maz'utugarura mu bushyo,   
 Nyereka za nkovu zo mu biganza,   
 Wakomerekejwe muri ryo joro,   
 N'igihe bakwambikaga ya mahwa.

  **5**   
Ku misozi hose no mu bikombe,   
 No ku bitare ku manga,   
 Har'ijwi rirenga ngo nimwishime,   
 Intama yanjye yabonetse,   
 Abamarayika bavuga bati:   
 Nimwishim'Umwam'abony'intama ye,   
 Nimwishim'Umwam'abony'intama ye.

title: 280 Mu Gihugu Cyiza Twasezeraniwe
markdown:
### 280 Mu Gihugu Cyiza Twasezeraniwe   

  **1**   
 Mu gihugu cyiza twasezeraniwe,   
 Hariy'ururembo rwera rw'Imana,   
 Tuzamuk'imisozi tunaniwe,   
 Tukarabukw'aho tuzab'iteka.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Tugeze hafi, Hafi y'iwacu,   
 Dore hararabagirana cyane,   
 Har'umucy'uturuka mu marembo,   
 Aho niho tuzab'iteka ryose,   
 Turirimbana n'abamarayika,   
 Turi hafi yaho.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Tuge tugeze y'iwacu,  Hafi y'iwacu,   
 Dore hararabagirana cyane,   
 Har'umucy'uturuka mu marembo,   
 Aho niho tuzab'iteka ryose,   
 Turirimbana n'abamarayika,   
 Turi, turi hafi ho.

  **2**   
Mu bitabo by'abahanuzi tubwirwa,   
 Iby'umudugudu wera w'Imana,   
 N'inzira zaho zisizwe zahabu,   
 Amazu yahw'ararabagirana.

  **3**   
Abazajyayo n'abizera bakeya,   
 Bakomez'amategeko y'Imana,   
 Tuzahora turangurur'amajwi,   
 Turirimb'indirimbo z'ibyishimo.

  **4**   
Mbese tuzahurirayo bene Data,   
 Mu gihugu kirasirwa n'izuba?   
Nimwemera ubutumwa bw'Imana,   
 Yesu n'aza azabahamagara.

title: 281 Wiringir'Umwam'Imana
markdown:
### 281 Wiringir'Umwam'Imana   

  **1**   
 Wiringir'Umwam'Imana,   
 Kukw'ari y'izakuyobora,   
 Izere Nyir'imigisha,   
 Niw'uzagukenura.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Izer'uko yakubwiye,   
 Yihang'amas'iteka ryose,   
 Uyiringire ibihe byose,   
 Niyo Mwungeri wawe.

  **2**   
Wiringir'Umwam'Imana,   
 Umushukanyi nakwegera,   
 Wiringir'Umwam'Imana,   
 Ujy'uyihungiraho.

  **3**   
Wiringir'Umwam'Imana,   
 Mu birushya no mu makuba,   
 Wiringir'Umwam'Imana,   
 Yih'umutwaro wawe.

  **4**   
Wiringir'Umwam'Imana,   
 Mu mibereho yawe yose,   
 Wiringir'Umwam'Imana,   
 Kugez'ahw azazira.

title: 282 Habuka Wa Mpabe We
markdown:
### 282 Habuka Wa Mpabe We   

  **1**   
 Habuka wa mpabe we, Urahamagarwa,   
 Rek'ibyaha byawe ngwino, Wikwinangira.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ngwino hakirih'umucyo,   
 Yes'aragutegereje,   
 Aramburiy'amaboko,   
 Abe bahabye.

  **2**   
Umukiz'arakwinginga, Ntiwinangire,   
 Umv'araguhamagara, Mukingurire.

  **3**   
Uraritswe n'ubutumwa, We kwinangira,   
 Bukuzaniy'agakiza, Bukingurire.

  **4**   
We kwigomw'umunezero, Ngo winangire,   
 Nibw'uzagir'amahoro, Mukingurire.

title: 283 Dutegerej'Igitondo Cyiza
markdown:
### 283 Dutegerej'Igitondo Cyiza   

  **1**   
 Dutegerej'igitondo cyiza, Tuzabon'abacu twabuze,   
 Nibwo bazakanguka, Tuban'iteka ryose,   
 Ntabwo tuzongera gutandukana.

  **2**   
Ubw'impanda izaba ivuze, Ibituro bizakingurwa,   
 Abera babivemo, Ntibazongera gupfa,   
 Abera bazahabw'indi mibiri.

  **3**   
Igitondo kiri hafi cyane,   
 Bagenzi mwe bugiye gucya,   
 Umucyo w'itangaza, Uturasire twese,   
 N'umunsi w'ihumure kuri twese.

title: 284 Yesu Ni Umukiza Wanjye
markdown:
### 284 Yesu Ni Umukiza Wanjye   

  **1**   
 Yesu n'Umukiza wanjy'utangaje,   
 Kuko andutira byose,   
 Niwe wampagaritse ku Rutare,   
 Mpaboner'umunezero.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Niwe wampagaritse ku Rutare,   
 Mu gihugu cy'umutarwe,   
 Kand'ampisha mu rukundo rwe rwinshi,   
 Andindish'ukuboko kwe,   
 Andindish'ukuboko kwe.

  **2**   
Yesu n'Umukiza wanjy'utangaje,   
 Antur'imitwaro yose,   
 Arankomeza sinzanyeganyega,   
 Kukw'ahor'ambumbatiye.

  **3**   
Ansesurahw'imigisha nk'ikamba,   
 Anyuzuz'ubugwaneza,   
 Ndirimba ntikenga nsingiz'Imana,   
 Niyo Mucunguzi wanjye.

  **4**   
Ninambara kurabagirana kwe,   
 Nibwo nzamusanganira,   
 Nzajya ndirimbana n'abacunguwe,   
 Indirimbo y'agakiza.

title: 285 Isi Ni Iy'Uhoraho
markdown:
### 285 Isi Ni Iy'Uhoraho   

  **1**   
 Isi n'iy'Uwiteka, Tumusingize twese,   
 Imisozi n'inyanja n'ibirimo byose,   
 Isi n'iy'Uwiteka, Bose bamuramye,   
 Imidugudu n'ibiyaga byose n'ibye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Isi yose, Isi yose,   
 Yamamaz'ubutumwa bwiza bwa Yesu,   
 Mutwar'umusaraba, Mushing'ibendera,   
 Kugez'ubw'abantu bose bazihana.   
Amen. (Ku gice cya 3).

  **2**   
Isi n'iy'Uwiteka tuyibimenyeraho,   
 Mpabe nimuhabuke mwe kuyob'inzira,   
 Isi n'iy'Uwiteka ntimugacogore,   
 Umusaraba niwo watuneshereje.

  **3**   
Isi n'iy'Uwiteka, Itegeko n'iri ngo:   
 Mugende, Mwamamaze ubutumwa bwiza,   
 Isi n'iy'Uwiteka, Ganz'iteka Mwami,   
 Amahanga yose ahor'agusingiza.

title: 286 Yes'Arakomang'Ubu
markdown:
### 286 Yes'Arakomang'Ubu   

  **1**   
 Yesu arakomang'ubu, Mukingurire?   
Aringing'umutima wanjye, Se mukingurire?   
Muri wo harimw'ibyaha, N'umwijima n'agahinda.   
Kristo ashaka ko musanga, Se mukingurire?

  **2**   
Se mubwiran'urukundo, Mukingurire?   
Nakir'uwo Mwami w'ubuntu, Se mukingurire?   
Ntantererana na hato, Ambabarir'ubugome.   
Mbese namwimura burundu, Cyangwa munambeho? 

  **3**   
Umutima w'ubwibone, Ndawukinguye.   
Mwakirany'ibyishimo byinshi, Ndamukinguriye.   
Mukiza mwiza tubane, Undind'ibishuko byose,   
 Mb'amahor'iyo turi kumwe, Ngwino Mwami Yesu.

title: 287 Nimushimir'Imbabazi Za Yesu
markdown:
### 287 Nimushimir'Imbabazi Za Yesu   

  **1**   
 Nimwishimir'imbabazi za Yesu,   
 Kuko yatwicunguriye,   
 Ntacyo twatinya Yes'ashobora byose,   
 Ni we Mukiza wacu.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbese ubw'Imana,   
 Iri mu ruhande rwacu,   
 Umubisha wacu, Ninde, Ninde?   
Umubisha wacu, Se nde?

  **2**   
Mukomerere mu Mwami wacu   
 Yesu mub'abakiranutsi,   
 Mu kaga kose muhagarare   
 mushikamy'azabakomeza.

  **3**   
Nimwiringire Yesu mukomez'   
amategeko ye by'ukuri,   
 Isi izashira arikw'amategeko   
 y'azahorahw'iteka.

  **4**   
Tuzibanira n'Umwami wacu   
 Yesu azaduh'ubugingo,   
 Kandi nta muntu wabasha   
 kudutesh'uwo Mukiz'umez'atyo.

title: 288 Har'Ijwi Rihamagara
markdown:
### 288 Har'Ijwi Rihamagara   

  **1**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Har'ijwi rihamagar'abarushye, Mubamurikire   
 Harihw'abatabaza ngo bakizwe, Mubamurikire   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Har'ijwi rihamagar'abarushye, Mubamu-rikire,   
 Harihw'abatabaza ngo bakizwe, Mubamu-rikire

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S.:**   
 Nimubamurikishirize umucyo w'ubutumwa,   
 Bamenyeshe ko Yes'ariwe wabapfiriye bose.   
 **A.,T. na B.:**   
 Nimubamu... kishirize   
 ...cyo bu....butumwa,   
 Bamenyeshe Ye...riwe ....pfi...ye bose (bose).

  **2**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Harihw'abatabariza gukizwa,  Mubamurikire,   
 Tuzan'amaturo ku musaraba, Ngo bamurikirwe.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Harihw'abatabariza gukizwa, Mubamu-rikire,   
 Tuzan'amaturo ku musaraba, Ngo bamu-rikirwe.

  **3**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Ubuntu bwa Yesu bugwire hose, Mubamurikire,   
 Kand'Umwuka wa Yes'ukwire hose, Mubamurikire.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Ubuntu bwa Yesu bugwire hose, Mubamu-rikire,   
 Kand'Umwuka wa Yes'ukwire hose, Mubamu-rikire.

  **4**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Twe gucogorera gukora neza, Tubamurikire,   
 Twitegurire kuzahabw'ikamba, Tubamurikire.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Twe gucogorera gukora neza, Tubamu-rikire,   
 Twitegurire kuzahabw'ikamba, Tubamu-rikire.

title: 289 Mutim'Ufit'Intege Nke
markdown:
### 289 Mutim'Ufit'Intege Nke   

  **1**   
 Mutim'ufit'intege nke, Harih'uburuhukiro,   
 N'iwacu hadahinduka, Se ntiwifuza kubayo?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Wa munyantege nke we, Tegereza,   
 Kandi nturambirwe, B'uretse,   
 Tegereza, Ntukivovote.

  **2**   
Ubw'uzatur'umutwaro, Ibyo mw'isi birangiye,   
 Uzashyikir'agakiza Tegerez'utivovota.

  **3**   
Nib'amahw'ari mu nzira, Tekerez'uwayambitswe,   
 N'ubabara wibuke k'Uwera, Nawe yababajwe.

  **4**   
Ujy'uhora wihanganye, Ntukibagirwe gusenga,   
 Harih'ubw'uzaruhuka, Tegerez'utivovota.

title: 290 Ubugingo Bw'Abantu
markdown:
### 290 Ubugingo Bw'Abantu   

  **1**   
 Ubugingo bw'abantu,   
 Buhita nk'igicucu,   
 Imbere yawe Mwami Mana,   
 Buhita n'ingoga.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ye ni koko, Burihuta,   
 Rwose bwihuta nk'igicucu,   
 N'iby'ukuri nta mumaro,   
 Ubugingo bwacu n'ubusa.

  **2**   
Umunt'ab'afit'izina   
 rimutey'ishema,   
 Imyaka yamara guhita,   
 Rikibagirana.

  **3**   
Ya nyenyeri y'Umukiza   
 y'i Betelehemu,   
 Natw'ibasha kutuyobora,   
 Tukamugeraho.

  **4**   
Mwami Mana komez'iyo   
 nyenyer'imurike,   
 Umucyo way'ukwire hose,   
 Umwijim'uhunge.

title: 291 Ndabatuwe Sinkibabaye
markdown:
### 291 Ndabatuwe Sinkibabaye   

  **1**   
 Ndabatuwe sinkibabaye, Yesu ndaje, Yesu ndaje,   
 Nje mu munezero iwawe, Ubu Yesu ndaje,   
 Nje nifuza gufashwa nawe, Ngutuy'intege nke zanjy'unkize,   
 Mvuye mu byaha nje nkugana, Ubu Yesu ndaje.

  **2**   
Nkijijw'isoni sinihebye, Yesu ndaje, Yesu ndaje,   
 Nemey'umusaraba wawe, Ubu Yesu ndaje,   
 Mvuye mu mibabaro y'isi, Ubu ngeze mu mahoro yawe,   
 Simbabaye ndanezerewe, Ubu Yesu ndaje.

  **3**   
Nkiz'imiruho n'ubwibone, Yesu ndaje, Yesu ndaje,   
 Nje kuba mu mahoro yawe, Ubu Yesu ndaje,   
 Nje kuba mu rukundo i wawe, Sinkihebye nje mu munezero,   
 Nj'ah'uri nguruka nk'inuma, Ubu Yesu ndaje.

  **4**   
Wamaz'ubwoba bw'igituro, Yesu ndaje, Yesu ndaje,   
 Nje mu munezero w'iwawe, Ubu Yesu ndaje,   
 Wanyaruye mw'irimbukiro, Ungeza mu mahor'adashira,   
 Ngo mpore nkureba mu maso, Ubu Yesu ndaje.

title: 292 Ni Wowe Gusa
markdown:
### 292 Ni Wowe Gusa   

  **1**   
 Ni wowe gusa nkeneye,   
 Ntaw'undi Mwami.   
Har'undi mfite mw ijuru,   
 Mwam'atari wowe?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ni wowe (ni wowe),   
 Ni wowe (ni wowe),   
 Wanyerets'urukundo,   
 Ni wowe (ni wowe),   
 Ni wowe(ni wowe),   
 Ntaw'uhwanye nawe.

  **2**   
N'ubwo mfit'inshuti nyinshi,   
 N'ibyiza byinshi,   
 Utabirimo Mukiza,   
 Nta mumaro wabyo.

  **3**   
Mbese harih'umutima   
 wuzuy'ineza?   
Cyangw'ijwi ryiza   
 nakumva rikampumuriza? 

  **4**   
Iby'isi ntabwo byantanya   
 nawe Mukiza,   
 Ibyo mur'iy'isi byose,   
 Nta mumaro wabyo.

title: 293 Munsi Mwiza Wejejwe
markdown:
### 293 Munsi Mwiza Wejejwe   

  **1**   
 Munsi mwiza wejejwe, W'icyumweru cyo kurema,   
 Wagizw'uwa karindwi, Wahiriwe n'Imana.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ngwino Sabato,   
 Sabato nziza,   
 Tuboner'imigisha,   
 Mu munsi w'Uhoraho.

  **2**   
Irangije kurema, Ishyiraho n'Isabato,   
 Iman'irayihira, Natwe tuyiruhuke.

  **3**   
Benshi barwany'Imana,  Baruhuka kuwa mbere.   
Shaka mu Byanditsw'urasanga nta habihamya.

  **4**   
Abanyakuri bazi ko wahinduwe n'umuntu,   
 Ntabw'Ijambo ry'Imana rikwiye guhinduka.

  **5**   
Nashatse mu Byanditswe, Nsang'ariyo yategetswe.   
Mpera ko nyiruhuka, Kukw'ari yo y'ukuri.

title: 294 Gitare Kirekire
markdown:
### 294 Gitare Kirekire   

  **1**   
 Gitare kirekire njya mpungiraho,   
 Ni wow'umutima wanjye wifuza,   
 Nd'umunyantege nke nshaka kukwisunga,   
 Wowe Gitare cyanjye, Nkwihishemo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nkwihishemo, Nkwihishemo,   
 Wowe Gitare cyanjye, Nkwihishemo.

  **2**   
Ngiz'imibabaro kumanywa y'ihangu,   
 Nizingiweho n'ibigeragezo,   
 Ndengewe n'imiraba yiyungikanya,   
 Wowe Gitare cyanjye, Nkwihishemo.

  **3**   
Umwanz'anyibasiye ndi ku rugamba,   
 Ni wowe mpungiraho nkaruhuka,   
 Iyo nibasiwe n'ibigeragezo,   
 Niwe nihishamo, Gitare cyanjye.

title: 295 Mpisemo Umukiza Yesu
markdown:
### 295 Mpisemo Umukiza Yesu   

  **1**   
 Mpisem'Umukiza Yesu gusa,   
 Kurut'ubutunzi bwo mur'iyi si,   
 Andutir'ifeza n'izahabu,   
 Ikiganza cye cyarambambiwe.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Rwose aho kub'Umwami w'isi,   
 Ngaheranwa n'ibyaha,   
 Nahitamo Yesu mur'iyi si,   
 Niw'undutira byose.

  **2**   
Mpisemo Yesu kurut'ikuzo,   
 No kumukorera nivuy'inyuma,   
 Andutir'icyubahiro cy'isi,   
 Nkunda kwitirirwa izina rye.

  **3**   
Arush'ibiremwa byos'ubwiza,   
 Anyur'umutima kuruta byose,   
 Azah'umutima wanjy'ibyiza,   
 Nimwemerera akanyobora.

title: 296 Amahoro Masa
markdown:
### 296 Amahoro Masa   

  **1**   
 Umutima wanjy'urasingiz'Imana,   
 Mu ndirimbo y'umunezero,   
 Nifitiy'amahoro ava mw'ijuru,   
 Yuzuye mu mutima wanjye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Amahoro masa, Aturuka ku Mana gusa,   
 Nyamuneka tungany'ubugingo bwanjye,   
 N'urukundo rutarondorwa.

  **2**   
Nifitiy'amahor'arut'ubutunzi,   
 Yuzuye mu mutima wanjye,   
 Kandi nta muntu wabasha kuyanyaga,   
 Ntawe n'aho yakwigir'ate! 

  **3**   
Yambereye ubuhungiro nijoro,   
 Bituma mb'uwa Yesu gusa,   
 Nta cyampangara ku manywa na nijoro,   
 Ntacyo rwose haba na gito.

  **4**   
Reka mvug'ibya wa mudugudu mwiza,   
 Uwo nzabona nkanezerwa,   
 Mu ndirimb'abera bazaharirimbir'   
Imwe n'iyi ngiyi wumva ngo: 

  **5**   
N'ubwo nanyuraga makuba y'isi,   
 Nkabur'umunt'umpumuriza,   
 Umukiza wanjye n'inshuti y'ukuri,   
 Yangoteshej'amaboko ye.

title: 297 Yesu Niwe Niringira
markdown:
### 297 Yesu Niwe Niringira   

  **1**   
 Yesu niwe niringira, Niwe butunzi bwanjye,   
 Nzakwishingikirizaho, Kugez'igihe nzapfa,   
 Ni wowe umbeshejeho kuko ump'amahoro,   
 Ni wow'ump'umunezero, Ur'ubuzima bwanjye.

  **2**   
Niba bikwiriye kureb'umusaraba wawe,   
 Ngira intungane nkunde amategeko yawe,   
 Ntawe unaniza ngw'akor'ibyo adashoboye,   
 Ntacyo wasaba ng'umuntu abon'icyakwitura.

  **3**   
Njye ndashaka kugendera mu mucyo wawe Yesu,   
 Ngo nzazuke nigira iwawe mw'ijuru heza.   
Aho niho hari igihugu nzabamw'iteka,   
 Niho Yesu azanyakira ari mu ngoro ye.

title: 298 Igitekerezo Cyiza
markdown:
### 298 Igitekerezo Cyiza   

  **1**   
 Igitekerezo cyiza cya Yesu Mukiza,   
 Kivug'uburyo yahoranye n'abantu,   
 N'uko yahamagarag'abana nk'intama ze,   
 Maze bigatuma nkumbura Yesu,   
 Numva nifuza kw'aba yaranshyizehw'ibiganza,   
 Ngw'abe yaranzengurukij'amaboko,   
 Yemwe mba narahiriw'iyo numv'avug'ati:   
 Nimurek'abana bato bansange!

  **2**   
Nzeger'intebe ye ngo mutur'amasengesho,   
 Maze musabe kuba mu rukundo rwe,   
 Kand'uko ndushaho kumushaka mur'iyi si,   
 Nizeye ko nzamubona mw'ijuru.   
Yagiye mw'ijuru guteguray'amazu meza,   
 Azaturwamo n'abacunguwe gusa.   
Abana benshi bazaba bateraniyeyo,   
 Kuk'ubwami bwo mw'ijuru ar'ubwabo.

  **3**   
Abantu benshi bazimiriye mur'iyi si,   
 Ntabwo barumv'inkuru y'iwacu heza,   
 Ndifuza ko bamenya ko har'umwanya wabo,   
 Kandi Yesu niw'ubahamagara.   
Ndifuza kuzishima kur'uwo munsi mukuru,   
 Uzab'ar'umuns'urut'iyindi yose.   
Ubw'abana bo mw'isi yose bazaterana,   
 Akabaher'umugish'icyarimwe.

title: 299 Urukundo Yes'Ankunda
markdown:
### 299 Urukundo Yes'Ankunda   

  **1**   
 Urukundo Yes'ankunda,   
 Rwatumy'abambwa ku giti,   
 Kugira ngo nkomeze kubaho,   
 Ntawarurondora.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yankunz'urukundo rwinshi (urukundo rwinshi),   
 Yankunz'urukundo rwinshi (urukundo rwinshi),   
 Urukundo Umukiz'ankunda,   
 Nta warurondora.

  **2**   
Uburyo yambabarijwe,   
 Yambitsw'ikamba ry'amahwa,   
 Kugira ngo nkomeze kubaho,   
 Nta wabirondora.

  **3**   
Mfit'amahoro muri we,   
 Kukw'ansabira kuri Se,   
 Uko yankirishij'amaraso,   
 Nta wabirondora.

  **4**   
Iyo ndi kumwe na Yesu,   
 Amber'uburuhukiro,   
 Ibyiringiro mfite muri We,   
 Nta wabirondora.

title: 300 Umwami Arakomanga
markdown:
### 300 Umwami Arakomanga   

  **1**   
 Umwam'arakomanga,   
 Ashaka kubana nawe,   
 Mbeg'ibyishimo kubana nawe?   
Kingurira uwo Mwami.

  **2**   
Witinya kumusanga!   
Araguh'ibyiringiro,   
 N'ibyishimo mu mutima wawe.   
Ese ntubona umucyo? 

  **3**   
Kumwakira n'ibyiza,   
 N'ukubabarirwa nawe,   
 N'ijuru Imana iguhaye,   
 Araguha amahoro.

  **4**   
Ahagaze ku rugi,   
 Ashak'umutima wawe.   
Mbeg'ibyishimo umwakiriye,   
 Akakubera Umwami.

title: 301 Reka Yesu Yinjire Mu Mutima Wawe
markdown:
### 301 Reka Yesu Yinjire Mu Mutima Wawe   

  **1**   
 Reka Yesu yinjire mu mutima   
 wawe maz'akuruhure,   
 Niba wifuz'ubugingo bushya,   
 Umwakire mu mutima.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ubu wishidikanya,   
 Reka kumwihakana,   
 Muh'umutima wawe,   
 Wumwegurire burundu.

  **2**   
Nib'ushaka ku mutunganira,   
 Umwemerere akuzemo,   
 Hafi yawe har'isoko yeza,   
 Sanga Yes'agutunganye.

  **3**   
N'ushaka kuzamuririmbira,   
 Umwemerere akuzemo,   
 Nib'ushaka kuzabana nawe,   
 Umwakire mu mutima.

title: 302 Umunsi W'Umuzuko
markdown:
### 302 Umunsi W'Umuzuko   

  **1**   
 Umunsi w'umuzuko, Umuns'utangaje,   
 Hazab'umunezero, Tuzabon'Imana,   
 Abera bazakangurwa, Bazamurwe mu bicu,   
 Baririmb'indirimbo, Nziza yo kunesha.

  **2**   
Tuzezwa imitima, Tuzabona Yesu,   
 Tuzabana n'Imana mu mucy'utazima,   
 Tuzahora duhimbaza, Dushim'Imana yacu,   
 Yo yatuneshereje, Iduh'agakiza.

  **3**   
Wa juru we ishime, Wa si we ririmba,   
 Abanambye ku Mana, Baranesherejwe,   
 Ibindi biremwa nabyo , Byishime binezerwe,   
 Umwami wacu Yesu, Nasingizw iteka.

title: 303 Ntukumvir'Umubi
markdown:
### 303 Ntukumvir'Umubi   

  **1**   
 Ntukumvir'umubi ujy'agushuka,   
 Umwumviye wese ab'acumuye,   
 Wamutsinda none kubw'Umukiza,   
 Byagufash'ubundi kujy'umunesha.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Saba Yes'agufashe,   
 Kand'aguhumurize,   
 Yemeye kukurinda,   
 Azatum'utsinda.

  **2**   
Wirind'ubucuti bw'abantu babi,   
 Bakunda kukoshya gukor'ibibi.   
Ntukavug'ijambo ritey'isoni,   
 Ujye wubaha izina ry'Imana.

  **3**   
Ujy'ugira neza, Ufash'abandi,   
 Wirinde kubeshya, Ahubw'ujy'uba,   
 Inyangamugayo kukw'iby'aribyo,   
 Bikundwa na Yesu, Uzagufasha.

  **4**   
Unesha Satani yandikiwe ko,   
 Azahabw'ikamba n'Umukiza we,   
 Tugir'intege nke, Ariko Yesu,   
 Niwe Mutabazi, Udushoboza.

title: 304 Nzabana N'Umwami
markdown:
### 304 Nzabana N'Umwami   

  **1**   
 Nzabana n'Umwam'ibihe bidashira,   
 Iryo jambo rivuga ngo: Nzatur'ibudapfa,   
 N'ubwo nkingiranywe mur'uyu mubiri,   
 Buzacya negereje gutah'iwacu heza.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Iwacu, Iwacu,   
 Ngeze hafi yaho.

  **2**   
Mu rugo rw'Umwami ndahararikira,   
 Kwizera niko kunyerek'namarembo yaho,   
 N'ubwo njya ncogora s'ukutahashaka,   
 Iyo gakondo y'abera ni Yerusalemu.

  **3**   
Njya ngotwa n'ibyaha, Nkumva ndacogoye,   
 Nka bur'aho mfata nka ya numa yo mu nkuge,   
 Ibicu byeyutse, Umukororombya,   
 W'ihumure urasira mu mutima wanjye.

  **4**   
Nkund'izo ndirimbo zihora mw'ijuru,   
 Izo mw'isi yacu ni nk'indimi z'i Babeli,   
 Harihw'icyo nkunda, Nukw'abazazuka,   
 Bazongera kubana na Yesu, Yee, Amina.

title: 305 Mwami Yesu Mugenga
markdown:
### 305 Mwami Yesu Mugenga   

  **1**   
 Mwami Yesu Mugenga w'ibi bintu byose,   
 Wambay'ubumuntu ku bwacu,   
 Ndakwiyeguriye nzakubaha,   
 Kuk'ur'ikuzo n'ikamba ryanjye.

  **2**   
Icyanya cyiza n'amashyamba ni meza,   
 N'ibimera nabyo ni byiza,   
 Yes'urabirusha kand'uraboneye,   
 Uturuhur'imitima.

  **3**   
Umucyo ni mwiza,
 Umwez'ukawurusha,
 N'umucyo w'inyenyeri nuko,
 Yes'urabirusha
 kand'uraboneye,
 Kurush'abamarayika.

title: 306 Umwami Arahamagara
markdown:
### 306 Umwami Arahamagara   

  **1**   
 Umwam'arahamagara abasaruzi bitanze,   
 Ibisarurwa bireze abasaruzi ni bake.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nimuhaguruke mushikame, Mw'izina ry'uwo Mwami,   
 Muvuge inkuru y'agakiza, Muyamamaze hose.

  **2**   
Nimwihute mutabare abari mu byaha bose,   
 Mubatabaz'amaboko muc'ingoyi zibaboshye.

  **3**   
Nimumenyesh'abakene nabo baze mu birori,   
 Yes'umutsim'uhoraho yiteguye kubakira.

  **4**   
Nimwihute dor'igihe cy'isarura kirashize,   
 Hagiye kuzab'igihe tutazabasha gukora.

title: 307 Urukundo Rw'Imana Yacu
markdown:
### 307 Urukundo Rw'Imana Yacu   

  **1**   
 Urukundo rw'Imana yacu,   
 Nta muntu warurondora,   
 Rusaguts'ikirere cyose,   
 Rugera no munsi y'isi.   
Abantu bose bacumuye,   
 Bacunguwe na Yesu,   
 Umwana we wese wahabye,   
 Yaramwicunguriye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbeg'urukundo rutangaje,   
 Rutagir'urugero,   
 Abera bazaruririmba,   
 Ibihe bidashira.

  **2**   
Ubw'ibihe bizah'ibindi,   
 N'ubwami bw'isi bwashize,   
 Abantu bakanga gusenga,   
 Amabuy'azaririmba.   
Urukundo rw'Imana yacu,   
 Ntabwo rurondoreka,   
 Rwacunguy'abo mw'isi bose,   
 Ruzaririmbw'iteka.

  **3**   
Inyanja zose zaba wino,   
 N'ijuru ryab'impapuro,   
 Tukandikisha agati kose,   
 Umuntu wes'akandika,   
 Urukundo rw'Imana yacu,   
 Rwakamy'inyanja zose,   
 Ntabwo rwabon'aho rukwirwa,   
 Rusaguts'ikirere.

title: 308 Umukiza Aragutegereje
markdown:
### 308 Umukiza Aragutegereje   

  **1**   
 Umukiza aragutegereje,   
 Ntiwamusanga none?   
Ntaby'isi bigomba kumukuvutsa,   
 Mbes'ub'uribaz'iki ?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Umukiz'aragutegereje,   
 Aragutegereje,   
 Ngw'arebe ko wemera gukingura,   
 Mbeg'ubury'abyifuza.

  **2**   
Nshuti ter'intambw'ugan'Umukiza,   
 Agutez'ibiganza,   
 N'umwemerera arakuruhura,   
 Muban'iteka ryose.

title: 309 Ubutumwa Bw'Ubuntu
markdown:
### 309 Ubutumwa Bw'Ubuntu   

  **1**   
 Ubutumwa bw'ubuntu bwanyuz'umutima,   
 Imana yadutangiy'Umwana wayo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ng'umwizera wes'adapf'   
Ahubw'ahabw'ubugingo,   
 Ahubw'ahabw'ubugingo bw'iteka.

  **2**   
Nkuko Mose yamanits'inzoka ku giti,   
 Niko Yesu yamanitswe ngo tubeho.

  **3**   
Numvise yuk'ukor'ibyaha wes'azapfa,   
 None ndahabutse kubw'ijambo ryawe.

  **4**   
Yesu ntabwo yaje kuducirahw'iteka,   
 Ahubwo yaj'atuzaniy'agakiza.

  **5**   
Mwami ndakwinginz'ongera kwizera kwanjye,   
 Nakir'iby'ubutumwa bwawe bumbwira.

title: 310 Hariho Uburuhukiro Muri Paradiso
markdown:
### 310 Hariho Uburuhukiro Muri Paradiso   

  **1**   
 Hariho uburuhukiro muri paradiso,   
 Ahatazab'umubabar'ukundi, Tuzahurirayo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S.:**   
 Tuzateranirayo, Tuzahurirayo   
 Kuri rwa ruzi, Tuzateranirayo,   
 Mu musek'igitondo gitangaje.   
 **A., T. na B.:**   
 Tuzate..., nirayo, Tuzahurirayo  
 Kuri rwa ruzi, Tuzatenirayo,   
 Mu musek'igitondo gitangaje.

  **2**   
Hariy'umudugudu mwiza utatswem'umucyo,   
 Aho nihw'abakiranutsi bazibanira n'Umwami.

  **3**   
Hariyo amakamba meza, Ayo tuzambikwa,   
 Kristo yateguriy'abamutegereje bihanganye.

  **4**   
Jy'ukiranuk'ibihe byose, Nubwo wabizira,   
 Yesu yasezeranye kw'azaguh'ikamba ry'ubugingo

title: 311 Mukristo Ube Maso
markdown:
### 311 Mukristo Ube Maso   

  **1**   
 Mukristo ube maso,   
 Nturuhuke na hato,   
 Akaga kari hafi, Usenge!

  **2**   
Ababisha b'Imana   
 bajya bakubikira,   
 Baguciriy'ibico, Usenge! 

  **3**   
Kenyer'intwaro zawe   
 ku manywa na n'ijoro,   
 Dor'umwanz'arakaze, Ba maso! 

  **4**   
Umv'abatsinze kera   
 iyo ntambar'urwana,   
 Barakubwira bati: Usenge! 

  **5**   
Umva Umwami wawe,   
 Yesu wagupfiriye,   
 Niwe wategets'ati: Wirinde! 

  **6**   
Bik'iryo jambo ryiza,   
 Mu mutima wemera,   
 Kandi unabikore usenga.

title: 312 Mbese Wahereye Ryari?
markdown:
### 312 Mbese Wahereye Ryari?   

  **1**   
 Mbese wahereye ryari uvugana   
 n'Umwam'umutakambira?   
Mbese wahereye ryar'usenga,   
 Ugez'ubw'ukesh'ijoro?   
Mbese wamaz'igihe kingan'iki   
 wumva yuk'utay'umuruho?   
Se wamwit'inshuti,  Wamenye ryari,   
 Kw'akurind'akakwitaho?

  **2**   
Mbese wahereye ryar'upfukam'   
useng'Uhorah'uri mw'ijuru?   
Se wameny'ute ko washubijwe,   
 Akakurinda bugacya?   
Ukamenya ko wiriz'uwo munsi,   
 Mbese wamwit'inshuti yawe?   
Mbese wamenye ryari kw'akwitaho,   
 Kandi akanakurinda?

title: 313 Igihe Cyo Kugaruka K'Umwami
markdown:
### 313 Igihe Cyo Kugaruka K'Umwami   

  **1**   
 Igihe cyo kugaruka k'Umwami   
 kiregereje rwose,   
 Inyenyeri zicwekereye,   
 Kubw'umucyo w'igitondo gitangaje.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mbes'aho ntiburi hafi gucya!   
Mbes'aho ntiburi hafi gucya!   
Mbese ntabw'ubona   
 k'umusek'utambitse!   
Mbese k'ubanza bugiye gucya!

  **2**   
Ibimenyetso byose byahanuwe   
 kw'izuba no ku kwezi,   
 Birahamiriz'umuntu wese ko   
 kuza k'Umwami kutwegereye.

  **3**   
Iki n'igihe rwos'itorero   
 rikwiye guhaguruka,   
 Kandi rikwiriye kuba maso,   
 Kuko bidatinze bugiye gucya.

  **4**   
Nimusohoke mujye mu nzira ngari   
 no mu nzira ntoya,   
 Nimubwir'ibirema n'impumyi   
 ko kuza k'Umwami kutwegereye.

title: 314 Ye Byose Biba Byiza
markdown:
### 314 Ye Byose Biba Byiza   

  **1**   
 Ye byose biba byiza sinzatinya,   
 Nkeney'urukundo ruhebuje,   
 Imiyaga n'imigaru biratuza.   
Imana yacu y'impuhwe nyinshi itwitaho.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mu mibabar'idusagiriz'ibyiza,   
 Iradukunda. Iraturinda,   
 Mu mibabar'idukomez'imitima,   
 Kukw'Imana yacu yumva gutaka kwacu,   
 Irindira igihe cyayo kuzageza,   
 Ku mperuka.

  **2**   
Byose biba byiz'Iman'inyitaho,   
 Munsi y'amababa ye sintinya.   
Nta cyago cyankuraho amahoro ye.   
Iyo niringiy'Imana mu mutima wanjye.

  **3**   
Biba byiza Yesu, Yabibwiy'abe.   
Mukumbi wanjye muto ntutinye.   
Iman'iri ku ngoma is'irabizi.   
Isi n'ijuru bizuzura ikuzo ryayo.

title: 315 Harih'Umunt'Umwe
markdown:
### 315 Harih'Umunt'Umwe   

  **1**   
 Harih'umunt'umwe wapfuye ku bwanjye,   
 aKandi ntibyari bikwiriye,   
 Yemeye kujyanw'ajya ku musaraba,   
 Kubwo kumbabarir'ibyaha.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Byarabambwe byose, Byarabambwe byose,   
 Yemw'uko yabyikorey'ubwe!   
Yemwe ngo arababara cyan'ajyayo!   
Ajyanyweyo n'ibyaha byanjye.

  **2**   
N'umugwaneza kand'arankunda cyane,   
 Yez'umutima wanjy'ibyaha,   
 Sincirw'urubanza, Mfit'umudendezo,   
 Kuko yambabariy'ibyaha.

  **3**   
Nzabana n'Umukiza akaramata,   
 Nzajya ngendana naw'iteka,   
 Ndirimbish'umunwa n'umutima wanjye,   
 Kuko nababariw'ibyaha.

title: 316 Yesu Araje
markdown:
### 316 Yesu Araje   

  **1**   
 Yes'araje nimubyamamaze,   
 Aje kujyan'abo yacunguye,   
 Azanywe no kwimik'ingoma ye,   
 Yesu agiye kuza.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yes'agiye kugaruka vuba,   
 Yesu agiye kuza (agiye kuza),   
 Nimubyamamaz'ahantu hose,   
 Agiye kugaruka.

  **2.**   
 Yes'araj'abapfuye bazuke,   
 Maz'abatoni be baterane,   
 Bahurire nawe mu kirere,   
 Yesu agiye kuza.

  **3**   
Yes'azanywe no gukiz'abera,   
 Azanywe no gutang'amahoro,   
 Imibabaro yos'izashira,   
 Yesu agiye kuza.

  **4**   
Yes'araje nk'uko yabivuze,   
 Ni bande batowe bamwizeye,   
 Bamutegereje bari maso,   
 Yesu agiye kuza.

title: 317 Mfite Umukiza
markdown:
### 317 Mfite Umukiza   

  **1**   
 Mfit'Umukiz'ukomey'undind'iteka?   
Unyobor'intambwe ngo ntayob'inzira,   
 Niw'uyobora buri ntambwe y'uhabye,   
 Mbes'ufit'Umukiza nk'uwo?

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mfit'Umukiza umez'atyo (atyo)!   
Se nawe n'Umukiza wawe (wawe)?   
Yanyinjiyemo, Ntabwo ateze kumvamo,   
 Se nawe n'Umukiza wawe (wawe)?

  **2**   
N'Umukiza niringir'ibihe byose,   
 Mu byago n'amakub'ampor'iruhande,   
 No mu bishukw'arandinda bitangaje,   
 Mbes'ufit'Umufasha nk'uwo? 

  **3**   
Mfit'Umwungeri mwiz'ukund'intama ze,   
 Azihamagara mu mazina yazo,   
 Azih'ubwatsi bwiza n'amazi meza,   
 Mbes'ufit'Umwungeri nk'uwo?

title: 318 Ngwin'Umukiz'Aragushaka
markdown:
### 318 Ngwin'Umukiz'Aragushaka   

  **1**   
 Ngwin'Umukiz'aragushaka,   
 N'inshuti nziza y'ukuri,   
 Ubu ngub'aragutegereje,   
 Arakwinginga ngwino.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Umukiz'ahagaze ku rugi,   
 Gira bwang'umusab'imbabazi,   
 Witindigany'arategereje,   
 Gira n'ingoga ngwino.

  **2**   
Umv'amagambo ye y'ihumure,   
 Yesu n'inshuti y'ukuri,   
 Musange n'isoko y'ubugingo,   
 Ntabw'uzabur'umwanya.

  **3**   
Umvir'uwo Mwuk'ukongorera,   
 Wisuzugur'uwo Mwami,   
 Mwakire vuba witindiganya,   
 Hahirw'umwakiriye.

title: 319 Isengesho Ryanjye
markdown:
### 319 Isengesho Ryanjye   

  **1**   
 Isengesho ryanjye Mwami nyumvira,   
 Nyobora mu nzira,   
 Mu birushya byo mur'ubu buzima,   
 Jy'umpor'iruhande.

  **2**   
Har'ibigeragezo byinshi   
mpura naby'aho njya hose,   
 Mfash'umpe kub'umunyakuri,   
 Kandi mb'umukiranutsi.

  **3**   
Igih'ub'ubuzima buzaba   
bugeze kw'iherezo,   
 Ndagusaby'uzampe kubana   
nawe mu bwami bw'ijuru.

title: 320 Mfit'Inyota Mwami
markdown:
### 320 Mfit'Inyota Mwami   

  **1**   
 Mfit'inyota Mwami, Ndagukennye cyane,   
 Mpembura Mukiza, Wowe soko nziza,   
 Soko y'ubugingo, Ngwin'umurikire,   
 Unyobore (unyobore), Nger'iwawe.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Buhungiro (buhungiro),   
 Nihishamo (nihishamo),   
 Ubwugamo (ubwugamo),   
 Bw'umugaru (bw'umugaru),   
 Murikira (murikira),   
 Noye kuyoba (ne kuyoba),   
 Kugez'ubwo (kugez'ubwo),   
 Ngez'iwacu.

  **2**   
Nd'umugenzi Mwami, Ngenda mu butayu,   
 Kandi mfit'isari, Ndarushye Mukiza,   
 Mpam'amazi Mukiza, Maze nshir'inyota,   
 Kugez'ubwo (kugez'ubwo), Ngez'iwacu.

  **3**   
Iwacu mw'ijuru, Ngiye kugerayo,   
 Nzambikw'ikamba Yesu yanteguriye,   
 Nubw'indushya , Ndi hafi kugera,   
 Mu gihugu (mu gihugu), Cy'ihumure.

title: 321 Reb'Ibimenyetso
markdown:
### 321 Reb'Ibimenyetso   

  **1**   
 Reb'ibimenyetso by'urugendo,   
 Reb'ibimenyetso birashira,   
 By'imyak'ishize by'ubwami bune,   
 Twe turi hehe, Reb'urugendo.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Reba ibimenyetso by'ubuhanuzi,   
 By'ibihe byashize by'ubwami bune,   
 Reba ibimenyetso by'ubuhanuzi,   
 Byose byarangiye.

  **2**   
Abasiriya bategets'isi,   
 Haz'Abamedi n'Abaperesi,   
 Abagiriki batway'iyi si,   
 Haz'Abaroma, Twe turi hehe? 

  **3**   
Ko turi mu bihe by'intege nke,   
 Iby'ibumba n'icyuma byavanzwe,   
 Nuko tuzareb'uko bizaba Yes'agarutse,   
 Kwim'ingoma ye.

title: 322 Uwiteka N'Umwungeri Wanjye
markdown:
### 322 Uwiteka N'Umwungeri Wanjye   

  **1**   
 Uwiteka n'Umwungeri wanjye, Sinzakena na hato,   
 Andyamisha mu cyanya cy'iruhande rw'amaz'adasuma.

  **2**   
Asubiz'intege mu bugingo bwanjye mu gihe ntebye,   
 Anyobor'inzira yo gukiranuka kubw'izina rye.

  **3**   
Naho nanyura no mu gikombe cy'igicucu cy'urupfu,   
 Sinzatiny'ikibi cyose Mwami kuko ndi kumwe nawe.

  **4**   
Untunganiriza ameza mu maso y'abanzi banjye,   
 Unsize amavuta mu mutwe maze aratonyanga.

  **5**   
Kugirirwa neza n'imbabazi bizanyomahw'iteka,   
 Nanjye nzaba mu nzu y'Uwiteka ibihe bidashira.

title: 323 Nari Nararohamye Mu Byaha
markdown:
### 323 Nari Nararohamye Mu Byaha   

  **1**   
 Nari nararohamye mu nyanja y'ibyaha,   
 Nta byiringiro narimfite byo kuvamo,   
 Maz'Umukiza yumva gutabaza kwanjye,   
 Ab'ariw'unkuramo none ndiho.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
  Urukundo rwankuyemo,   
 Ubwo nari nabuze uwamfasha,   
 Urukundo rwankuyemo,   
 Nari nabuz'umfasha, Mbona Yesu.

  **2**   
Muhay'umutima wanjye mushikamyeho,   
 Nzajya ndirimb'iteka icyubahiro cye,   
 Urukundo nyakuri nzajya nduririmba,   
 Niwe nkesha kwizera n'urukundo.

  **3**   
Mutim'ubabaye reba Yes'agukize,   
 Niw'uzakurokora,  Mu murab'ukaze,   
 Ategek'inyanja zose zikamwumvira,   
 Arashaka kugukiz'uyu munsi.

title: 324 Mbega Igitambo!
markdown:
### 324 Mbega Igitambo!   

  **1**   
 Mbega igitambo cy'amaraso Y'Umukiza,   
 Wapfuy'ari njy'azira! Yambambiwe ku musaraba,   
 Abitewe n'ukw'ankunda cyane,   
 N'urukundo rutangaje Mwami wanjye,   
 Kugira ngo wemere kubabara no kumfira.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S.:**   
 Urukundo ruhebuje,   
 Nirwo rwamuteye kumfira,   
 Mbeg'urukundo rutangaje,   
 Ngo ruratum'ancungura!   
 **A., T. na B.:**   
 Urukundo ruhebuje,   
 Nirwo rwamute kumfira,   
 Mbeg'urukurutangaje,   
 Ngo ruratum'ancungura.

  **2.**   
 Yasiz'intebe y'ubwami ya Se,   
 Yemera kunyitangira ngo nkire,   
 Nari mbuz'epfo na ruguru,   
 Imbabazi ze zirangoboka,   
 Maz'Urukundo rwe runter'umunezero,   
 Mperako mererwa neza mu mutima wanjye.

  **3**   
Nari maz'igihe kirekire,   
 Mboshywe n'umwijima w'ibyaha byanjye,   
 Maze kumeny'ineza yawe,   
 Ngukurikira mfit'ibyishimo,   
 Kuko nari mbohowe ingoyi z'ibyaha,   
 Mperako ndahaguruka,   
 Ndagukurikira.

  **4**   
Nta teka ncirwaho kuko ndi muri Yesu,   
 Naw'akab'ari muri jye,   
 Niwe nkesha kubaho kwanjye,   
 Nkeger'intebe ye ntacyo ntinya,   
 Nkambikw'ikamba mbikesha uwancunguye,   
 Ntabwo nzahwema kumusingiz'iteka ryose.

title: 325 Impanda Iravuze
markdown:
### 325 Impanda Iravuze   

  **1**   
 Impanda iravuze, Nimwumve, Nimwumve,   
 Ivugira mw'ijuru, Yesu araje,   
 Wow'uhunikira, Ngah'umva, Ngah'umva,   
 Kanguka, Ubyuke, Umwam'araje.

  **2**   
Ese ntimwumv'impanda, Nimwumve, Nimwumve,   
 Umugen'arayumva, Yes'ari hafi ,   
 N'ibyishimo byinshi, Nimwumve, Nimwumve,   
 Araririmb'ati: Yes'ari hafi.

  **3**   
Impanda iravuze, Nimwumve, Nimwumve,   
 Nimubyuke bwakeye, Umukw'araje,   
 N'ibyishimo byinshi, Nimwumve, Nimwumve,   
 Ngaho itegure, Dore araje.

title: 326 Dufit'Ibyiringiro
markdown:
### 326 Dufit'Ibyiringiro   

  **1**   
 Dufit'ibyiringiro by'ukuri, Ko Yesu azagaruka,   
 Twizezwa n'uk'ubwe yabivuze, Twizer'isezerano rye,   
 Ubw'amoko yo mw'isi, Azarangurur'ati: Haleluya,   
 Yesu Kristo n'Umwami w'Abami,   
 Twiringiye yuk'Umwami wacu, Ari hafi kugaruka.

  **2**   
Duhuriye muri Yesu Kristo, Duhujwe n'urukundo rwe,   
 Abantu bifuz'urukundo rwe, Rwatumy'acungur'abantu,   
 Ijuru rizakinguka Kristo agaruke,   
 Abantu baririmbe, Haleluya, Araje!   
Dufit'ibyiringiro mu Mana, Twibumbiye muri Kristo.

title: 327 Nkunda Igitabo Cyera
markdown:
### 327 Nkunda Igitabo Cyera   

  **1**   
 Nkund'igitabo cyera cy'Imana,   
 Nicyo kindutir'ibindi byose,   
 Kinyigish'ibyiza byo mw'ijuru,   
 Nkameny'inzira y'agakiza.

  **2**   
Gitabo cy'ingenzi muri wowe,   
 Mpabon'ubwiza bw'Umwami wanjye,   
 Ibyanditswe byawe binyigisha,   
 Iby'umunezero nzagira.

  **3**   
Ariko igihe nkiri mw'isi,   
 Umbwir'iby'urukundo rw'Imana,   
 Nkarushaho gusobanukirwa,   
 N'umunezero wo mw ijuru.

  **4**   
Ni wowe werekan'imigambi,   
 Yose ya Yes'Umukiza wanjye,   
 Muri wowe niho har'ubwenge,   
 N'ubuhanga butarondorwa.

  **5**   
Ur'umucy'umurikir'ab'isi,   
 Ngo bave mu mwijima w'ibyaha,   
 Ni wow'umurikir'imitima,   
 Y'abahabye bagahabuka.

title: 328 Ku Musaraba
markdown:
### 328 Ku Musaraba   

  **1**   
 Imbere y'Uhoraho ntabwo nkorwa n'isoni,   
 Kand'ijambo ryawe rinshimish'ibihe byose.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ku musaraba niho naboney'umucyo,   
 Mbona gutur'umutwaro wanjye,   
 Mbiboneshwa no kwizera   
 Uherey'ubu nzahora nezerewe.

  **2**   
Yesu Mana yanjye nzi yukw'ari ryo zina rye,   
 Ntazemerer'umutima wanjye kuzimira.

  **3**   
Yasezeranye yukw'intebe y'izahoraho,   
 Biragaragara kw'ibyo yavuz'ar'ukuri.

title: 329 Mana Yac'Ur'Umufasha
markdown:
### 329 Mana Yac'Ur'Umufasha   

  **1**   
 Mana yac'ur'umufasha,   
 Byiringiro byacu,   
 Bwugamo bw'umugaru,   
 Niwe buturo bwacu.

  **2**   
Ku ntebe yawe y'ubwami,   
 Tubon'amahoro,   
 Iyo dutabawe nawe,   
 Tugir'ihumure.

  **3.**   
 Imisoz'itarabaho,   
 Is'itarabumbwa,   
 Kuva kera kose Mana,   
 Ur'uko wahoze.

  **4**   
Imyak'igihumbi uyibona   
 nk'umuns'umwe,   
 Ni migufi nk'isah'imwe,   
 Ihita ni ngoga.

  **5**   
Man'ur'umufasha wacu,   
 Byiringiro byacu,   
 Utuber'umuyoboz'uzatugez'iwacu.

title: 330 Ntabaza Yesu Iyo Mbabaye
markdown:
### 330 Ntabaza Yesu Iyo Mbabaye   

  **1**   
 Ntabaza Yesu iyo mbabaya,   
 Ankiz'imibabaro yanjye,   
 Mur'iyo mibabaro nt'ampana,   
 Ahubw'arantabara rwose.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ntabaza Yesu, Ntabaza Yesu,   
 Kuko ntacyo nakwishoboza,   
 Ntabaza Yesu, Ntabaza Yesu,   
 Yesu gusa niwe wamfasha

  **2**   
Mu makuba yanjy'arantabara,   
 Kukw'ari we nshuti y'ukuri,   
 Iyo mutabaj'arantabara,   
 Ankiz'imibabaro yanjye.

  **3**   
Mbeg'ukuntu iby'isi binshuka,   
 Bikanyoshya gukor'ibyaha,   
 Mbibwire Yesu kand'azamfasha,   
 Niw'uzampa gutsind'iby'isi.

title: 331 Mwuka Wera
markdown:
### 331 Mwuka Wera   

  **1**   
 Aha hantu har'amahoro,   
 Kandi hari n'Umwuka Wera w'Uhoraho,   
 Kandi n'umuntu wese uhari,   
 Afit'umunezero mwinshi bihebuje.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Mwuka Wera We, We numa nziza,   
 Ubane natwe, Utwuzuz'urukundo,   
 Turaguhimbaza kuk'uduhira,   
 Turataha tudashidikanya   
 yuko duhiriwe twese.

title: 332 Nzabon'Umwami
markdown:
### 332 Nzabon'Umwami   

  **1**   
 Nzabon'Umwami wanjy'   
aririmbirwa n'abamarayika   
 Tuzabana naw'iteka ryose   
 mu gihugu cy'ibyiza.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Tuzahorana ibihe byose,   
 Yankirije i Kalvari   
 Amaherezo nzabon'Umwami   
 wanyitangiye kera.

  **2**   
Mur'icyo gihugu cyiza nta   
 joro rizabay'ukundi.   
Nzabana n'Umwami   
 wancunguje amaraso y'akiza.

  **3**   
Nzabana n'Umwami wanjye   
 nkunda nzamureba mu maso,   
 Nzamuririmbira mushimira   
 ubuntu yangiriye.

title: 333 Icyampa Kugendana N'Imana
markdown:
### 333 Icyampa Kugendana N'Imana   

  **1**   
 Icyampa kugendana n'Imana,   
 Mu nzir'ijya mw'ijuru,   
 Nibyo byamber'umucy'ungeza,   
 Ku Mwana w'Intama.

  **2**   
Garuka, Mukunzi garuka,   
 Ntumwa nziza y'amahoro,   
 Nang'ibyaha byakubabaje,   
 Bikantanya nawe.

  **3**   
Mbega ngo ndagir'amahoro,   
 Ntazigera nibagirwa!   
Ariko byansizemw'imvun'   
itakungwa n'ab'isi.

  **4**   
Icyo nagusimbuje cyose,   
 Uko cyaba kiri kose,   
 Mfasha nitandukanye nacyo,   
 Ngusenge wenyine.

title: 334 Nimumenyesh'Abantu Bose
markdown:
### 334 Nimumenyesh'Abantu Bose   

  **1**   
 Nimumenyesh'abantu bose ko Yes'ari hafi,   
 Is'imurikirwe n'umucyo, Maze Yes'agaruke.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Nimusingiz'uwo Mwana w'Intama watambwe,   
 Nimwamamaze ko Yes'agiye kwima.

  **2**   
Amahanga yasubiranyemo, Muyaburire,   
 Is'imurikirwe n'umucyo, Maze Yes'agaruke.

  **3**   
Bana b'Imana, Nimuririmbe, Muyih'ikuzo,   
 Hahirw'ababa maso, Bukarinda butandukana.

title: 335 Nejejwe N'Iri Turo
markdown:
### 335 Nejejwe N'Iri Turo   

  **1**   
 Nejejwe n'iri turo ntuy'Umwami Yesu,   
 Igitambo kizima nicyo jyew'ubwanjye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Akir'ituro ryanjye We Mwana w'Imana,   
 Kand'umanurire ku mucyo uv'ahera.

  **2**   
Mpaz'ubugingo bwanjye, Nticuza, ntatinya,   
 Kubw'ubuntu bwawe warancunguye Mwami.

  **3**   
Yesu ngwin'unyigishe wowe wancunguye,   
 Nshaka kubana naw'ibihe bidashira.

title: 336 Dusingiz'Uwiteka
markdown:
### 336 Dusingiz'Uwiteka   

  **1**      
 Dusingiz'Uwiteka,   
 Tumushimir'ineza ye,   
 Kukw'imbabazi ze nyinshi,   
 Zizahorahw'iteka.

  **2**   
Umuremyi wa byose,   
 Uwakwij'umucyo kw'isi,   
 Agir'imbabazi nyinshi,   
 Zizahorahw'iteka.

  **3**   
Abibeshaho byose,   
 Akabimar'ubukene,   
 Agir'imbabazi nyinshi,   
 Zizahorahw'iteka.

  **4**   
Yahiriy'ubwoko bwe,   
 Ubwo bwari mu butayu,   
 Agir'imbabazi nyinshi,   
 Zizahorahw'iteka.

  **5**   
Ni nyir'impuhwe nyinshi,   
 Ameny'ubukene bwacu,   
 Agir'imbabazi nyinshi,   
 Zizahorahw'iteka.

  **6**   
Tumusingiz'iteka,   
 Kubw'imbabazi ze nyinshi,   
 Ahoran'impuhwe nyinshi,   
 Zizahorahw'iteka.

title: 337 Kuber'Iki Utindiganya?
markdown:
### 337 Kuber'Iki Utindiganya?   

  **1**   
 Kuber'iki utindiganya?   
Yes'aragushaka none,   
 Haguruk'uve mu mwijima,   
 Aragukunda, Musange.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Kuki? Kuki?   
Utamusang'uyu munsi?   
Kuki? Kuki?   
Utamwitaba none?

  **2**   
Igihe kirahita vuba,   
 Uyu munsi niwo wawe,   
 Reka Yes'aguhumurize,   
 N'ubutunzi bw'igiciro.

  **3**   
Ese ntiwumva mu mutima,   
 Wuzuwe n'Umwuka Wera?   
Ntiwifuza kumurikirwa na   
 Yesu agukomeze.

  **4**   
Kuber'iki wanga kwitaba?   
Urupfu rugusatira!   
Ngwino Yes'akumurikire,   
 Ngwin'aragutegereje

title: 338 Ku Rutare Har'Isoko
markdown:
### 338 Ku Rutare Har'Isoko   

  **1**   
 Ku Rutare har'isoko itemb'imar'inyota,   
 Mugenzi ngwino kw'isoko maz'unywe ushir'inyota.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yesu niwe Gitare, Yaradupfiriye twese,   
 Mugenzi ngwino kw'isoko, Maz'unywe ushir'inyota.

  **2**   
Arahamagar'ati: Ngwino kw'isoko y'ubuntu,   
 Mugenz'ufit'inyota, Mbese ntiwakwitaba Yesu? 

  **3**   
Munyabyaha ngwino Yesu akwambuts'ubutayu,   
 Umukiz'aragutegereje, Ngwino umusange.

title: 339 Ineza N'Imbabazi
markdown:
### 339 Ineza N'Imbabazi   

  **1**   
 Igihe nari nd'inzererezi,   
 Ngenda mu mwijima w'ibyaha,   
 Nih'Umwungeri yantaruye,   
 None ndi mu nzir'ijy'iwacu.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Ineza n'imbabazi ze nibyo bizanyomaho,   
 Iminsi yo kubaho kwanjy'ibihe byose,   
 Ineza n'imbabazi ze nibyo bizanyomaho,   
 Iminsi yose nzaba ndiho.   
Kandi nzaba mu nzu y'Uwiteka iteka,   
 Nzarira ku meza yanteguriye kera,   
 Ineza n'imbabazi ze nibyo bizanyomaho,   
 Iminsi yose nzaba ndiho.   
''Iminsi yose nzaba ndiho''.(Ku gice cya 3).

  **2**   
Ansubiz'intege mu bugingo,   
 Anyonger'imbarag'iteka,   
 Anjyan'ahar'amaz'atuje,   
 Arind'intambwe zanjye zose.

  **3**   
Mu gikombe cy'umwijim'ukaze,   
 Umukiz'azabana nanjye,   
 Azanyoboz'ukuboko kwe,   
 Angez'aho yanteguriye.

title: 340 Yesu Ndagutakambiye
markdown:
### 340 Yesu Ndagutakambiye   

  **1**   
 Yesu ndagutakambiye,   
 Kuk'utantabaye napfa,   
 Ungeze ku gakiza kawe,   
 Unyakir'uko ndi.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Unyakir'uko ndi,   
 Unyakir'uko ndi,   
 Mwami wanjye warampfiriye,   
 Unyakir'uko ndi.

  **2**   
Ntabwo ngira kivurira,   
 Arikw'amaraso yawe,   
 Niyo yangize uk'ushaka,   
 Unyakir'uko ndi.

  **3**   
Sinabasha kwitegura,   
 Nguhay'imigambi yanjye,   
 Unkize kubw'izina ryawe,   
 Unyakir'uko ndi.

  **4**   
Dore Mwami nje ku birenge   
byaw'ungir'uk'ushaka,   
 Utungany'umurimo wawe,   
 Unyakir'uko ndi.

title: 341 Yesu Niw'Ujy'Unyobora
markdown:
### 341 Yesu Niw'Ujy'Unyobora   

  **1**   
 Yesu niw'ujy'unyobora,   
 Amurikir'inzira,   
 Mu ntege nke zanjye zose,   
 Yesu niw'unyobora.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Amurikir'inzira,   
 Amurikir'inzira.   
Mu ntege zanjye zose,   
 Yesu niw'unyobora.

  **2**   
Yesu niw'ujy'undengera,   
 Yamviriy'amaraso,   
 Kwizera igitambo cye,   
 Byatumye mbabarirwa.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yamviriy'amaraso,   
 Yamviriy'amaraso.   
Kwizera igitambo cye,   
 Byatumye mbabarirwa.

  **3**   
Anyezahw'inenge zose,   
 Igihe munambyeho,   
 Amp'ubugingo bw'iteka,   
 Ntadukana n'urupfu,

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Igihe munambyeho,   
 Igihe munambyeho,   
 Amp'ubugingo bw'iteka,   
 Ntandukana n'urupfu.

  **4**   
Yanyishyuriy'umwenda,   
 Ufit'igiciro cyinshi,   
 Yanteguriye umwanya,   
 Nzabana naw'iteka,

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Yesu warancunguye,   
 Yesu warancunguye.   
Yanteguriye umwanya,   
 Nzabana naw'iteka,

title: 342 Mukiza Wanjye Nyobora
markdown:
### 342 Mukiza Wanjye Nyobora   

  **1**   
 Mukiza wanjye, Nyobor'ah'ushaka,   
 Mfat'ikiganza maze nkumve bugufi,   
 N'ubw'amahwa yampanda, Ngukurikire,   
 Nyobor'ah'ushaka, Mukiza wanjye.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S:**   
 Nzagukurikira hose,   
 Mukiza wanjye, Ngukurikire,   
 Nzagukurikira Mukiza unyobore.   
 **A.,T. na B.:**   
 Nzagukuriki ,gukurikira hose,   
 Mukiza wanjye, Ngukurikire,   
 Nzagukuriki,rikira unyobore,   
 za unyobore , nyobora.

  **2**   
Mukiza wanjye, Nyobor'ah'ushaka,   
 Ukomez'undinde unampumurize,   
 N'ubw'umwijima wab'umbudits'imbere,   
 Ntabwo nzatiny'unyoboye Mukiza.

  **3**   
Njyan'ah'ushaka Mwam'icyo ngusaba,   
 Nyuza mu nzira ntoya ne guteshuka,   
 Nubwo Satan'anyoshya anyongorera,   
 Mfasha njye nsubiza bwangu mpakana.

title: 343 Shimwa Ntama Y'Imana
markdown:
### 343 Shimwa Ntama Y'Imana   

  **1**   
 Shimwa Ntama y'Imana,   
 Turagushima Ntama,   
 Shimwa Ntama y'Imana,   
 Turagushima cyane.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
Shimwa haleluya,   
 Shimwa haleluya,   
 Singizwa Mukiza,   
 Wowe Ntama y'Imana.

  **2**   
Ubwami bwawe buze,   
 Dutsindire icyaha,   
 Waradukunze cyane,   
 Shimwa Ntama y'Imana.

  **3**   
Tukunambeho Mwami,   
 Tujye tuguh'ikuzo,   
 Turi kumwe n'Umwami,   
 Ku musozi Siyoni.

title: 344 Nzahimbaza Imana
markdown:
### 344 Nzahimbaza Imana   

  **1**   
 Nzahimbaz'Imana mfite umutima unyuzwe,   
 Kubw'urukundo rwawe n'imbabazi wangiriye,   
 Mfasha mu ntege nke zanjye, Unsindire icyaha.   
Murikir'umutima wanjye, Nguhimbaze Mwami.

  **2**   
Mutima wanjye umvira, Wubahe Uwiteka,   
 Ungarure hafi yawe, Ne kuyoba Mukiza,   
 Narazimiye, Mvana mu nzira y'urupfu Mwami.   
Wampaye ibyiringiro igihe wapfiraga.

  **3**   
Mfukamye imbere yawe, Ngushima Mwami wanjye,   
 Ndakwinginze Mwami mpa umugisha uyu munsi,   
 Nkeney'urukundo n'ubuntu biva kuri wowe.   
Maz'imibereho yanjye ijy'iguhesh'ikuzo.

title: 345 Yesu Araguhamagara!
markdown:
### 344 Nzahimbaza Imana   

  **1**   
 Yes'arahamagara, Munyabyaha ngwino,   
 Ubu turagusabira, Nyamuna ngwino,   
 Arakwiteze munyabyaha, Ngwino, Ngwino,   
 N'igihe cyo kumumenya, Nyamuna ngwino.

  **2**   
Nib'uremerewe n'ibyaha, Ngwino, Ngwino,   
 Yesu aragutur'uwo mutwaro ngwino,   
 Yesu n'umunyebambe, Munyabyaha ngwino,   
 Niwe wagucunguye, Munyabyaha ngwino.

  **3**   
Umv'ubury'akwinginga, Munyabyaha ngwino,   
 Ngwin'araguh'umugisha, Nyamuna ngwino,   
 Araguhamagara, Munyabyaha ngwino,   
 Ubu turagusabira, Nyamuna ngwino.

title: 346 Ndi Mu Maboko Akiza
markdown:
### 346 Ndi Mu Maboko Akiza   

  **1**   
 Iy'Umukiza wanjy'anyoboye,   
 Uko ndi kose ngir'amahoro,   
 Ankirish'umuraba w'ibyaha,   
 Amaboko y'akiza.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na A.:**   
 Ndi mu mabokw'akiza,   
 Amaboko y'akiza,   
 N'ubwo naba ngeze no mu kaga,   
 Ndi mu mabokw'akiza.   
 **T. na B.:**   
 Ndi mu mabo... ...kw'aki...mabokw'akiza,   
 Amaboko akiza ....mabokw'akiza,   
 N'ubwo naba ngeze no mu kaga,   
 Ndi mu mabokw'akiza.

  **2**   
Ahor'andamiz'amaboko ye,   
 Akanambwiz'ijwi ry'ihumure,   
 Ati: Humura, Nzakuramiza,   
 Amaboko akiza.

  **3**   
Azandinda anyobor'iteka,   
 Ntacyo nzatinya ndi kumwe nawe,   
 Nzi kw'ahor'andind'iteka ryose,   
 Ndi mu mabokw'akiza.

title: 347 Manyur'Umutsima
markdown:
### 347 Manyur'Umutsima   

  **1**   
 Manyur'umutsima w'ubugingo,   
 Nk'uko wabigize mu kibaya,   
 Natw'uduhaz'Ibyanditswe Byera,   
 Turakwifuza Jambo rizima.

  **2**   
Mwami hir'ukuri menyeshejwe,   
 Nk'uko wahiriye wa mutsima,   
 Uri ku nyanja y'i Galilaya,   
 Mbeshweho naw'Ushobora byose.

  **3**   
Mwam'ur'umutsima w'ubugingo,   
 Ijambo ryawe rimbeshejeho,   
 Mpa guhazwa naryo tuzabane,   
 Mpa kugukunda nzabane nawe.

  **4**   
Amagamb'uvuga n'ubugingo,   
 Mfasha ngo nyumvire, jye nta ntege,   
 Ni wowe nkesh'ubugingo bwanjye,   
 Ijambo ryawe rimpa gutsinda.

title: 348 Nakurikiye Yesu
markdown:
### 348 Nakurikiye Yesu   

  **1**   
 Nakurikiye Yesu mu kibaya akiz'abarwayi,   
 Ac'iminyururu y'ibyaha no kuruhur'imitwaro.

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S.:**   
Mbega ngo biranezeza gukurikira Yesu,   
 Akanyoboz'ubuntu bwe akangeza mw'ijuru.   
 **A., T., B.:**   
 Mbega ngo biranezeza, rikira, ra Yesu,   
  .Akanyoboz'ubuntu bwe,   
 kangeza; Mw'ijuru.

  **2**   
Namukurikiye ku musoz'igihe yahindurwaga,   
 Imana iravuga iti: Ur'Umwana wanjye nkunda.

  **3**   
Namukurikiy'i Kalvari, Agend'atukwa na benshi,   
 Akomez'inzira y'Umwanzi, Yikorey'umusaraba.

  **4**   
Nzamukurikira nkiriho, Maz'atume mpora nesha,   
 Kugez'ubwo nzager'iwacu ahahor'umunezero.

title: 349 Nabony'Umuntu Unaniwe
markdown:
### 349 Nabony'Umuntu Unaniwe   

  **1**   
 Nabony'umunt'unaniwe, Kand'agenda yihanganye,   
 Yikorey'umusaraba, Nyamara ntabwo yari yihebye,   
 Imibabar'iba myinshi! Arik'uw'urahebuje!   
Mubaz'ikimuh'intege, Ati: Nuko mfit'ibyiringiro.

  **2**   
Nabony'afite n'intwaro, Arwany'iby'is'ashikamye,   
 Kand'arwan'amaramaje ngw'azabon'ikamba rihoraho,   
 N'ubwo yari yarenganye, Ntiyigeze yivovota,   
 Mubaz'ikimuh'intege, Ati: Nuko mfit'ibyiringiro.

  **3**   
Nabony'uwasiz'inshuti ze, Bakundanaga cyane,   
 Atandukana n'iby'isi, Ahitamw'inzir'imuruhije,   
 N'ubw'irimw'ibibabaza, Arikw'ariyumanganya,   
 Mubaz'ikimuh'intege, Ati: Nuko mfit'ibyiringiro.

  **4**   
Tur'abagenzi mur'iyi si, Y'akaga n'agahinda,   
 Irimw'ibyago n'urwango, N'ibituro byuzuye mw'abantu,   
 Kugez'ubwo Krist'azaza, Akarokor'abe bose,   
 Se, n'iki cyadukomeza, Atar'ibyiringiro bishyitse?

title: 350 Mugenzi Komera
markdown:
### 350 Mugenzi Komera   

  **1**   
 Mugenzi komera Yes'ari hafi,   
Twamutegereje kera,   
 Tugiye kwitahir'iwacu heza,   
Turirimbe ko dutsinze,   
 Twihangane twe kumuhemukaho,   
Kandi w'ataduhemukiye,   
 Yatwerets'urukundo ruhebuje,   
Nirwo rwatumy'adupfira.

  **2**   
Mugenzi komera,   
Utegerez'umudugudu w'izahabu,   
 Wateguriwe abakiranutsi,   
Niho tuzaruhukira,   
 Ihangane ntabwo tuzagum'aha,   
Mu buhanya no mu miruho,   
 Harubw'umwijim'uzatamuruka,   
Igitondo gitangaze.   

  **3**   
Mugenzi komera dore araje,   
Uwo Muremyi wa byose,   
 Azanye n'abamarayika benshi,   
Azanye n'ingororano,   
 Ihangan'ugez'igih'Umukiza,   
Azakubwir'aya magambo,   
 Ngo mugaragu mwiz'ukiranuka,   
Igire mu munezero.

  **4**   
Mugenzi ujy'uhora wihanganye,   
Komeza kwizera kwawe,   
 Amarira yawe ahanagurwe   
maz'uzahabwe n 'ikamba,   
 Ihangane mwene Data ni koko,   
Isezerano rye n'impamo,   
 Uzibanirayo n'abakijijwe,   
Na Yes'Umukiza wacu.

title: 351 Umunsi Mwiza Uri Bugufi
markdown:
### 351 Umunsi Mwiza Uri Bugufi 

  **1**   
 Dor'umunsi mwiza ugiye kugera,   
 Tukibera ibudapfa.   
 Aho tuzibera hahebuj'ubwiza,   
 N'umuns'utangaje! 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Umwijim'ugiye gutamuruka,   
 Tukabah'ubutazongera gupfa.   
 Mbega ihumure twahawe na Yesu!   
 Dor'ari bugufi. 

  **2**   
 Imitima yacu irahumurirwa,   
 Ntabwo ijya igoheka.   
 Turifuza kubon'uwo munsi mwiza,   
 Tuzaba mu bwiza. 

  **3**   
 Za ntwari zasinzirany'ibyiringiro,   
 Tugiye kuzabonana.   
 Nta marir'azongera kuturangwaho,   
 Mu murwa w'Imana.

title: 352 Nitugera Mw'Ijuru
markdown:
### 352 Nitugera Mw'Ijuru 

  **1**   
 Turirimb'urukundo rwa Yesu;   
 Impuhwe ndetse n'ubuntu bye.   
 Ari kuduteguriraho tuzaba,   
 mwijuru. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Nitugera mw'ijuru,   
 mbeg'umunezero tuzagira!'   
 Turirimbindirimbo nziza   
 zabanesheje. 

  **2**   
 N'ubw'ibicu bidukingirije,   
 Bitubuza kureba neza,   
 Turi hafi yo gusoz'  
 urugendo rukomeye. 

  **3**   
 Dukomeze dukorerImana,   
 Tuzabihemberwa nta shiti;   
Turi hafi guhabwubugingo   
 bwiteka ryose!

  **4**   
 Dorikamba ririmbere yacu,   
 Tuzaryambikirwa mwijuru,   
 Nahantu higikundiro,   
 harahebuje rwose.

title: 353 Mu Maboko Ya Yesu
markdown:
### 353 Mu Maboko Ya Yesu 

  **1**   
 Mu maboko ya Yesu,   
 Ndi mu gituza cye!   
 Mpabon'umunezero,   
 Kubw'urukundo rwe.   
 Mbega ngo ndaririmba,   
 Nk'abamarayika:   
 Aho hantu heza,   
 Ku Nyanja ya Yasipi! 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Mu maboko ya Yesu,   
 Ndi mu gituza cye;   
 Mpabon'umunezero,   
 Kubw'urukundo rwe. 

  **2**   
 Mu maboko ya Yesu,   
 Anyitaho rwose;   
 Ntsind'ibigeragezo,   
 Ni ho nesh'icyaha.   
 Mu maboko ya Yesu,   
 Hehe n'umubabaro!   
 Ntabwo ngishidikanya,   
 Yes'amar'ubwoba. 

  **3**   
 Yesu Mukunzi wanjye,   
 Wowe nihishamo;   
 Ni wowe niringira,   
 Wowe wampfiriye.   
 Gitare gikomeye,   
 Ndagutegereje;   
 Nuza ku manywa cyangwa   
 nijor'uzanjyana!

title: 354 Mbe! Basare Tugashya
markdown:
### 354 Mbe! Basare Tugashya 

  **1**   
 Mbe! Basare tugashya tugana hakurya;   
 Nidusakirana numuraba,   
 Haraho gutsikubwato,   
 Ku cyambu gituje cyane. 

  **Gusubiramo Ibice bya 1,2 na 3:**   
 Ku cyambu gi-hora gitekanye iteka,   
 I-wacu mwijuru hahora hatuje!   
 Ku cyambu gituje, hahoramahoro!   
 (Hahoramahoro.) 

  **2**   
 Twe kurangamirinyungu zigihe gito,   
 Nta mumaro zifite haba namba!   
 Dushakaho dutsika,   
 Ku nkombe hakuryiwacu. 

  **3**   
 Yesu ni we Nyenyeri itumurikira,   
 Kandi ni wudukingirumuraba.   
 Tyo twerekezubwato,   
 kuri Yesu Murengezi. 

  **4**   
 Nubwubukana bwinyanja bwakara gute!   
 Urusaku rukaba rwinshi cyane!   
 Ntacyo ruzadutwara,   
 Yesazaruducyahira. 

  **Gusubiramo Igice cya 4:**   
 Mwijuru niwacu hakurya ku cyambu   
 Mwijuru mwijuru ni ho tuzibera.   
 Mwijuru heza pe! Mwijuru niwacu   
(mwijuru niwacu).

title: 355 Turakuramya Mana
markdown:
### 355 Turakuramya Mana 

  **1**   
 Tuje kukuramya Mana yacu y'icyubahiro,   
 Twubamye nk'ukw'indabyo zimer'imbere y'izuba.   
 Wow'utang'umunezero, Utubabarir'ibyaha;   
 Utumurikire Mana twe guteshuk'inzira. 

  **2**   
 Imirimo yawe Mana yigaragaza hose!   
 Ijuru n'isi bihamya icyubahiro cyawe;   
 Inyenyeri, izuba n'inyanja, ndetse n'imisozi,   
 N'inyoni ziririmbira mu biti by'inzitane. 

  **3**   
 Soko y'imigisha yose, uratubabarira!   
 Ni wowe Nyir'ubuzima, ni wow'utubeshaho.   
 Utwuzuze urukundo, uduhire Mana yacu;   
 Uduhaz'umunezero, turagusabye Mana.

title: 356 Nkomoko Y'Ibyiza Bidateka
357 Ndishimye Pe! Yes'Arankunda
markdown:
### 357 Ndishimye Pe! Yes'Arankunda 

  **1**   
 Nishimiye ko Data wa twese,   
 Yandikishij'iby'urukundo rwe.   
 Mu byanditswe muri Bibiliya,   
 Nta cyaruta yuko Yes'ankunda. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Ndishimye pe! Yes'arankunda;   
 Arankunda, arankunda!   
 Ndishimye pe! Yes'arankunda;   
 Anyakir'uko ndi. 

  **2**   
 Iyo nyobye maze ngateshuka,   
 Ntabw'ajy'amvirira haba namba.   
 Angaruz'ineza n'urukundo,   
 Nkamugarukira kukw'ankunda. 

  **3**   
 Ningera mu bwami bwo mw'ijuru,   
 Nzaririmb'indirimbo z'ikuzo.   
 Ariko cyane cyane nzishima,   
 Ndirimb'urukundo rw'Umukiza.

title: 358 Yesu Yarampinduye Rwose!
359 Umucyo Uva Mw'Ijuru
markdown:
### 359 Umucyo Uva Mw'Ijuru 

  **1**   
 Umucyo uva mw'ijuru,   
 Uyobor'abagenzi,   
 Uzadufasha tugere,   
 Ku nkombe yo hakurya. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Mwami Yes'umucyo   
 waw'umurikir'abagenzi   
 Winjire mu nyanja,   
 Maz'ubakingir'umuraba. 

  **2**   
 Umwijim'urabuditse,   
 Inyanj'irahorera;   
 Yes'aduhozahw'amas'   
 azadufasha twambuke. 

  **3**   
 Mutyo ducan'amatara,   
 Dukomez'urugendo.   
 Twe kuyobywa n'abasare,   
 Badafit'urumuri.

title: 360 Wisubika Kwihana Nshuti
markdown:
### 360 Wisubika Kwihana Nshuti 

  **1**   
 Wisubika kwihana nshuti;   
 Ni nko kubwir'Umwuka Wera,   
 Ngo genda rwose,   
 Jye nzihan'undi munsi.   
 Mbega ng'uribuza amahirwe! 

  **2**   
 Wisubika kwihana nshuti;   
 Dore Yes'atez'ibiganza.   
 Ihan'uyu munsi, emer'umusange;   
 Aguh'ubugingo agukize. 

  **3**   
 Wisubika kwihana nshuti;   
 Dor'igihe kirarangiye.   
 Rwos'igihe cy'imbabazi kirashize,   
 Fatirana bwang'usange Yesu.

title: 361 Ubuntu Butangaje!
markdown:
### 361 Ubuntu Butangaje! 

  **1**   
 Mbeg'ubuntu butangaje cyane!   
 Umutindi nkanjye gukizwa!   
 Ntabwo nabonaga, none ndabona.   
 Nakijijw'ibyaha byanjye. 

  **2**   
 N'ubuntu bwanyerets'aho nari;   
 Nari mu byaha byinshi cyane.   
 Kubw'ubuntu Yesu yarandokoye;   
 Singifit'ubwoba rwose. 

  **3**   
 Navanywe mu kaga nari ndimo;   
 Mpagaze mu buntu bwa Yesu.   
 Kubw'ubwo buntu nzager'ibudapfa;   
 Mw'ijuru kwa Data heza! 

  **4**   
 Imyak'igihumbi ndi mw'ijuru;   
 Nzabanayo n'Umwami Yesu.   
 Mbeg'indirimbo nziza nzaririmba!   
 Nzaba nkeye cyane rwose.

title: 362 N'Umutima Utuje
363 Yesu Mu Bugingo Bwanjye
markdown:
### 363 Yesu Mu Bugingo Bwanjye 

  **1**   
 Mbese har'icyanezeza,   
 Nko kubana na Yesu?   
 Nta cyanezeza nko kubana   
 N'uwo munyakuri. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Niba har'ikinezeza,   
 Kurut'ibindi byose;   
 Yesu mu bugingo bwanjye,   
 Rwos'andutira byose 

  **2**   
 Yitangiye kuncungura,   
 Kubw'ubuntu bw'Imana.   
 Urukundo rwe rusumb'  
 Ijuru n'inyanja zose. 

  **3**   
 Ntacyo nshobora gukena,   
 Mfit'uwo Mucunguzi.   
 Ni w'ump'ibyo nkennye   
 Byose, Ni w'unshoboza byose. 

  **4**   
 Ku mugez'ubengerana,   
 Nzaririmb'indirimbo;   
 Ndi kumwe n'abarokotse,   
 Turirimbir'Imana.

title: 364 Nyir'Ukwiringirwa Mana
markdown:
### 364 Nyir'Ukwiringirwa Mana 

  **1**   
 Nyir'ukwiringirwa, Man'Ihoraho,   
 Ntabw'ubundikirwa n'umwijima.   
 Ntuhinduka Mana yac'idatsindwa;   
 Kand'uhor'uko wahoze Mana. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Nyir'ukwiringirwa Mana ikomeye,   
 Ni wow'uduh'ibyo dukeneye.   
 Ikiganza cyawe, kitugabira,   
 Ibyo dukeneye buri munsi. 

  **2**   
 Haba mu cyi cyangwa se mu muvumbi,   
 Inyenyeri, izuba n'ukwezi,   
 Ibyo waremye byose Mana yacu,   
 Bihamya k'ur'Iman'ikomeye. 

  **3**   
 Ugir'imbabazi n'impuhwe nyinshi.   
 Umunsi ku wund'uraturinda.   
 Uduh'ibyiringiro bikomeye;   
 By'uko tuzabahw'iteka ryose.

title: 365 Dor'Umwami Yes'Araje
markdown:
### 365 Dor'Umwami Yes'Araje 

  **1**   
 Dor'Umwami Yes'araje,   
 Nguriya araje mu bicu.   
 Ashagawe n'abamarayika,   
 Benshi batabarika. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Ndatwaranira rwose,   
 Kugera mw'ijuru heza.   
 Haleluya Yesu nahimbazwe! 

  **2**   
 Reb'abera bazamurwa,   
 Baririmb'indirimbo nziza.   
 Impanda zirangurura,   
 Mbega ngo Yes'aramwenyura!

title: 366 Isoko Itemba
markdown:
### 366 Isoko Itemba 

  **1**   
 Har'isoko y'ubunt'  
 Isokw'ihor'itemba.   
 Mu mitim'inaniwe,   
 Sokw'iryoshye cyane.   
 N'isoko nziza cyane pe!   
 N'isokw'itumar'inyota. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Iyo Soko, Ihora itemba;   
 Uyinywaho iramukiza. 

  **2**   
 Ndumv'ijwi ryongorera,   
 Nk'indirimbo nziza!   
 Rituruka mw'isoko   
 Nziza idakama.   
 Ni yo soko y'ubugingo,   
 Ni y'idukiz'ubwihebe. 

  **3**   
 N'isoko y'umugisha,   
 Itang'ibyishimo.   
 N'amaraso ya Yes'  
 Akiz'abanyabyaha.   
 N'amaraso y'Umukiza,   
 Kand'aratunganye rwose.

title: 367 Kubw'Ijambo Ryawe
markdown:
### 367 Kubw'Ijambo Ryawe 

  **1**   
 Kubw'Ijambo ryawe Nyagasani,   
 Turagushima Mwami Mana.   
 Uduh'amaso abona neza,   
 Kangur'imitima yacu. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Waduhaye Bibiliya Yera,   
 Turagushimye Nyagasani.   
 Dufashe twumv'Ijambo ryawe,   
 Tuyoborwe na ryo Muremyi. 

  **2**   
 Mw'Ijambo ryawe harimw'umucyo,   
 Tubonamw'amasezerano.   
 N'itabaza ry'ibirenge byacu,   
 Ritumurikir'inzira. 

  **3**   
 Hahirw'abakomez'iryo Jambo,   
 Bazabana na Yes'iteka.   
 Bazarya ku giti cy'ubugingo;   
 Hafi y'umugezi mwiza.

title: 368 Kwizera Kwanjye
markdown:
### 368 Kwizera Kwanjye 

  **1**   
 Kwizera kwanjye   
 Kwabonye uburuhukiro;   
 Niringiye Uhoraho   
 Wantangiy'incungu. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Nta yindi ncungw'ikenewe,   
 Yesu yarishye byose.   
 Yarapfuye, arazuka;   
 Yaranyitangiye. 

  **2**   
 Nta bwoba ngifite namba!   
 Yes'arampagije.   
 Yankuyehw'ibyaha byose,   
 Kubw'amaraso Ye. 

  **3**   
 Yesu yaje gukiz'   
 Imitima yazimiye.   
 Yatanz'amaraso Ye,   
 Kugira ngo ndokoke. 

  **4**   
 Har'Ijambo rihindura,   
 Kandi rimp'ituza.   
 N'Ijambo ryiza ry'Iman'   
 Ijambo ry'ubugingo.

title: 369 Ibyaha Byanjye Mbihaye Yesu
markdown:
### 369 Ibyaha Byanjye Mbihaye Yesu 

  **1**   
 Ibyaha byanjye mbihaye    
 Yes'Umwana w'Intama;    
 Byose ndabimwikoreje,    
 Ngo mbon'umudendezo.    
 Ibicumuro byanjye,    
 Mbihay'Umwami Yesu;    
 Anyejesh'amaraso Ye,    
 Anyeze nse n'urubura. 

  **2**   
 Kand'ibyo nkennye byose,    
 Mbishyize ku birenge Bye.    
 Yes'akiz'indwara zose,    
 Ndetse n'ibicumuro.    
 Intimba zanjye zose,    
 Nzishyikiriza Yesu;    
 Kand'imitwaro yanjye yose,    
 Yes'arayinyakira. 

  **3**   
 Ndifuza kuba nka Yesu,    
 Niyoroheje nka We.    
 Ndifuza kureba Yes'Umwana    
 w'Imana Data.    
 Ndifuza kuzabana,    
 Na Yes'iyo mw'ijuru;    
 Nkaririmbana n'abera,    
 Ntozwa n'abamarayika.

title: 370 Twegerej'Igihe
markdown:
### 370 Twegerej'Igihe 

  **1**   
 Twegerej'igihe cyo gutah'iwacu;   
 Abacu twabuze tuzongera kubonana.   
 Mwami Yesu, Tegur'ubugingo bwanjye;   
 Nyejesh'amaraso yaw'ankiz'ibyaha byanjye. 

  **2**   
 Dore duhanganye n'imirab'ikaze;   
 Arikw'iri hafi kurangira bidatinze.   
 Tugiye kwiber'ahatab'amakuba;   
 Yesu nkiz'ibyaha mbashe kuzager'iwawe. 

  **3**   
 Intugunda zose zigiye gushira.   
 Turi hafi guhanagurw'amarira yose.   
 Mwami Yesu wamviriye amaraso.   
 Mfasha rwose, nzabe mur'uwo muns'uhiriwe. 

  **4**   
 N'igihe kigufi Yes'akagaruka.   
 Yaradupfiriye, kugira ngo tuzabeho.   
 Mwami Yesu, Tegur'ubugingo bwanjye;   
 Nyejesh'amaraso yaw'ankiz'ibyaha byanjye.

title: 371 Nagiriw'Ubuntu
markdown:
### 371 Nagiriw'Ubuntu 

  **1**   
 Nagiriw'ubuntu na Yesu,   
 N'ubuntu bw'ikirenga rwose.   
Umutwaro w'ibyaha byanjye,   
 Wasigaye i Kaluvari. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 **S. na T.:**   
 Kubw'ubuntu bw'Imana,   
 Butangaje cyane:   
 Mbeg'ubuntu! Ubuntu,   
 Bwankijij'ibyaha.   
 **A. na B.:**   
 Mbeg'ubuntu, mbeg'ubuntu;   
 Bw'Imana butangaje cyane:   
 Mbeg'ubuntu! Mbeg'ubuntu!   
 Ubuntu bwankijij'ibyaha 

  **2**   
 Ibyaha byarazimanganye;   
 Mbese nk'uk'umurab'utuza.   
 Kubw'ubuntu butarondorwa;   
 Nakize kubw'umusaraba. 

  **3**   
 Ubuntu butagereranywa,   
 Bwahawe uwizera wese.   
 Ushaka kubon'agakiza,   
 Nasange Yes'aramwakira.

title: 372 Kwa Kwizera Kw'Abakurambere
markdown:
### 372 Kwa Kwizera Kw'Abakurambere 

  **1**   
 Kwa kwizera kw'abakurambere,   
 Kwa kundi kwababashishaga,   
 Kwemera kuzir'akarengane;   
 Kwicishw'inkota n'umuriro. 

  **Gusubiramo:**   
 Uko kwizera natw'ubu,   
 Tugufite mu mitima.   
 Tuzakunambaho rwose,   
 N'iyo byaba ngombwa gupfa. 

  **2**   
 Baraboshywe baranakubitwa,   
 Baroshywe mu mazu y'imbohe;   
 Bajugunywa mu byobo by'intare,   
 Nyamara bagumye kwizera! 

  **3**   
 N'ubwo batotejwe bikomeye,   
 Nta nzika bigeze bagira!   
 Ntibikomy'ababatotezaga,   
 Babasabirag'imigisha!

title: 373 Tur'Abagenzi
markdown:
### 373 Tur'Abagenzi 

  **1**   
 Tur'abagenzi mw'iyi si,   
 Twerekeje mw'ijuru.   
 Yes'araduhamagara,   
 Ku nkombe ya yordani.
